notes: Around 31 August 2025 (as reported) , in Guachochi, Chihuahua, a boy was killed, and his body was found on 31 August. The boy was reported as disappeared on 30 April, and their relatives claimed that he had been forcibly recruited by Los Mayitos gang. Two days after conducting surveillance activities for the gang in the municipality of Aldama, he was abducted by a rival criminal group. 1 fatality. 1 fatality.

source: Colima Noticias; El Proceso; El Sol de Sinaloa; La Jornada; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: Around 29 August 2025 (between 29 - 30 August), near La Bandera, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture and gunshot wounds next to Navolato-Altata road. The victim was a Civil Protection officer who was abducted in colonia 5 de Febrero on 29 August 2025 and his body was found on 30 August 2025. 1 fatality.

On 29 August 2025, in Morelia, Michoacan de Ocampo, unidentified individuals shot at officers of the municipal and state police, the military force, the National Guard and the State Attorney General's Office who were conducting a search operation against a criminal group on Samaria street, in colonia Torreon Nuevo. The officers shot back, arrested three individuals and seized firearms, tactical equipment, and a canvas with message from an armed group. There were no casualties.

On 29 August 2025, in El Tepuche, Sinaloa, members of Los Mayitos and Los Chapitos gangs clashed on the paths that lead to Tecolotes and Caminaguato. Several people were injured, including at least four people who were injured with stray bullets. Some of the injured were transferred to hospitals in Culiacan, where they were victims of attacks on 29 and 30 August 2025 (coded separately). Several injured.

On 29 August 2025, in Celaya, Guanajuato, armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a woman while driving, the perpetrators intercepted her on Avenida El Sauz (drive-by). The victim was a transit municipal police officer who had just finished her work (off-duty). 1 fatality.
On 29 August 2025, in Irapuato, Guanajuato, two armed men shot and killed a woman in a vehicle in Colonia Laboratorio CFE. The victim had background records for drugs consumption. 1 fatality.

On 29 August 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two armed men shot and killed a woman in her house in colonia Rivera de la Presa. According to neighbors, the house was a drug selling point. 1 fatality.
On 29 August 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man and injured another one in colonia Valle Delta (drive-by). 1 fatality.

source: La Jornada; La Voz de Michoacan; MiMorelia
notes: Around 29 August 2025 (as reported), in El Posquelite, Guerrero, a man was killed and his body was found inside his vehicle with his hands tied up and with gunshot wounds on the Lazaro Cardenas-Zihuatanejo road. The victim was the son of the President of the Business Coordinating Council (CCE) of Lazaro Cardenas. 1 fatality.
On 29 August 2025, in Tula de Allende, Hidalgo, armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed two people (drive-by). It is suspected that the perpetrators were later arrested. 2 fatalities.

Around 29 August 2025 (as reported), in Tochtepec, Puebla, a man was killed and his body was found executed with the 'tiro de gracia' in barrio de San Miguel. 1 fatality.
Around 29 August 2025 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found next to a threatening message in Colonia Recursos Hidraulicos. 1 fatality.

notes: On 29 August 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, suspected members of Los Mayitos Gang in a vehicle shot at patients and health workers at the Civil Hospital (drive-by). Four people died (including a girl) and three people were injured. The attack came after an armed clash that took place in El Tepuche earlier the same day (coded separately) and it is suspected that injured members of Los Chapitos were being treated at the hospital. 4 fatalities, 3 injured.

On 29 August 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unidentified armed individuals, entered a house and shot and killed a man and injured a minor in colonia Bachigualato. This incident occurred amid a wave of violent attacks in Sinaloa state, likely related to the war between factions of the Sinaloa Cartel. 1 fatality.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; La Prensa de Monclova; Riodoce
notes: Around 29 August 2025 (as reported), in El Tepuche, Sinaloa, three people were killed and only the heads were found. Two of the heads were found on dirt roads on the outskirts of the town. This action comes amid a wave of attacks that was recorded after a clash between Los Chapitos and Los Mayitos gangs in this municipality (coded separately). 3 fatalities.

Around 29 August 2025 (as reported), around Las Aguamitas, Sinaloa, two men were killed and their bodies were found with gunshot wounds inside a vehicle on the road to San Remigio near ejido El Pintor. This incident occurred amid a wave of violent attacks in Sinaloa state, likely related to the war between factions of the Sinaloa Cartel. 2 fatalities.

On 29 August 2025, in Mazatlan, Sinaloa, armed individuals threw an explosive device at a municipal police patrol parked in colonia Flores Magon. The officers had left the vehicle and were eating at a restaurant at that moment of the explosion. There were no casualties.

Three individuals were arrested as a result.
On 5 September 2025, in Morelia, Michoacan de Ocampo, a suspected member of the CJNG opened fire at state police officers who shot back and killed the man in Colonia Jardines del Hungaro. 1 fatality.

Around 2 September 2025 (as reported), in Puente de Ixtla, Morelos, a man and a woman were killed and their bodies were found with stab wounds and signs of torture. The woman was naked and the man was wearing his pants. A message was left at the scene signed by La Familia Michoacana. 2 fatalities.
On 2 September 2025, in El Llano Grande, Michoacan, National Guard and military officers clashed with suspected criminal members. One armed man was shot and killed. 1 fatality.

Around 2 September 2025 (as reported), in Bachimeto, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds. This incident occurred amid a wave of violent attacks in Sinaloa state, likely related to the war between factions of the Sinaloa Cartel. 1 fatality.

On 2 September 2025, in Benito Juarez, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, two armed men entered a bar and shot at two people in Colonia Heroe de Nacozari. One victim was killed and the other one was injured. 1 fatality.

On 2 September 2025, in Tijuana, Baja California, according to witnesses, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in colonia Villa Fontana III. Also in Tijuana, according to witnesses, two armed men shot and killed two men in colonia Poblado Ejido Matamoros. 3 fatalities.

On 3 September 2025, in Colonia Juan N. Alvarez (Playa Ventura), Guerrero, armed individuals shot and killed two men while they were digging a tomb in a cemetery to bury a friend who had recently died. admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave

notes: On 3 September 2025, in Licenciado Benito Juarez (Villa Juarez), Sinaloa, armed men shot at a house. The attack occurred amid a wave of shootings recorded on the same day in the city. Suspectedly there was an unspecified number of injured.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 3 September 2025, in Minatitlan, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, at least three armed men intercepted a man and kidnapped him in Colonia Miguel Hidalgo. The whereabouts of the man remain unknown.

On 3 September 2025, in Temixco, Morelos, armed individuals shot at a taxi driver on the Mexico-Acapulco highway at KM 84. According to unofficial reports, the taxi driver was inside his taxi parked on the highway when he was attacked. According to witnesses, armed individuals on a motorcycle arrived at the scene, shot the taxi driver, and then fled toward the Azteca neighborhood. 1 injured.

On 4 September 2025, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a man posing as a passenger along with several people asked a taxi driver to stop in Colonia El Roble and then shot the driver twice in his head. This attack is likely linked to a wave of attacks targeting taxi drivers in the city. 1 fatality.

On 4 September 2025, in Salamanca, Guanajuato, unknown armed individuals shot at a municipal police officer after he finished his duty and was on his way home in Colonia Del Parque. The victim died as a result. 1 fatality.

On 4 September 2025, in Tlaquepaque, Jalisco, unknown armed individuals shot and killed a man in Colonia Las Juntas. According to initial reports, the perpetrators were traveling in an older gray vehicle from which one man got out of the vehicle and shot the victim, before fleeing in the direction of La Piedrera. Another version suggests that the attackers were two men who fled on a Pulsar motorcycle. 1 fatality.

On 5 September 2025, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, armed men shot a taxi driver repeatedly while he was driving on the La Venta-Centro route in Colonia Renacimiento. This attack is likely linked to a wave of attacks targeting taxi drivers in the city. 1 fatality.
On 5 September 2025, in Colima, Colima, armed individuals entered a downtown neighborhood and one man opened fire and shot a man multiple times. The man died as a result. 1 fatality.

On 5 September 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unknown armed individuals intercepted an off-duty state police officer driving in his private vehicle and opened fire in Colonia Costa del Sol. The victim was not harmed and stated that the shots were not aimed at killing him but to intimidate him. There were no casualties.

On 5 September 2025, in Guadalupe, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, armed men approached a man when he was on his way home in Colonia Tres Caminos and shot him. The man fled into his home and died. A woman was hit by a stray bullet and also died. 2 fatalities.

On 5 September 2025, in Zamora de Hidalgo, Michoacan de Ocampo, a group of individuals opened fire and shot at a rehabilitation center in Colonia Juan Gutierrez Flores. The building was damaged as a result. There were no casualties.

On 4 September 2025, near Manuel Avila Camacho, Tamaulipas, armed individuals opened fire and at officers of the Missing Persons and Investigation Unit (coded as ministerial police) on the highway to Zaragoza. One officer was injured as a result.

On 4 September 2025, in Reynosa, Tamaulipas, armed men opened fire at officers of the State Attorney General's Office on the Reynosa-San Fernando highway. The officers shot back in Colonia Valle Soleado and Piramides. A family traveling in a car were hit by stray bullets and a boy. Both mother and father were injured. 1 fatality, 2 injured.

On 5 September 2025, in San Isidro de Trojes, Guanajuato, two unknown armed men on motorcycles opened fire and at officers of the National Guard who shot back while they were carrying out an operation. One man was arrested and one vehicle was seized. There were no casualties.

On 3 September 2025, in Heroica Matamoros, Tamaulipas, armed individuals clashed with state police forces around Colonia Morelos. Two police officers were injured. The armed individuals also set a (narco) roadblock in different parts of the city.

On 4 September 2025, in Heroica Matamoros, Tamaulipas, armed individuals opened fire at state police officers who shot back in Colonia Comunicadores. One individual was arrested as a result and one vehicle was seized. One individual was injured.

On 5 September 2025, in Reynosa, Tamaulipas, one armed individual opened fire at state police officers who were carrying out an operation to rescue a kidnapped person on the Reynosa-San Fernando highway near the canal Rodhe. Police officers shot back and arrested the perpetrator after he crashed with his car. The person who was kidnapped earlier the same day was rescued. Police officers seized a vehicle and weapons. There were no casualties.
On 2 September 2025, in Licenciado Benito Juarez (Villa Juarez), Sinaloa, there was an armed clash between armed individuals. Casualties unknown.

notes: On 3 September 2025, in Licenciado Benito Juarez (Villa Juarez), Sinaloa, according to witnesses, there was an armed clash between armed individuals in colonia Las Cachimbas. One person was killed and another three were injured. On the same day, also armed individuals shot inside a bar restaurant in Colonia Centro and armed men -who were inside the bar- answered the attack. 1 fatality.

On 5 September 2025, in Corral de Piedras, Sinaloa, unidentified armed men clashed in the mountain area. One man was injured and transported to Mazatlan. There is no further information on the event. 1 injured.

On 4 September 2025, in Guadalupe, Nuevo Leon, unknown armed individuals shot and killed a man in a parking lot in Colonia Las Sabinas. The victim was a suspected drug dealer who had been in prison for drug dealing and robbery. 1 fatality.

On 3 September 2025, in Tijuana, Baja California, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two men in colonia Mirador Capistrano. Suspectedly the event is related to conflict for the use of a plot of land that has been invaded. 2 fatalities.

Around 31 August 2025 (as reported), in Axochiapan, Morelos, a former councilor (former member of the PRI party) was killed and his body was found with a gunshot wound in colonia Del Carmen. The victim was known for being a businessman who was the owner of gas stations. 1 fatality.
Around 1 September 2025 (as reported), in Ciudad Apodaca, Nuevo Leon, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of violence and burned. 1 fatality.

On 1 September 2025, in Durazno De Fonseca, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, armed men travelling in two vehicles chased and shot at another vehicle during a local religious celebration (drive-by). A vendor was shot and injured with a stray bullet. The victim died later at the hospital. 1 fatality.

source: El Sol de Acapulco; La Jornada; La Silla Rota; Quadratin Oaxaca

According to local sources, the victim had strong differences with his predecessor from 2012 to 2015, who was linked to the Los Rojos criminal group. 1 fatality.

Around 2 September 2025 (as reported), in Zamora de Hidalgo, Michoacan, a man was killed and his body was found with a gunshot wound in colonia Lazaro Cardenas. The victim was also covered with a blanket and had his hands tied up and his face covered. 1 fatality.

On 3 September 2025, in Tula de Allende, Hidalgo, armed individuals in a vehicle shot at the vehicle on a local judge in Colonia Iturbide (drive-by). The judge was shot and injured. His vehicle also crashed after the attack.

On 4 September 2025, in Campo El Diez, Sinaloa, armed individuals in a vehicle intercepted a man and shot and killed him while chasing him through the city (drive-by). The perpetrators were suspected members los Los Mayitos and the victim was identified as a leader los Los Chapitos. 1 fatality.

On 4 September 2025, in Ciudad de Mexico - Iztapalapa, according to witnesses, two armed men on a motorcycle opened fire and shot a man and a woman at a food stand in Colonia San Juan Xalpa (drive-by). Both were injured as a result. 2 injured.

Around 4 September 2025 (as reported), in Hermosillo, Sonora, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of violence and torture and tied to a tree in fraccionamiento Quintas del Sol. 1 fatality.

Around 4 September 2025 (month of), in San Nicolas de los Garza, Nuevo Leon, a man was killed and his body was found inside a rented room in the downtown area with signs of violence and with his hands and feet tied with a cable. 1 fatality. The body was in a state of decomposition. 1 fatality.
Around 4 September 2025 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a woman was killed and her body was found in Colonia Villas del Prado with a message next to her body. 1 fatality.
Around 4 September 2025 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a man was killed and his body was found inside a vehicle with a message next to his body in colonia Castillo. 1 fatality.

On 5 September 2025, in San Sebastian de Aparicio, Puebla, two armed individuals on a motorcycle intercepted a man and shot him several times (drive-by) while he was inside a car wash. The man, who had a criminal record for fraud, died. 1 fatality.

notes: On 5 September 2025, in Xochiapa, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, armed men opened fire at the mayor of the PRI-PAN-PRD parties coalition as she was leaving the municipal palace on her way home. The mayor's bodyguards (likely municipal police officers) shot back at the men who fled the scene in a van. The van was later found in a neighboring municipality. This is the second attack towards the mayor in 2025, the first was recorded on 4 July in Oaxaca (coded separately). There were no casualties.

The bar had been shot on 30 August 2025 (unknown circumstances). 3 fatalities.

On 30 August 2025, in Tlaquepaque, Jalisco, according to witnesses, individuals in a van shot and killed two people who travelled on a motorcycle in the intersection of Chamela and Rincon de Guayabitos streets, in colonia Lopez Mateos of Villa Alfarera (drive-by). Suspectedly the victims were armed, since they had carried out an attack against police officers earlier the same day in fraccionamiento Revolucion (coded separately). 2 fatalities.

On 30 August 2025, in Tlaquepaque, Jalisco, two unidentified individuals shot at municipal police officers who were patrolling in fraccionamiento Revolucion. The perpetrators were killed in an attack carried out later the same day (coded separately). Casualties unknown.
On 30 August 2025, in Ciudad Nezahualcoyotl, Mexico, two individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in colonia Las Aguilas (drive-by). 1 fatality.

source: El Norte; El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste
notes: Around 30 August 2025 (as reported), in El Pinole, Sinaloa, two men were killed and their bodies were found with signs of torture, gunshot wounds and along with a narco message signed by Los Chapitos Gang. 2 fatalities.

Three gang members were arrested in the house. At least 1 fatality.

On 31 August 2025, in Tijuana, Baja California, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals shot at a security guard and another man inside an Oxxo store in the intersection of Centenarios and Halcon streets, in colonia Cuauhtemoc. One of the victims died and the other was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

On 31 August 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, several individuals stopped their vehicle in front of a house and shot at it in the intersection of Eufrasia Pantoja and Josefina Camarena streets, in colonia Leon II. A man who was inside was injured. 1 injured.

On 31 August 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in the intersection of Josefina Camarena and Eufrasia Pantoja streets, in colonia Leon II (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 31 August 2025, in Tlalnepantla, Mexico, according to witnesses, men on a motorcycle shot and killed three men outside El Primo seafood restaurant on Miguel Hidalgo street, in colonia Tequexquinahuac (drive-by). Also in Tlalnepantla, according to witnesses, men on a motorcycle shot and killed four men on Club de Excursionistas Rieleros street, in colonia Lazaro Cardenas (drive-by). 7 fatalities.

On 31 August 2025, in Morelia, Michoacan de Ocampo, at least two individuals shot and injured a person at Bodega Aurrera store on Torreon Nuevo avenue, in colonia El Realito. Two of the perpetrators were arrested. 1 injured.

On 31 August 2025, in Tres Marias, Morelos, unidentified individuals suspectedly aboard a vehicle shot and killed a man and two boys on Independencia avenue (drive-by). The man had links with criminal groups in the area and had been involved in fuel theft (huachicol) and illegal logging. According to the resident, all the victims were members of the same family, and the two boys were collateral victims. 3 fatalities.
On 31 August 2025, in Tepeaca, Puebla, according to witnesses, men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man who was driving in the community of La Purificacion Candelaria (drive-by). 1 fatality.

source: 8 Columnas; El Proceso; El Sol de Sinaloa; La Jornada; Milenio; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 31 August 2025, in Aguaruto, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, several individuals abducted a municipal councilor from a El Pirata coconuts and seafood store, that he owned. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

Around 31 August 2025 (as reported), in La Primavera, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture and hanging from a metal fence on the facade of a house in front of the road to Las Aguamitas. 1 fatality.

source: El Blog del Narco; El Sol de Sinaloa; Milenio; Noroeste
notes: On 31 August 2025, around Tecolotes, Sinaloa, members of Los Chapitos and Los Mayitos gangs clashed in the area around the towns of Tecolotes, Caminaguato and Agua Calentita. 12 people died. 12 fatalities.

Around 31 August 2025 (as reported), in Rio Seco, Tabasco, a man was killed and his body was found with the hands tied, signs of torture and gunshot wounds on the road that leads to Cardenas-Huimanguillo federal road. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 31 August 2025 (as reported), in San Juan Villa Rica, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture and trauma wounds. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 31 August 2025, in Entabladero, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, two individuals shot and killed a well known local vendor outside his house. The victim had received unspecified threated on social media during the previous year. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 31 August 2025 (as reported), in Huichinal Chila Perez, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, a man and a woman were killed and their bodies were found gagged and with a gunshot in the back of the head ('tiro de gracia') in the community of Lagartos. 2 fatalities.

On 1 September 2025, in Guerrero Negro, Baja California Sur, according to security cameras footage, three men shot and killed a man when he left his house. The victim was the sibling of a woman who belonged to a fishing cooperative and was extorted by gang members. The authorities had denied her requests for permanent security and she had suffered previous aggressions, included the abduction of relatives and attacks against her house and vehicle (unknown circumstances). 1 fatality.

Around 1 September 2025 (as reported), in Ciudad de Mexico - Coyoacan, a man was killed and his body was found with the hands and feet tied on Pensilvania street, in colonia Barrio San Luchas. 1 fatality.

location: Ciudad de Mexico - Gustavo A. Madero
source: El Norte; La Jornada; La Verdad
notes: On 1 September 2025, in Ciudad de Mexico - Gustavo A. Madero, according to witnesses, an unidentified individual shot and killed a man and then fled on a motorcycle driven by an accomplice in the intersection of 563 and Eje 3 Norte avenues, in colonia San Juan de Aragon. 1 fatality.

Around 1 September 2025 (as reported), in Ciudad de Mexico - Iztapalapa, two individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed two people and injured four outside a party hall in colonia Pueblo de Santa Cruz Meyehualco (drive-by). Three men were arrested, including a boy. 2 fatalities, 4 injured.
On 1 September 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two men shot and killed a woman and injured a man in their house on Gaseoducto avenue, in Ciudad Industrial. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

Around 1 September 2025 (as reported), in Santiago de Anaya, Hidalgo, a man was killed and his body was found partially burned, with the hands tied and a gunshot wound in the head next to a vehicle that was set on fire in colonia Gonzalez Ortega. 1 fatality.
Around 1 September 2025 (as reported), in El Salto, Jalisco, a woman was killed and her body was found inside a bag in a stormwater channel in colonia Jose el Quince. 1 fatality.

Around 1 September 2025 (as reported), in Tultitlan de Mariano Escobedo, Mexico, a man was killed and his body was found with the hands and feet tied, signs of torture and wrapped in a blanket in the intersection of Tucan and Avestruz streets, in colonia Ampliacion Las Torres. 1 fatality.

Around 1 September 2025 (as reported), in Zamora de Hidalgo, Michoacan de Ocampo, a farmer was killed and his body was found with a gunshot wound in the head, the hands tied and covered with a blanket in his house on Lazaro Cardenas street, in colonia Lazaro Cardenas. 1 fatality.

On 1 September 2025, in Garcia, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in the intersection of Rio Armeria and Rio Maya streets, in sector Rios (drive-by). 1 fatality.
Around 1 September 2025 (as reported), in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in plastic on Camino al Diente street, in colonia Flor de Piedra. 1 fatality.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Milenio; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 1 September 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals shot and killed an off-duty municipal police officer on Monte Athos street, in fraccionamiento Villa Bonita. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 11 September 2025, in Tuxpan, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals abducted a man who wore a uniform of the Federal Commission of Electricity (CFE) in the intersection of Benito Juarez avenue and Hernandez y Hernandez street, in colonia Centro. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

Around 11 September 2025 (between 10 September - 12 September), in San Ignacio, Sinaloa, according to victims, armed individuals abducted an off-duty state police officer on 10 September. The body was found on 12 September in San Ignacio on the Culiacan-Mazatlan highway near Elota wrapped in a plastic bag. 1 fatality.

On 11 September 2025, in Irapuato, Guanajuato, armed men abducted a woman from her house in colonia Las Carmelitas. Her relatives were at the scene and remained uninjured. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; La Silla Rota; Quadratin Oaxaca; Riodoce
notes: On 11 September 2025, near Caminaguato, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals used drones to launch at least four explosive devices at military and state police officers. The officers where heading to Cominaguato to recover the bodies of two people who were killed days earlier (unknown circumstances). There were no casualties.

On 9 September 2025, in Chandio, Michoacan de Ocampo, unknown armed individuals launched an improvised explosive device from a drone at municipal police officers. The officers arrived at the place to attend a report of a burned car believed to be linked to a previous clash between rival armed groups (coded separately). The explosive device detonated but there were no casualties.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; La Silla Rota; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 12 September 2025, in the area between La Reforma and Caminaguato, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals clashed with officers of the military, the municipal and state polices and the Federal Attorney General's Office, leaving two individuals dead. During the clash, the use of drones was reported. The officers were heading to Caminaguato to recover the bodies of two people who were murdered three days earlier (unknown circumstances). A similar operation was suspended the previous day due to a drone attack against the authorities in Caminaguato (coded separately). 2 fatalities.

On 9 September 2025, in El Carrizal Grande, Guanajuato, unknown armed individuals opened fire at municipal police and military officers who arrived to the community to carry out a search. The clash spread toward the highway between Carrizal Grande and the North free highway. There were no casualties.

source: Antena San Luis; El Norte; Milenio; Quadratin Oaxaca; Sintesis
notes: On 10 September 2025, in Amozoc de Mota, Puebla, unknown armed individuals opened fire at officers of the Public Security Secretariat (SSP) and the Navy when they responded to an emergency on the Puebla-Tehuacan highway, in the neighborhood of San Miguel. One lieutenant who acted as the Secretary of Public Safety was injured and one armed individual was killed in the clash. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

On 12 September 2025, in Cuernavaca, Morelos, unidentified individuals shot at police agents and military officers. The authorities chased the perpetrators along Plan de Ayala avenue and colonia Satelite. An alternative version indicated that the attack was carried out with sticks and stones. Casualties unknown.

On 12 September 2025, in Montemorelos, Nuevo Leon, unidentified individuals shot at municipal police officers next to the Pilon river, in the area known as El Puente Amarillo, in colonia Ladrillera. The officers shot back and killed two men. 2 fatalities.

On 12 September 2025, in Apatzingan de la Constitucion, Michoacan de Ocampo, unidentified individuals clashed with Civil Guard and municipal police officers in colonia Morelos. The individuals fled. There were no casualties.

Around 11 September 2025 (as reported), in Higueras, Nuevo Leon, unidentified individuals shot at state police and National Guard officers. The officers shot back and seized three firearms and tactical equipment. Casualties unknown.

On 8 September 2025, in El Zacate, Nuevo Leon, armed men traveling in several cars opened fire at state police officers who shot back. After the clash, members of the military force and the National Guard joined and state police officers and chased the armed men to a deserted part of the city where another clash took place. Three armed individuals were killed as a result. 3 fatalities.

On 9 September 2025, in Cienega de Flores, Nuevo Leon, armed men shot at state police officers who were conducting an operation on the Laredo highway at KM 45. One officer was injured and transported to the hospital. 1 injured.

source: La Jornada; La Voz de Michoacan; Milenio; MiMorelia
notes: Around 11 September 2025 (as reported), in Vista Hermosa de Negrete, Michoacan de Ocampo, unidentified individuals shot and killed a Civil Guard officer and injured two others on km. 391 of Vista Hermosa-La Barca road. The officers shot back, arrested one of the perpetrators and seized a firearm and a vehicle. 1 fatality, 2 injured.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 11 September 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals chased and shot a state police officer who was driving an armored van across sectors Los Pinos and Nuevo Culiacan. The officer crashed his vehicle into a house in colonia Nuevo Culiacan, where the attackers killed him. He worked as a bodyguard at the Directorate of Protection Services. 1 fatality.

On 7 September 2025, in Mazatlan, Sinaloa, armed men engaged in an armed clash in Colonia Real Pacifico. Police officers were sent to the neighborhood and arrested two men together with weapons, ammunition and a second vehicle. There were no armed interactions between the men and the officers. There were no casualties.

Around 9 September 2025 (as reported), in Chandio, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed rival groups engaged in an armed clash. One burned pick up truck was found believed to be linked to the clash. Casualties unknown.

Around 11 September 2025 (as reported), in Sataya, Sinaloa, suspected gang members shot at military, state police and municipal police officers on the road to El Castillo. The officers shot back and found and released two women who had been abducted. The officers also seized six firearms and two vans. Casualties unknown.

On 8 September 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, members of an armed group traveling in a vehicle shot at state police officers conducting surveillance in Colonia Humaya and then fled the scene (drive-by). Police officers chased the armed men and then crashed with them. One of the armed men was injured and the rest of them were arrested. 1 injured.

On 9 September 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, organized criminal groups engaged in an armed clash in Colonia Emiliano Zapata in front of a school. One abandoned home was damaged with bullet holes. There were no casualties.

Around 11 September 2025 (as reported), between Los Naranjos and Agua de la Canada, Michoacan de Ocampo, a man was killed and his body was found dismembered and with a message signed by the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG) on Los Naranjos-Agua de la Canada road. 1 fatality.

On 11 September 2025, in Tierra Blanca, Oaxaca, suspected members of the Independent Movement of Triqui Unification and Struggle (MULTI) (coded as Mixtec Indigenous militia) shot indiscriminately at the Tierra Blanca community and killed a man. The victim was a member of the Movement of Triqui Unification and Struggle (MULT). Suspectedly the perpetrators sought to intimidate the members of this community. 1 fatality.

On 9 September 2025, in San Jacinto Amilpas, Oaxaca, unknown armed individuals opened fire and shot at a man driving his car in Colonia Azteca. The man crashed into the wall of the home. The victim died and was identified as the former head of the Fines and sanctions department of the Ministry of Mobility. 1 fatality.

On 9 September 2025, near Querendaro, Michoacan de Ocampo, unknown armed individuals attacked and shot public servants who were traveling on the Querendaro-Maravatio highway. Two public servants were found inside a vehicle which had flat tires, broken windows and several bullet holes. Both individuals were safe and were transported to the Querendaro municipal hall. Police received reports of attempted theft related to the attack, although this was not confirmed and it is being investigated since the area is being disputed by several armed groups. There were no casualties.

source: El Heraldo de Chiapas; La Jornada; La Verdad
notes: On 10 September 2025, in Rio Grande, Chiapas, an Indigenous ejido representative who had been elected by Indigenous uses and customs was killed and his body was found. According to residents, members of an opposition group killed him. Following the attack, a group of people set a roadblock and prevented the authorities from entering the area. Following a conversation, they granted them access and the body was transferred to the forensic services. 1 fatality.

On 11 September 2025, in Dos Montes, Tabasco, two individuals shot and killed a transgender man at Los 4 Vientos alcohol beverages store, on Tomas Garrido street. The attack was suspectedly linked to extortion, although it was not confirmed whether the victim worked or owned the store where it took place. 1 fatality.

On 8 September 2025, in Jonacatepec, Morelos, two armed individuals on a motorcycle pulled up to a man and shot him while he was heading to lunch. The victim was identified as the administrative director of Public Safety (police officer) traveling in an official vehicle with the logo of Civil Protection near Colonia Las Pilas. 1 fatality.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Quadratin Oaxaca; Riodoce
notes: On 12 September 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unidentified men shot at a motorcycle garage on Josefa Ortiz de Dominguez avenue, in colonia Agrarista Mexicana. A man died and two men and a woman were injured. One of the injured men was an off-duty state police officer. 1 fatality, 3 injured.
On 7 September 2025, in Morelia, Michoacan de Ocampo, two men shot and killed a taxi driver in his house on Pino street, in colonia Loma Dorada. The perpetrators were arrested. 1 fatality.
On 11 September 2025, in San Francisco de Campeche, Campeche, two men shot and injured two women in La Oficina bar, on Ciriaco Vazquez street, in the neighborhood of Guadalupe. 2 injured.
On 9 September 2025, in Tijuana, Baja California, two armed men dressed in black shot a man in Colonia Infonavit Presidentes and then fled the scene. The man was injured as a result. 1 injured.

On 9 September 2025, in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, armed men broke into a home in Colonia Ponce de Leon and tortured a couple with a knife. The man's ears were cut off and the woman had stab wounds to her body. Both survived and were transported to the hospital. 2 injured.

On 9 September 2025, in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, four armed men attacked, beat and shot a man in the center. The man was injured as a result. The four men were caught on surveillance cameras during the attack and fled in a vehicle. 1 injured.

On 12 September 2025, in San Quintin, Baja California, according to the victim, four men shot at a man in colonia Pinos de Madrid 2. The target victim fled and was not injured, but his vehicle was damaged. There were no casualties.

On 12 September 2025, in Ciudad General Escobedo, Nuevo Leon, men who travelled in two vehicles entered a house and shot and injured two men in the intersection of Loma de la Paz and Loma de Agua Dulce streets, in colonia Colinas del Topo Chico. 2 injured.
On 7 September 2025, in Zapopan, Jalisco, two armed men who arrived on a motorcycle approached a man while he was repairing his motorcycle and shot and killed him in Colonia Cabanitas. 1 fatality.

On 8 September 2025, in San Felipe, Baja California, three men shot a man four times killing him in Los Arcos. The victim was the grandson of a searching mother and was arriving at his grandmother's home when he was shot. The searching mother had requested protection measures after receiving threats from armed groups, asking her to stop looking for her son. The perpetrators were arrested. 1 fatality.
Around 8 September 2025 (as reported), in Santa Maria Coronango, Puebla, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in a plastic bag in Colonia Misiones de San Francisco. 1 fatality.
Around 9 September 2025 (as reported), in Los Tanques, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture on the Culiacan-Mazatlan highway at KM 105. 1 fatality.

On 9 September 2025, in Hermosillo, Sonora, two armed individuals entered a home in Colonia Insurgentes and shot a man to death. The victim had a criminal record for offenses against public health. 1 fatality.
Around 10 September 2025 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, one person was killed and the human remains were found inside a plastic bag in Colonia Alborada. 1 fatality.

On 10 September 2025, in Tarimbaro, Michoacan de Ocampo, according to witnesses, several armed men entered a bar on the Morelia-Salamanca highway near Colonia Francisco Villa and shot at two people. One man died as a result and a girl was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

On 10 September 2025, in Carmen, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, armed men pulled up in a car and then entered a home in Colonia Buena Vista and shot at people inside. One man died and another was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injured.
Around 10 September 2025 (as reported), in Laguna de San Pedro, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found beaten to death and partially covered with a blanket. 1 fatality.

On 10 September 2025, in Tijuana, Baja California, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals shot and killed a man at a game machines establishment in the intersection of Sanchez Taboada and Cruz del Sur avenues, in colonia Sanchez Taboada. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
source: Imagen del Golfo; La Silla Rota; Milenio
notes: Around 11 September 2025 (as reported), near Maltrata, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds, signs of torture and wrapped in blankets and inside bags 500 meters from the town, on km. 252 of Fitosanitaria de Balastrera-Libramiento de la Estancia section of 150D Orizaba-Puebla highway. The victim was the sibling of the Director of Tourism of Nogales, who had been reported as disappeared. 1 fatality.
Around 12 September 2025 (as reported), in Ensenada, Baja California, two men shot and killed a man in San Diego hotel, in the intersection of 11 and Riverol streets. 1 fatality.

Around 12 September 2025 (as reported), in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in blankets on Cerro de los Milagros street, in colonia Arboledas de los Castillos. 1 fatality.

Around 12 September 2025 (as reported), in Tlajomulco de Zuniga, Jalisco, several men shot and injured a man and his son in a ranch on Las Violetas 2, in colonia Jardines de la Calera. The man died while seeking medical assistance at the International Airport of Guadalajara. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

On 12 September 2025, in Los Reyes de Juarez, Puebla, according to witnesses, a group of unidentified individuals knocked the door of a house and shot and killed the man who opened it in the community of Concordia de Aquiles Serdan. 1 fatality.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; La Silla Rota; Riodoce
notes: Around 12 September 2025 (as reported), in La Campana, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in blankets. 1 fatality.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; La Silla Rota; Riodoce
notes: Around 12 September 2025 (as reported), in Laguna de Canachi, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in rubber on km. 114 of Culiacan-Mazatlan road. 1 fatality.
Around 12 September 2025 (as reported), in the municipality of Elota, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found in a bag on km. 112 of Culiacan-Mazatlan road. 1 fatality.

Around 9 September 2025 (as reported), in San Juan del Rio, Queretaro, two men were killed and their bodies were found with signs of torture and gunshot wounds on the side of a road. A third man was found alive inside a vehicle with gunshot wounds and was transported to the hospital. The victims are suspected of having been kidnapped. 2 fatalities, 1 injured.

On 10 September 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, several armed men arrived in Colonia Progreso and shot a man to death in his makeshift home. Also in Culiacan, a group of armed men chased a man and shot him several times in Colonia Bellavista until he died in an alley. 2 fatalities.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 10 September 2025, in Angel R. Cabada, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, according to witnesses, armed men intercepted a man and a woman who were on a motorcycle and shot both of them on the federal highway 180. Both died as a result. 2 fatalities.

On 10 September 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, two men on a motorcycle arrived to San Gaspare Bertoni street, in colonia Villas de San Nicolas II, and one of them entered a house and shot and killed a man. The victim's daughter was injured. Also in Leon, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals shot and killed a man in the intersection of Madre Fabiola and Madre Elena streets, in colonia 10 de Mayo. 2 fatalities, 1 injured.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; La Silla Rota; Quadratin Oaxaca; Riodoce
notes: On 12 September 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals shot at two men in a house in colonia Miguel Aleman. The victims tried to flee, and the perpetrators killed them in separate locations. One of the bodies was found in an underground parking in Ley square, and the other in a house on Aquiles Serdan avenue. Also in Culiacan, an armed group shot at six men in a grocery store next to Humberto Gomez Campana market, in colonia Providencia. Three of the victims died and the rest were injured. According to local reports, the store was operating as a clandestine mini-casinos where unlicensed slot machines operate, often linked to illicit activities and recently targeted amid clashes between factions of the Cartel de Sinaloa. 5 fatalities.

On 9 September 2025, near Zinapecuaro de Figueroa, Michoacan de Ocampo, several armed individuals in a vehicle intercepted two priests at the junction Zinapecuaro-Querendaro and shot them (drive-by). Both priests survived and one of them was shot in his leg. The victims drove to Morelia to the hospital. 1 injured.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 10 September 2025, in Coxquihui, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, unknown armed individuals launched drones with three explosives. Two of the explosives fell near a school and the third near the home of the PAN mayor-elect, which was the target of the attack. There were also gunshots heard near the school, students and teacher where at the school at the moment of the attack. There were no casualties.

source: La Jornada; La Silla Rota; La Verdad; Milenio; Zona Franca
notes: On 10 September 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to a witness, armed men on a motorcycle approached a man at a gas station and shot him several times in Colonia Fracciones de Mesa de Medina (drive-by). The man died as a result. The victim was identified as a lawyer and coordinator of the Oral trial stage in Leon who worked for the Public Defender's office. According to the authorities, the attack was not related to his job. A man was arrested. 1 fatality.

On 10 September 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed men in a vehicle intercepted a taxi driver and shot him in Colonia Guadalupe Victoria (drive-by). The taxi driver lost control and crashed and died. 1 fatality.

On 12 September 2025, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a taxi driver who was driving in the intersection of Monte Everest and Monte Olivo streets, in colonia Praderas de Costa Azul (drive-by). 1 fatality.

Around 12 September 2025 (as reported), in Cuernavaca, Morelos, according to witnesses, two individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a taxi driver on Paraiso street, in colonia Milpillas (drive-by). The perpetrators left a narco message that accused him of stealing vehicles. 1 fatality.
Around 10 September 2025 (as reported), in Jarillas, Zacatecas, suspected members of a criminal group kidnapped a woman, tortured her and then shot her to death. 1 fatality.

Around 10 September 2025 (between 10 - 11 September), in San Pedro El Saucito, Sonora, a woman was killed and her body was found with gunshot wounds and the head covered by a piece of clothing on Romulo Cordova street. Armed men had abducted the victim from her house in Hermosillo on 10 September 2025 and her body was found on 11 September 2025. The attack suspectedly is related to a conflict over properties inherited by the woman and a debt linked to drug trafficking. 1 fatality.

On 11 September 2025, in Tijuana, Baja California, several men shot and killed a woman in her house on Arquimedes street, in colonia Camino Verde. The perpetrators tied her hands and stabbed a threatening message in her back. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 11 September 2025, in Coatzacoalcos, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, according to witnesses, two individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a woman near Terraplen market (drive-by). 1 fatality.

source: El Universal (Mexico); La Silla Rota; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 12 September 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals shot and killed a woman in her house in the intersection of Enrique Perez Arce and Ernesto Damy streets, in colonia Plutarco Elias. The victim's relatives witnessed the attack. 1 fatality.

On 12 September 2025, in the municipality of Cuautla, Morelos, individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a woman who was driving on Cuautla-Ex Hacienda El Hospital road (drive-by). The victim was the interim president of the Association of Users of Cuautla River (ASURCO), which brings together farmers to regulate the use of water in agricultural activities. The attack was suspectedly linked to internal disputes, since she was running as a candidate in the organization's elections scheduled for 28 September 2028. 1 fatality.

source: El Universal (Mexico); La Silla Rota; Milenio
notes: On 11 September 2025, in Penjamo, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals paired their vehicle to the vehicle of a female lawyer and shot and killed her in the intersection of Emiliano Carranza street and Conalep avenue, in colonia La Loma (drive-by). The victim also was the former director of Japama municipal water operator in Abasolo. 1 fatality.
On 8 September 2025, in San Francisco de Campeche, Campeche, two armed individuals on a motorcycle shot a man in Colonia Samula (drive-by). The man was injured as a result. 1 injured.

On 9 September 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, two armed men on a motorcycle shot and injured a man in Colonia Santa Maria del Granjero (drive-by). The men fled the scene. 1 injured.
Around 10 September 2025 (as reported), in Colima, Colima, a person was attacked and a dismembered human arm was found inside a plastic bag next to a kindergarten in Colonia El Mezcalito. 1 injured.

Around 11 September 2025 (as reported), in Ensenada, Baja California, an unspecified number of people was attacked and dismembered parts of their bodies were found next to Transpeninsular road by ejido Uruapan and in the intersection of Ruiz and Libramiento streets. At least 1 injured.
On 11 September 2025, in Ciudad Santa Catarina, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, two men on a motorcycle shot and injured a man on San Ildefonso street, in colonia Senderos (injured). 1 injured.

Around 8 September 2025 (as reported), in San Luis Rio Colorado, Sonora, a man was killed and his decapitated head was found in Colonia Libertad floating in the Mesa Arenosa canal. The body was not found. 1 fatality.

On 9 September 2025, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, according to witnesses, armed individuals in a car overtook a man driving his car on the Cayaco-Puerto Marques federal highway and shot at him repeatedly (drive-by). The man died as a result. 1 fatality.

Suspectedly, the attack is related to disputes between two criminal groups for the control of the area. Also, local reported that the perpetrators are suspected members of the CRAC policia comunitaria which was links with Los Ardillos gang, although this was not confirmed. 2 fatalities, 4 injured.

source: La Jornada; Milenio; Mural; Reforma; Sintesis
notes: Around 9 September 2025 (between 8 - 10 September), in Oriente Medio Dia, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, unidentified individuals kidnapped a former Morena candidate for municipal president of Coxquihui and killed him. The abduction took place in Sabaneta on 8 September 2025 and his body was found along with the body of another man in Oriente Medio Dia on 10 September 2025. Both victims were dismembered and next to an unspecified (narco) message. The victim had replaced his father as candidate during the last elections on 1 June 2025, after he was killed at the campaign kick-off event on 29 April (coded separately). The victim ran in alliance with the Green Ecologist Party of Mexico. Local media claimed that the guards of the victim tried to prevent the kidnapping, but were unable to repel the attackers. The victim had previously received threats. 2 fatalities.
On 8 September 2025, in Jiutepec, Morelos, according to witnesses, armed individuals shot and killed a man in colonia Jardin Juarez. The victim was a municipal police officer off-duty. 1 fatality.

On 7 September 2025, in El Tetuan Viejo, Sinaloa, there was an armed clash between armed individuals. Local media reported that the armed individuals were roaming around poblados de 5 de Mayo, El Limoncito, El Bolson and Bachimeto but ending clashing in El Tetuan Viejo, where they later clashed with the authorities (coded separately). Casualties unknown.

On 7 September 2025, in El Tetuan Viejo, Sinaloa, there was an armed clash between armed individuals and military officers, who arrived at the place following reports of a previous clash between rival armed groups (coded separately). One armed man was killed . Ten more were arrested. 1 fatality.
On 8 September 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, two armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in Colonia Infonavit Canadas (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 7 September 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in colonia Aquiles Serdan. This incident occurred amid a wave of violent attacks in Sinaloa state, likely related to the war between factions of the Sinaloa Cartel. 1 fatality.

notes: Around 6 September 2025 (between 30 August - 15 September), in Tijuana, Baja California, two National Guard officers were killed and their bodies were found with signs of torture and in an advanced state of decomposition in a house in the intersection of Revolucion and Carlos Rueda streets, in colonia Nido de Aguilas. One of them had a wire around the neck. The officers disappeared while being off-duty on 30 August 2025 and the bodies were found on 15 September 2025. A local criminal leader who was seen with the victims the day of their disappearance was arrested, which led to the house. 2 fatalities.
Around 17 September 2025 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in a tarp with a message in colonia Valle Verde. 1 fatality.

notes: Around 14 September 2025 (as reported), in Morenitos, Jalisco, four men and two women were killed, and their bodies were found wrapped in blankets and plastic bags. Some of the victims had their heads covered. The bodies were found on the 16th, and according to state authorities, they were suspected of being killed in Zacatecas and moved there. According to the Jalisco Attorney General's Office, at least one of the dismembered victims found in Pinos on 14 September (coded separately) matches those abandoned in Ojuelos. The authorities in Zacatecas deny this version and say that no bodies were found in Los Pinos after responding to the residents' report. 6 fatalities.

On 5 September 2025, in Tlaquepaque, Jalisco, a man deceived four women and transported them in a van to colonia Las Pomas, where he and two other individuals shot at them. Two victims died and two were injured. One of the perpetrators was arrested. 2 fatalities, 2 injured.

On 15 September 2025, in Zapopan, Jalisco, according to the victim, an individual in a vehicle shot and injured him in the intersection of 22 de Junio street and De los Deportes avenue, in colonia Jardines de los Belenes (drive-by). The victim was a boy. 1 injured.

Around 16 September 2025 (as reported), in Tecamac de Felipe Villanueva, Mexico, three men and two women abducted a boy. Police forces of the State Attorney General's Office, supported by the Ministry of National Defense, the National Guard, and the State Security Ministry, arrested the perpetrators and released the victim from a house in colonia Ojo de Agua.

Around 17 September 2025 (as reported), near Apatzingan de la Constitucion, Michoacan de Ocampo, according to a video, a National Guard officer beat and injured an indigent on the road to La Presa del Rosario in a suspected case of abuse of authority. 1 injured.

notes: On 17 September 2025, in San Andres Coru, Michoacan de Ocampo, unidentified individuals shot at military, National Guard and state police officers, who shot back and killed two individuals and injured an unspecified number of them. notes: On 19 September 2025, in Santa Maria Ahuacatitlan, Morelos, unidentified armed individuals shot at two people. One man was killed and the other one was injured. They were father and son. The son was the director of sports in Huitzilac, who is also the nephew of the Huitzilac Mayor. Some sources claim that it was a direct attack, while others suggest that the attack is suspected to have stemmed from an attempted assault. 1 fatality.

The event is related likely to the fight of gang for the control of drug dealing. 3 fatalities.
