source: El Norte; La Silla Rota; Milenio
notes: On 15 September 2025, in Benito Juarez, Nuevo Leon, according to videos and witnesses, four state police officers beat and injured a man who was consuming drugs in colonia Vistas del Rio, in a suspected case of abuse of authority. The man was injured and hospitalized, and the officers were suspended. 1 injured.
On 15 September 2025, in Lampazos, Nuevo Leon, according to the victim, unidentified individuals shot at the owner of a bar, who fled and remained uninjured. There were no casualties.
On 18 September 2025, in Mina, Nuevo Leon, there was an armed clash between the municipal police and armed individuals travelling in four vehicles. There were no casualties.

On 17 September 2025, in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed the owner (drive-by) of a barber shop in Colonia San Bernabe. The place is known to be a drug dealing point. 1 fatality.
On 17 September 2025, in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, two men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in the intersection of Colegio Civil and 5 de Mayo streets (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 16 September 2025, in San Martin Texmelucan de Labastida, Puebla, two men shot at municipal police officers who ordered them to stop at a checkpoint. The officers chased and arrested them. Casualties unknown.
On 17 September 2025, in Jose Maria Morelos, Quintana Roo, four armed individuals wearing tactical clothes entered a house and kidnapped a man. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

On 16 September 2025, in the municipality of Badiraguato, Sinaloa, gang members clashed, detonated explosives and set (narco) roadblocks around the communities of La Sabila, San Jose del Llano and Soyatita. Casualties unknown.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: Around 16 September 2025 (as reported), in San Jose del Llano, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wound and burned in a house that was set on fire in the community of La Sabila. 1 fatality.

On 19 September 2025, in Concordia, Sinaloa, there was an armed clash between armed individuals and military officers during a patrol on the Mazatlan-Durango highway around Copala. One man was arrested.

On 18 September 2025, in Costa Rica, Sinaloa, there was an armed clash between armed individuals. This event was replicated in Licenciado Benito Juarez (coded separately). At least six people were injured during the two clashes with stray bullets, including a 4-year-old minor.

source: El Siglo de Durango; El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: Around 18 September 2025 (between 16 - 21 September), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, armed individuals abducted two men and a woman from a house in the intersection of Desierto de las Palmas and Monte Alban streets, in fraccionamiento Santa Rocio, on 16 September 2025. During the abduction, the perpetrators tortured them. On 21 September 2025, they shot and killed two of the victims on Luis Gonzalez Urbina street, in colonia Bachigualato. The third victim's whereabouts are unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 16 September 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals shot at military officers around the General Hospital, on the road to Imala. The officers chased the attackers, but they got to flee. There were no casualties.

On 16 September 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, two men on a motorcycle approached and shot and killed a transexual woman from a short distance outside her house in colonia Nuevo Bachigualato. 1 fatality.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 17 September 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals shot and killed a man who was working at Irma beer store in the intersection of Navidad and Gardenia boulevards, in fraccionamiento Terranova. This attack is likely linked to the ongoing wave of violence caused by the conflict within the Sinaloa Cartel. 1 fatality.

On 17 September 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals shot and killed a man in the intersection of Laureles avenue and Oso street, in colonias Las Cascadas. 1 fatality.

On 18 September 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals kidnapped a man in sector Portalegre. The same day the authorities rescued the man and arrested two perpetrators. In another event, armed individuals kidnapped a man in fraccionamiento Loma Bonita, in sector Ferrocarrilera. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

On 18 September 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, several armed men in vehicles shot and killed two men in Colonia Mazatlan. One of the victims was killed when the perpetrators attacked a warehouse used as a storeroom for a party furniture rental business, while the other attack occurred in front of a chicken business. Also, an unknown number of people were shot and injured. 2 fatalities.
On 19 September 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, two armed men on a motorcycle shot (drive-by) at two people in Colonia Buenas Aires. One man was killed and another one was injured. 1 fatality.

On 19 September 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a group of armed individuals shot and killed a man in colonia Francisco Alarcon. This incident occurred amid a wave of violent attacks in Sinaloa state, likely related to the war between factions of the Sinaloa Cartel. 1 fatality.

On 16 September 2025, in Mazatlan, Sinaloa, men on two motorcycles shot and launched explosives at a house in the intersection of Cuernavaca and Monterrey streets, in colonia Jaripillo (drive-by). A man was killed and a woman was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

Around 18 September 2025 (as reported), in Pericos, Sinaloa, three people were killed and their bodies were found semi-naked with their hands and feet tied up and gunshot wounds on the way to Dique Mariquita. According to the authorities, the three victims were wearing green military-style tactical clothing. 3 fatalities.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Quadratin Oaxaca; Riodoce
notes: Around 16 September 2025 (as reported), between La Sinaloa and La Michoacana, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds and next to a (narco) message on the path between the communities of La Sinaloa and La Michoacana. 1 fatality.
On 16 September 2025, in Las Trancas, Sinaloa, navy officers clashed with a group of men in a narco camp on Paul Moreno street. A man was killed and three were arrested. 1 fatality.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Milenio; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 16 September 2025, around Licenciado Benito Juarez, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, suspected gang members aboard at least 20 vehicles clashed in the area around Licenciado Benito Juarez, Culiacancito, El Tamarindo, Culiacan and La Palma. During the clash, the suspected gangs abducted several people, whose whereabouts are unknown. Officers of the army, the navy and the state police arrived at the scene and clashed with the suspected gangs, among whom one died and eight were arrested. The authorities seized 10 firearms, four vehicles (one of them armored) and tactical equipment, and defused two IEDs. 1 fatality.

On 18 September 2025, in Licenciado Benito Juarez, Sinaloa, there was an armed clash between armed individuals. This event was replicated in Costa Rica (coded separately). At least six people were injured during the two clashes with stray bullets, including a 4-year-old minor.
Around 19 September 2025 (as reported), in El Rosario, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a blanket on the road to Ponce community. 1 fatality.

On 19 September 2025, in Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, according to witnesses, armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a man while driving his bicycle in a drive-by in colonia Aves del Castillo. 1 fatality.

On 16 September 2025, in Empalme, Sonora, a man shot at state police officers who ordered him to stop in fraccionamiento Villa Dorada. The officers arrested him. One of the officers was injured. 1 injured.
Around 15 September 2025 (as reported), in Hermosillo, Sonora, a person was killed and the body was found burned inside a vehicle in sector Las Arboledas. 1 fatality.
On 17 September 2025, in Hermosillo, Sonora, armed individuals entered a house and shot and injured a man in Colonia Adolfo Lopez Mateo. The house was known to be a drug dealing point.
On 18 September 2025, in Hermosillo, Sonora, armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and injured a man in a drive-by in Colonia Agualurca. 1 injured.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); Diario de Morelos; El Norte; El Proceso; Entorno Informativo; La Prensa de Monclova; La Silla Rota; La Verdad; Milenio; MiMorelia; Sintesis
notes: Around 15 September 2025 (as reported), in the municipality of San Luis Rio Colorado, Sonora, a well known boxer was killed and his body was found wrapped in blankets on the road to the Gulf of Santa Clara. 1 fatality.
On 19 September 2025, in Boqueron 1er seccion, Tabasco, according to witnesses, armed individuals in a vehicle intercepted a bus on his way to Villahermosa and shot and killed the driver. 1 fatality.

Around 17 September 2025 (as reported), in Villahermosa, Tabasco, men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man at the tire repair shop where he worked on 27 de Febrero avenue, in colonia Atasta de Serra (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 18 September 2025, in Amatitan, Tabasco, armed individuals shot and killed a man and a man inside a hotel named 'Troyan'. One of the victims was the owner of a funeral service. Days earlier, armed men had broken into the victim's home firing shots after failing to locate her. 2 fatalities.

Around 17 September 2025 (as reported), in Pomoca, Tabasco, three women were shot and killed inside a house in fraccionamiento Valle Real by two men who arrived on a motorcycle. One of the victims was a girl, and it is suspected that one of the victims was pregnant. 3 fatalities.

On 18 September 2025, in Paraiso, Tabasco, an armed man entered a store and shot and injured the owner in Ejido Chapultepec. The victim had previously been asked to 'pay the fee floor'. This event is suspected to be related to extortion. 1 injured.

Around 17 September 2025 (as reported), in Ciudad Miguel Aleman, Tamaulipas, unidentified individuals shot and launched explosives at Civil Guard officers. The officers shot back and chased the attackers to colonia Montebello, where they seized an abandoned armored van, firearms, tactical equipment and objects to puncture tires ('ponchallantas'). Casualties unknown.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 17 September 2025 (as reported), between El Aguaje and La Bocana, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in blankets next to El Aguaje-La Bocana road. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 16 September 2025 (as reported), in Carrizal, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, two women were killed and their bodies were found in their house. The victims were sisters, and they were sisters-in-law of a municipal police officer who had a dispute with municipal authorities and had been pressured to quit. 2 fatalities.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 18 September 2025, in Poza Rica de Hidalgo, Veracruz, armed individuals shot at the municipal police during a police patrol in Colonia Cazones. There were no casualties.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
source: El Universal (Mexico); Imagen del Golfo; La Jornada; La Silla Rota; La Verdad
notes: On 17 September 2025, near Xochiapa, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, unidentified men shot and killed two men in a block factory near Tuxtepec-Palomares road. One of the victims was an indigenous man and former municipal president of the Morena party from 2018 to 2021. He also ran as a municipal candidate of the PT in 2025. He owned the factory where the attack took place, while the other victim was an employee. 2 fatalities.

On 13 September 2025, in Ochomitas, Guanajuato, unknown armed individuals shot at municipal police officers and the National Guard who shot back. One armed individual was killed and one municipal police officer and one National Guard officer were injured. 1 fatality, 2 injured.

On 14 September 2025, in San Nicolas de Carretas, Chihuahua, a fight broke out that led to a shooting between opposing criminal groups at a dance. One of the lines of investigation into this event pointed to a dispute between opposing organized crime groups. Six people were killed and 9 were injured, including one off-duty police officer and two sons of the former mayor of Gran Morelos. 6 fatalities, 9 injured.

Around 13 September 2025 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, an unknown number of people were killed and their human remains were found inside plastic bags in a vehicle on Boulevard 2000. Unspecified fatalities coded to 3.

Around 13 September 2025 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, an unknown number of people were killed and their human remains were found inside a bucket at the Pacific Industrial park with a banner containing threats towards police officers for protecting a suspected criminal. Unspecified fatalities coded to 3.

On 14 September 2025, in Mexicali, Baja California, unknown armed individuals shot at a group of people at a house in Colonia Xochimilco. Two men and a woman were killed and another woman was injured. A banner was found near Ejido Pueblo making reference to the attack and directed at Los Rusos Gang. 3 fatalities, 1 injured.
On 13 September 2025, in Tijuana, Baja California, two armed men dressed in black shot and killed a 16-year-old boy after a quarrel (motive unknown) outside a bar in the downtown area. 1 fatality.
On 14 September 2025, in Tlaquepaque, Jalisco, individuals on a motorcycle intercepted a couple and shot them (drive-by). One man died and the other person was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

On 14 September 2025, in Zapopan, Jalisco, four men intercepted and shot a state attorney General's office agent in Colonia Arcos more than 30 times. The victim was injured as a result. It is unclear whether the agent was on duty or why he was at the location. 1 injured.

Around 13 September 2025 (as reported), in San Lucas El Grande, Puebla, two people were killed and their bodies were found in a field. One of the victims had a bag over the head and both hands tied while the other was wrapped in blankets. Both bore signs of torture. 2 fatalities.
Around 13 September 2025 (as reported), in La Luz Texas, Guanajuato, a man was killed and his body was found tied and with gunshot wounds outside a cattle shed. 1 fatality.

Around 13 September 2025 (as reported), in Las Penitas, Guanajuato, three men were killed and their dismembered bodies were found at the entrance to the community including a torso, limbs and three heads wrapped in tape. In the town center, two more torsos and body remains were found. 3 fatalities.

On 12 September 2025, in Ciudad de Mexico - Coyoacan, suspected criminal gangs opened fire and shot at municipal police officers. During the clash, a man was killed and another man was injured. A woman, suspected of being the head of a criminal group, and her son were arrested. 1 fatality.

On 14 September 2025, in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, unknown armed individuals intercepted a man and shot him at least three times (drive-by) in Colonia Industrial. The driver crashed and was injured as a result. 1 injured.

On 12 September 2025, in Tula de Allende, Hidalgo, unknown armed individuals opened fire at officers of the Criminal Investigation agency in Colonia Xochitlan de las Flores who shot back . Three people were arrested and one was killed as a result. 1 fatality.

On 14 September 2025, in Guadalupe, Nuevo Leon, unknown armed men broke into a home and shot and killed couple in their bed in Colonia Canada Blanca. The building is known for the sale of drugs and the attacks is suspected to be linked to the settling of scores. 2 fatalities.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); La Jornada; La Voz de Michoacan; Milenio; MiMorelia
notes: On 14 September 2025, in Uruapan, Michoacan de Ocampo, at least four unidentified individuals shot at municipal police officers at a vehicle checkpoint on Industrial boulevard . One of the officers died. Three men were arrested and the authorities seized methamphetamine. 1 fatality.
Around 13 September 2025 (as reported), in Cuautla, Morelos, a woman was killed and her body was found burned inside a vehicle in Colonia Morelos. 1 fatality.

source: El Proceso; El Sol de Acapulco; La Silla Rota
notes: On 14 September 2025, near Paso Morelos, Guerrero, unknown armed individuals shot and killed the police commissioner of Tuzantlan while he was driving his truck between Paso Morelos to Huitzuco at a point known as Los Timbres. The man (likely off-duty) was accompanied by three women, who were injured in the attack. 1 fatality, 3 injured.

On 14 September 2025, in Licenciado Alfredo Valdez Montoya, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, unknown armed individuals opened fire from a vehicle and shot a man at the basketball courts of the city (drive-by). The man fled into a supermarket where he was killed. 1 fatality.

Around 14 September 2025 (between 13 September - 14 September), in El Castillo, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found on 14 September next to an irrigation canal with his hands and feet tied and his face covered with tape. The man was kidnapped on 13 September from his home. 1 fatality.

Around 14 September 2025 (as reported), in Culiacancito, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his tied body was found decapitated and with signs of torture next to the Antonio Rosales irrigation canal near El Alto. A message (content unknown) was found next to the body. 1 fatality.

On 13 September 2025, near Playa las Aguilas, Sinaloa, unknown armed individuals shot a woman driving together with her family over the Nuevo Altata bridge. The woman was shot in the face and died. The family was on their way from Isla Cortes. During the attack, the security booth was also shot several times, injuring one security guard. Another woman was also and transported to the hospital. 1 fatality, 2 injured.

On 13 September 2025, in La Curva de San Pedro, Sinaloa, unknown armed individuals shot at officers of municipal police officers who shot back. One person was arrested and one was injured as a result. 1 injured.

On 13 September 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unknown armed individuals traveling in a vehicle shot at a couple and then fled the scene (drive-by) in Colonia Benito Juarez. One woman died and one man was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Zeta Tijuana
notes: On 15 September 2025, in Tijuana, Baja California, according to witnesses, armed individuals shot and killed a man in Colonia Sanchez Toboada and then fled the scene. 1 fatality.

On 15 September 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, armed individuals in a vehicle pulled up to two men on a motorcycle and shot them both in Colonia Barranca del Refugio (drive-by). One man died and the other was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

On 13 September 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, armed men in a vehicle shot at a woman on the street in Colonia Valle de la Luz (drive-by). The woman was injured as a result.
On 14 September 2025, in Santa Rosa de Muzquiz, Colima, according to witnesses, several armed men beat and stabbed a man on his way home in Colonia Las Misiones. The man died as a result. 1 fatality.
On 15 September 2025, in Cuauhtemoc, Colima, armed individuals approached a man and shot him repeatedly. The man died as a result. 1 fatality.
On 14 September 2025, in Zamora de Hidalgo, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed individuals intercepted a wake and shot at a group of people outside a funeral home. Three people were injured.

Around 14 September 2025 (between 13 - 15 September), in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, a man was killed and his body was found dismembered in Analco park. Next to the body was a shoebox was found with a human tongue inside with a banner signed by La Familia Michoacana. The victim was abducted from colonia Diez de Mayo on 13 September 2025 and his body was found on 15 September 2025. Another man and a woman were abducted together with the victim, whose whereabouts are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 15 September 2025, in Tepeaca, Puebla, four armed men intercepted a police patrol car in Colonia San Diego and shot the officers. One officer died and another was injured as a result. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

On 14 September 2025, in Tehuacan, Puebla, two men on a motorcycle intercepted and shot at a family driving in a car. A father and his baby were killed in the attack (drive-by). The attack is being linked to the conflict between the criminal groups Las Burras and Los Casas. 2 fatalities.
On 12 September 2025, in Mazatlan, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, armed men in a pickup shot a man in Colonia Juarez. The man died as a result. 1 fatality.

On 13 September 2025, in Santiago Tetlapayac, Hidalgo, armed individuals engaged in an armed clash with police officers and military officers. According to witnesses, the clash lasted several minutes and several officers were seen searching the area. One person is suspected to be injured and another was arrested. At least 1 injured.

On 13 September 2025, in Penjamo, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, two armed men on a motorcycle passed by and shot seven bricklayers who were preparing the mixture to work on a property in Colonias El Tolento y El Beltran (drive-by). The armed men passed a second time to shoot at the men again. Two men died and five were injured. 2 fatalities, 5 injured.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 12 September 2025, in Tuxpan, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, according to witnesses, armed individuals arrived at El Pre nightclub in Colonia Centro and shot and killed the entrance guard. The armed individuals then entered the nightclub and shot at employees, threw a grenade and injured two employees. According to one source, the event is related to a dispute between gangs. 1 fatality, 2 injured.

On 15 September 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, two men on a motorcycle approached a man in Colonia San Isidro leaving for work. One of the men got off the motorcycle and shot the victim repeatedly. The man died as a result. 1 fatality.

On 15 September 2025, in Guadalupe de los Reyes, Sinaloa, unknown armed individuals shot at the Navy, the military and the National Guard while they were carrying out a patrol. The officers shot back and were able to seize weapons, drugs, tactical equipment, plates, vests and magazine holders. There were no casualties.

Around 14 September 2025, near Pinos, Zacatecas, four men and one woman were killed and their bodies were found dismembered and their remains scattered on the road on the highway connecting between Pinos and Ojuelos. 5 fatalities.

On 14 September 2025, in the municipality of Tolosa, Sinaloa, armed individuals shot at officers of the Navy who shot back in Tolosa. The Navy located a warehouse used as a camp by organized crime between Tosala and El Chaco. Also, armed individuals shot at officers of the Navy who shot back in Chalco. The Navy located and seized a warehouse in San Ignacio used as a camp to manufacture improvised explosive devices. There were no casualties.

Around 11 September 2025 (between 11 September - 12 September), in Los Mochis, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture and beatings after he was brought to the hospital by civilians. The man was kidnapped on 11 September and found on 12 September alive. 1 fatality.

On 15 September 2025, in Irapuato, Guanajuato, two men who arrived on a motorcycle entered a barbershop in Colonia Los Angeles and shot four men inside (unknown whether they were employees or not) before fleeing. All four were injured. 4 injured.

On 13 September 2025, in Tazumbos, Jalisco, unknown armed individuals launched an unspecified number of drones with explosives killing a boy and injuring a man while they were working in a papaya orchard. 1 fatality, 1 injured.
On 13 September 2025, in La Cuchilla, Michoacan de Ocampo, an antipersonnel landmine exploded in a lemon orchard injuring two lemon cutters. One man's leg was amputated later at the hospital.

On 15 September 2025, in Irapuato, Guanajuato, armed men broke into a home, kidnapped two men in Colonia Lucio Cabanas, then set fire to the home and shot into the air. It is suspected that one of the victims is a taxi driver. The whereabouts of both men remain unknown.
Around 15 September 2025 (as reported), in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, a man was killed and dismembered body parts were found inside three suitcases in Colonia Industrial. 1 fatality.

On 13 September 2025, near San Pedro Zacachimalpa, Puebla, two armed men on a motorcycle intercepted the former auxiliary president (party unknown) and recent candidate for reelection and shot him multiple times on the road to San Baltazar Tetela. The victim was injured and transported to the hospital.

On 13 September 2025, near Ejido la Flor, Sinaloa, unknown armed individuals traveling on the highway 20 shot at more than one home and local businesses between Villa Juarez and Ejido La Flor. One security guard was killed and found lying in the agricultural field he worked on in La Flor. 1 fatality.

On 15 September 2025, near Pueblo Nuevo, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, for a second consecutive day, there was an armed clash between armed rival groups on La Cruz-Potrerillos del Norte road. The clash began the day before (coded separately) and continued until the early hours of the following day. During the clashes, there were also at least two (narco) roadblocks, one of them involving a stolen trailer. Casualties unknown.

On 14 September 2025, near Pueblo Nuevo, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, there was an armed clash between armed rival groups on La Cruz-Potrerillos del Norte road. The clash began during the night and continued until the early hours of the following day (coded separately). During the clashes, there were also at least two (narco) roadblocks, one of them involving a stolen trailer. Casualties unknown.
On 13 September 2025, in the municipality of Guadalupe y Calvo, Chihuahua, according to witnesses, armed groups engaged in an armed clash for several hours. Casualties unknown.

On 14 September 2025, near Santiago Amoltepec, Oaxaca, members of Zaniza Communal Militia shot at residents from Santiago Amoltepec who entered a disputed agrarian area near Rio Algodon. They also abducted one of them, whose whereabouts are unknown. Armed members of both communities clashed the day after (coded separately). There were no casualties.

On 15 September 2025, near Santa Maria Zaniza, Oaxaca, residents of Santiago Amoltepec entered the community near Rio Ciruelo and attacked community members of Santa Maria Zaniza as a result of the abduction of a community member the day before. An armed clash took place, leading to the injury of two individuals who were later transported to the hospital. As a result, residents of Santa Maria Zaniza blocked the entrance to Santiago Amoltepec. The dispute is linked to an agrarian land dispute between the two communities over territory and communal property boundaries. 2 injured.

On 15 September 2025, in Santiago Amoltepec, Oaxaca , members of Zaniza and Santiago Amoltepec communal militias clashed due to a dispute over land that included an armed attack the day before (coded separately). A person died, and another was injured. Residents of Santa Maria Zaniza set up a roadblock to prevent access to the city after the clash. The dispute is linked to an agrarian land dispute between the two communities over territory and communal property boundaries. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

On 22 September 2025, in Tlalnepantla, Mexico, four hooded individuals entered a store, threatened a person and kidnapped a 17-year-old boy in Colonia Santa Maria Tlayacampa. On 25 September, police officers located and rescued the victim, arrested two men and seized marihuana and cocaine.

On 24 September 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unknown armed individuals kidnapped a man and his son in Colonia Las Vegas. Unofficial reports suggest that the father was an active agent of the federal government's Secretariat of Security and Citizen Protection, although this was not confirmed. The whereabouts of both men remain unknown.

location: Ciudad de Mexico - Cuajimalpa de Morelos
notes: On 26 September 2025, in Ciudad de Mexico - Cuajimalpa de Morelos, two people kidnapped a man in Colonia San Pablo. The police arrived and located an injured man inside the trunk of a car who had repeated calls to demand money the day before. Police officers also arrested two individuals who were suspected of involvement.

On 23 September 2025, in Ciudad Victoria, Tamaulipas, there was an armed clash between the state police and armed individuals. The armed men threw metallic stars known as tire spikes onto the asphalt. One officer was injured.

source: La Jornada; La Silla Rota; Riodoce
notes: On 23 September 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unidentified armed individuals shot at the vehicle where the woman president of the state DIF (National Institute of Public Security) was on the Culiacan-Eldorado highway. The victim, who was also the granddaughter of the Governor, was with state police officers assigned as bodyguards who fired back. During the clash, two officers were injured, and a bus was shot at. The woman was not injured. After the clash, the body of a man who was shot and killed was found on the hills from where the shots came from. According to the authorities, the victim is suspected of being one of the perpetrators. It is unclear whether this was a direct attack or an attempted robbery. 1 fatality.
On 23 September 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, there was an armed clash between armed individuals in colonia Antonio Rosales. Casualties unknown.
On 23 September 2025, in Doctor Coss, Nuevo Leon, there was an armed clash between the state police and armed individuals during a police patrol. Two armed men were killed. 2 fatalities.
On 24 September 2025, in Cuauhtemoc, Colima, unidentified individuals shot and injured a woman in the city center. The victim is a ministerial police officer.

source: El Sol de Acapulco; La Jornada
notes: On 24 September 2025, in Rincon de Alcaparrosa, Guerrero, members of Los Tlacos Gang entered the community controlled by Los Ardillos Gang and engaged in an armed clash. Four people were killed and their bodies were found burned on top of a vehicle and wearing police style clothing. 4 fatalities.
On 24 September 2025, in San Roque, Guanajuato, an armed man shot at the municipal police. The police fired back and injured the armed man. He was taken to the hospital and arrested.

On 25 September 2025, in Mina, Nuevo Leon, unknown armed individuals shot at state police officers who were conducting surveillance. The state police officers shot back killing three armed individuals. 3 fatalities.

On 25 September 2025, in Tiquicheo, Michoacan de Ocampo, several armed individuals opened fire and shot at state police officers who shot back at the individuals on the Limon de Papatzindan-Purungeo highway. One officer was injured and one armed individual was killed as a result. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

On 26 September 2025, in Ciudad Rio Bravo, Tamaulipas, armed men traveling in a vehicle shot at state police officers in Colonia Santa Apolonia. The officers shot back and killed three men. 3 fatalities.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; La Silla Rota; Noroeste
notes: On 26 September 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals shot at municipal and state police officers near the Bacurimi cemetery on the highway to Culiacanito. The police officers shot back. Two officers and two armed individuals were injured resulting in their arrest. 4 injured.

Around 18 September 2025 (as reported), in Santa Eulalia, Chihuahua, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds and wrapped in a blanket between Colonias Punta Oriente and Portal del Valle. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
source: La Jornada; La Silla Rota; Milenio
notes: On 22 September 2025, in Alamo, Veracruz, according to witnesses, armed individuals entered a bar and shot and killed a man on Avenida Independencia. notes: Around 17 September 2025 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a woman dressed as a nurse injected a detained member of Los Chapitos gang at Dr. Bernardo J. Gastelum Hospital. The woman was arrested with two more substances that can be harmful when administered together. The woman was likely a gang member, since gangs have previously used medical uniforms to conduct attacks in hospitals in Culiacan, and it is presumed that she tried to kill the man. There were no casualties.

notes: On 22 September 2025, in Zirahuen, Michoacan de Ocampo, members of the Michoacan New Generation Cartel (CMNG) shot at state police officers who were carrying out an operation to arrest a member of the cartel. The officers shot back and searched the area, where they located and dismantled six narco camps. Following the clash, gang members looted vehicles to set (narco) roadblocks on Patzcuaro-Uruapan, Patzcuaro-Erongaricuaro and Quiroga-Zacapu roads and other municipalities (coded separately). Casualties unknown.

source: La Silla Rota; Milenio; Quadratin Oaxaca; Zona Franca
notes: On 22 September 2025, in Celaya, Guanajuato, individuals in a van shot at National Guard officers in the intersection of Adolfo Lopez Mateos boulevard and Allende street (drive-by). The officers shot back, killed an individual and injured and arrested another. An officer was also injured. 1 fatality, 2 injured.

Around 22 September 2025 (as reported), in Reynosa, Tamaulipas, a person was killed and the dismembered body was found inside a plastic bag and a suitcase in the intersection of Gaseoducto Pemex street and Central avenue, in colonia Granjas Economicas. 1 fatality.

source: 8 Columnas; AFP; El Norte; El Proceso; El Sol de Sinaloa; El Universal (Mexico); La Jornada; La Prensa de Monclova; La Silla Rota; Milenio; MiMorelia; SDP Noticias; Sintesis; Zeta Tijuana
notes: Around 16 September 2025 (between 16 - 17 September), in Cocotitlan, Mexico, two Colombians singers were killed and their bodies were found dismembered, wrapped in plastics and with a narco message signed by La Familia Michoacana Cartel. The victims had disappeared when they attended a gym in colonia Polanco, Ciudad de Mexico, on 16 September 2025. The bodies were found on 17 September 2025. A total of 16 people were arrested. According to investigations, one of the musicians had a debt with a subject dedicated to drug distribution and the organization of private events called Uncensored Parties. 2 fatalities.

On 22 September 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, two men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man when he was leaving his blacksmith's shop on Presa El Palote street, in colonia Rivera de la Presa (drive-by). The victim's sibling had also been killed in a house on the same street on 29 August 2025 (coded separately). 1 fatality.

Around 22 September 2025 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a person was killed and the body was found with the hands and feet tied on Cerro Colorado street, in colonia Mariano Matamoros. 1 fatality.
On 22 September 2025, near San Miguel Almoloyan, Mexico, an individual shot at municipal police officers who chased him. The officers shot back and killed him. 1 fatality.

Around 22 September 2025 (as reported), in Comederito, Guanajuato, an unspecified number of people was killed and their bodies were found in at least five bags. Unspecified number of fatalities coded as 3.

On 22 September 2025, in Irapuato, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals shot at three clients at El Oasis de la Cruz restaurant. Two of the victims died and the other was injured. 2 fatalities, 1 injured.
Around 22 September 2025 (as reported), in Guadalajara, Jalisco, a woman was killed and her body was found burned in a vehicle that was set on fire on Acueducto y Tierra de Honor avenue. 1 fatality.

On 21 September 2025, in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed two women (suspectedly, mother and daughter) on Metano street, in colonia Las Pedreras Fomerrey 106 (drive-by). One of the victims was suspectedly pregnant. 2 fatalities.

On 21 September 2025, in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, a group of men got off a vehicle and shot and killed two men in the intersection of 25 de Abril and Graneros streets, in colonia Fomerrey 1 La Reforma. 2 fatalities.

On 21 September 2025, in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, an individual on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in the intersection of Bernardo Reyes and Palacio de Justicia avenues, in colonia Constituyentes del 57 (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 22 September 2025, in Irapuato, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, an individual shot at people at Fuent's poulterer, on Los Reyes avenue, colonia El Cantador, and then fled on a motorcycle driven by an accomplice. The owner of the establishment and an employee died, and another employee was injured. The woman who died was pregnant. 2 fatalities.

On 19 September 2025, in Irapuato, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, a group of men shot at three men in a house in the intersection of Presidencia de la Republica and IMSS streets, in colonia 18 de Agosto. A man died and two were injured. 1 fatality, 2 injured.

On 7 September 2025, in Cortazar, Guanajuato, four municipal police officers arrested five people and handled them to an unspecified gang on Salvatierra-Cortazar road. Three of the victims were found alive and the two others' whereabouts are unknown. The police officers were arrested.

On 1 October 2025, in Playas de Rosarito, Baja California, unknown armed men in a car shot the driver of a funeral home van in Colonia Lucio Blanco while he was waiting for his son outside the school (drive-by). The man was injured as a result.

On 29 September 2025, in Tijuana, Baja California, at least four individuals kidnapped a man and took him to an abandoned home in Colonia Urbi Villa del Prado. Police officers were notified about the situation and arrived at the home. The man was released and four people were arrested.

Around 30 September 2025 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in a blanket, with both hands and feet tied and with a message next to the body in Colonia Maclovio Rojas. The body was thrown from a moving car. 1 fatality.
On 30 September 2025, in Tijuana, Baja California, according to witnesses, armed individuals shot and injured a woman was traveling in her car in Colonia El Mirador.

Around 1 October 2025 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a person was killed and the body was found tied, partially covered by a blanket and with signs of violence in Colonia Mariano Matamoros. 1 fatality.

On 1 October 2025, in Tijuana, Baja California, a group of individuals killed an off-duty municipal police officer in his house in colonia Paseos del Vergel. One of the perpetrators was arrested the day after, and the authorities seized drugs. 1 fatality.

Around 2 October 2025 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals shot and killed a man in a house in the intersection of Articulo 2 and Zapata streets, in colonia Maclovio Rojas. 1 fatality.

Around 2 September 2025 (month of), in Kikab, Campeche, a man was killed and his body was found in an advanced state of decomposition, with a gunshot wound in the head and along with a narco message on Campeche-Centenario-Lubna road. 1 fatality.

source: El Heraldo de Chiapas; El Proceso; La Jornada; Milenio
notes: On 3 October 2025, between Cintalapa de Figueroa and Ocozocoautla, Chiapas, unidentified individuals ambushed and shot at a vehicle on Las Flores bridge, on Cintalapa-Ocozocoautla road, whose passengers shot back. Two people died and two were injured. One of the victims had just been released from El Amate prison. 2 fatalities, 2 injured.

On 3 October 2025, in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, according to witnesses, at least a man and a woman engaged in an armed clash on Catedral de Zamora street, in colonia La Haciendita, and abandoned two vehicles with gunshot damages. Casualties unknown.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); El Norte; Imagen del Golfo; Quadratin Oaxaca; Tiempo
notes: On 1 October 2025, in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals shot and killed four men in colonia Revolucion Mexicana. One of the victims was an off-duty National Guard officer. 4 fatalities.

On 29 September 2025, in Ciudad de Mexico - Miguel Hidalgo, two armed men intercepted a well known stylist outside one of the stylists' establishments in Colonia Polanco and one of them shot and killed and victim. 1 fatality.

On 1 October 2025, in Ciudad de Mexico - Tlalpan, two unknown armed men shot at an off-duty investigative police officer who was accompanied by a minor in Colonia Heroes de Padierna. The man was injured as a result.

Around 28 September 2025, in Ciudad de Mexico - Venustiano Carranza, unknown armed individuals shot dead at a man in Colonia Ampliacion. The victim is a former member of the Fuerza Anti Union gang who left the gang to commit crimes and deal drugs on his own. It is suspected that he was killed by the Fuerza Anti Union gang because he left the gang. 1 fatality.

Around 1 October 2025 (as reported), in Colima, Colima, an unknown number of people were killed and human remains were found inside a plastic bag in the downtown area. Unspecified number of fatalities coded as 3.
Around 2 October 2025 (as reported), in Camotlan de Miraflores, Colima, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds and signs of torture on Punta de Agua road. 1 fatality.

On 29 September 2025, in Gomez Palacio, Durango, two armed individuals approached two men and one of them pulled out a weapon and shot them outside a convenience store in Colonia Manila. Both were injured as a result. 2 injured.

Around 2 October 2025 (as reported), in Chamacuaro, Guanajuato, a man and a woman were killed and their bodies were found dismembered next to the railways. The man had been reported missing earlier the same day. 2 fatalities.
Around 3 October 2025 (as reported), in Apaseo el Alto, Guanajuato, two men shot and killed a municipal employee who had just volunteered to referee a football match. 1 fatality.

On 2 October 2025, in Irapuato, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, armed individuals abducted a businessman from his house on Enrique Colunga street, in colonia San Gabriel Segunda Seccion. The victim's relatives were at the scene and remained uninjured. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

On 1 October 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals shot and killed a man and injured another in the intersection of Lago de Atoyac and Laguna del Carmen streets, in colonia Lomas de la Trinidad. Also in Leon, according to witnesses, a man shot and injured a man in colonia Jardines de Jerez and then fled the scene with accomplices inside a vehicle. 1 fatality, 2 injured.

On 1 October 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guerrero, two men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man on Bromo Street, in colonia Valle de Senora. According to neighbors, the victim had a history of drug dealing, and it is suspected that this may have been the motive for the attack. 1 fatality.

On 2 October 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, an individual in a van shot and injured a Colombian women who worked as moneylender in the intersection of Antonio Madrazo and Jose Maria Morelos boulevards, in colonia Real de San Jose (drive-by). The perpetrator was arrested. The woman died a day later. 1 fatality.

On 30 September 2025, in Pueblo Nuevo, Guanajuato, armed men shot at municipal police officers who arrived at the home of the former mayor after the property was shot at (coded separately). One woman officer was injured.

location: Los Organos de Juan R. Escudero
source: El Sol de Acapulco; Quadratin Guerrero
notes: Around 3 October 2025 (as reported), in Los Organos de Juan R. Escudero, Guerrero, a man was killed and his body was found with a tourniquet around the neck and signs of torture in the trunk of a collective taxi. According to witnesses, the taxi was abandoned by several armed men who fled in another vehicle. 1 fatality.

On 27 September 2025, in Chilpancingo de los Bravo, Guerrero, several armed individuals shot and killed a man inside his vehicle in a parking lot in Colonia Maria Dolores. The man was the driver of a chicken farm owner. 1 fatality.
On 3 October 2025, in Iguala de la Independencia, Guerrero, according to witnesses, two men on a motorcycle shot and injured a lawyer who was driving his van in colonia Centro (drive-by). 1 injured.

On 2 October 2025, in Mineral de la Reforma, Hidalgo, according to one of the victims, two men got off a van and shot and injured two men (father and son) on Haciendas avenue, in fraccionamiento Hacienda Margarita. 2 injured.

Around 2 October 2025 (as reported), in Tonala, Jalisco, according to witnesses, two hooded individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in the intersection of Rio Coatzacoalcos and Rio San Fernando, in fraccionamiento Urbi Quinta. 1 fatality.
On 29 September 2025, in Zapopan, Jalisco, according to witnesses, two armed men shot and killed a man in Colonia Arenales Tapatios and then fled the scene. 1 fatality.

On 1 October 2025, in Zapopan, Jalisco, according to witnesses, armed men on a motorcycle approached a man and shot him twice and then fled the scene in Colonia Girasoles Acueducto. The man died as a result. 1 fatality.

Around 2 October 2025 (as reported), in Zapopan, Jalisco, two individuals who arrived on a motorcycle shot and killed a man who was talking with a woman in Los Pinos park. The woman was not injured. The victim was a mail carrier for Correos de Mexico. 1 fatality.

On 2 October 2025, in Manzana Cuarta, Mexico, according to witnesses, two individuals on a motorcycle approached an off-duty state police officer and shot and killed him from a short distance. A woman who was with the victim remained uninjured. The officer worked for the General Directorate for Combating Vehicle and Transportation Theft. 1 fatality.
On 2 October 2025, in Ejido Jose Maria Morelos, Michoacan de Ocampo, unidentified individuals shot at municipal police officers, who shot back. The attackers fled. There were no casualties.

On 30 September 2025, in Morelia, Michoacan de Ocampo, three armed individuals opened fire and shot municipal and National Guard police officers in fraccionamiento Villas del Pedregal. The police officers were conducting surveillance and shot back at the individuals after attempting to stop them. Two officers were injured and one individual was arrested.

On 30 September 2025, near Uruapan, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed individuals involved in a prior clash (coded separately) shot at municipal, state and ministerial police officers on Cerro de la Cruz who shot back. Two people were released after they were kidnapped earlier at the bus station. Casualties unknown.

On 30 September 2025, in Uruapan, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed individuals entered a home and shot a man to death in Colonia Octubre. The victim was linked to extortion, car theft and drug dealing. The individuals then fled the scene and encountered municipal police officers with whom they clashed (coded separately). 1 fatality.

On 30 September 2025, in Uruapan, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed individuals shot at municipal police officers which led to a chase and officers shooting back in Colonia Vergel. Two officers were injured. The armed individuals escaped to Cerro de la Cruz where a second clash took place (coded separately). 2 injured.

On 1 October 2025, in Zamora de Hidalgo, Michoacan de Ocampo, members of Los Caballeros Templarios Gang shot at military and National Guard officers and agents of the State Attorney General's Office who responded to reports of a criminal camp and armed individuals in colonia Primero de Mayo. The officers shot back, killed three gang members and arrested four. All of them were minors except one. A camp used by the criminal group was also seized near Colonia 1 de mayo. 3 fatalities.
On 30 September 2025, near San Miguel Taimeo, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed individuals shot at ministerial police officers who shot back. There were no casualties.

source: Diario de Morelos; El Universal (Mexico); SDP Noticias
notes: On 2 October 2025, in Cuernavaca, Morelos, according to witnesses, individuals aboard an unspecified number of vehicles shot and killed a member of La Familia Michoacana Cartel and another person who were driving on Carlos Cuauglia street (drive-by). The gang member was the right hand of the cartel's leader in the area of Patios de la Estacion. 2 fatalities.
Around 30 September 2025 (as reported), in Huitzilac, Morelos, a person was killed and the body was found dismembered in Colonia La Palma near the Montecasino area. 1 fatality.

Around 2 October 2025 (as reported), in Jiutepec, Morelos, a man was killed and his body was found gagged and with the hands tied in an abandoned field on 12 Este street, in colonia Civac. 1 fatality.

On 3 October 2025, in Jiutepec, Morelos, according to witnesses, two men on a motorcycle shot at a man and a woman on Via del Ferrocarril street, in colonia El Campanario (drive-by). The woman died and the man was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injured.
On 30 September 2025, in Tejalpa, Morelos, according to witnesses, armed individuals shot and killed a man near a store. The perpetrators fled the scene without being captured. 1 fatality.

Around 1 October 2025 (as reported), in Yautepec de Zaragoza, Morelos, a man was killed and his body was found gagged and with a single gunshot wound in the back of the neck (likely 'tiro de gracia') next to the old path to Las Tetillas. 1 fatality.

Around 2 October 2025 (as reported), in Ciudad General Escobedo, Nuevo Leon, a man (suspectedly a boy) was killed and his body was found with a gunshot wound in the head (likely 'tiro de gracia') and the hands tied on km. 18 of Libramiento Noroeste road. 1 fatality.

On 3 October 2025, in Ciudad General Escobedo, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, two men shot and killed a woman in a house that was suspected to be a drug-selling point in the intersection of Juarez Avenue and Articulo 43 Street, in colonia Alianza Real, in the neighborhood of Durango. 1 fatality.

On 30 September 2025, in Guadalupe, Nuevo Leon, an armed individual entered a home and killed a man in Colonia 13 de mayo. Unofficially, the home is known as a drug sales point suggesting the attack is linked to the dispute over the sale of drugs. 1 fatality.
On 28 September 2025, in Benito Juarez, Nuevo Leon, two armed individuals entered a home and shot dead a man in Colonia Vistas while he was with another individual. 1 fatality.

On 2 October 2025, in Benito Juarez, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals abducted a man. Minutes later, they moved the victim to colonia Ejido Juarez and shot and killed him in the intersection of Benito Juarez and Privada Segunda streets. 1 fatality.

source: El Norte; La Prensa de Monclova; Milenio
notes: On 1 October 2025, in Los Ramones, Nuevo Leon, unidentified individuals and state police officers clashed. During the incident, the individuals launched objects to puncture tires ('ponchallantas'). The officers arrested nine individuals (including two boys) and seized 9 guns, 148 cartridges, 9 bulletproof vests, 173 doses of crystal meth, and 73 doses of marijuana . Casualties unknown.

On 3 October 2025, in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, two men shot at municipal police officers from the rooftops of stores on Aramberri street. The officers shot back, injured an individual and arrested between two and three. 1 injured.
On 3 October 2025, in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, criminal groups clashed on Olivos and Naranjos streets, in colonia Nogales. Casualties unknown.

On 3 October 2025, in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, unidentified individuals and state police officers clashed along Julio A. Roca avenue, in colonias Fomerrey 113 and CROC. A man was arrested. Casualties unknown.

Around 30 September 2025 (as reported), in Pesqueria, Nuevo Leon, a dismembered human finger was found at the Ojo de Agua recreational park and a leg was found inside the sewage treatment plant. At least 1 injured.
On 1 October 2025, in Ciudad Sabinas Hidalgo, Nuevo Leon, armed individuals shot at state police officers who shot back. The individuals managed to escape and there were no casualties.
On 2 October 2025, in Ciudad Sabinas Hidalgo, Nuevo Leon, unidentified individuals who travelled in four vans shot at state police officers, who shot back. Five officers were injured. 5 injured.
Around 30 September 2025 (as reported), near Ahuazotepec, Puebla, two men were killed and their bodies were found wrapped in plastic bags. 2 fatalities.

Around 15 September 2025 (as reported), in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, a man vendor was killed and his body was found in Analco park. A member of La Barredora Gang was arrested for his participation in his killing. 1 fatality.

Around 30 September 2025 (as reported), in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, a man was killed and his body was found inside his home with his hands and feet tied and with signs of violence in Colonia Campestre Mayorzago. It is unknown whether it was a direct attack or a robbery. 1 fatality.

Around 2 October 2025 (as reported), in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, a person was killed and the body was found with the hands and feet tied, gagged and inside a bag in a ravine in the intersection of 16 de Septiembre y la 7 Oriente streets, in colonia El Salvador. 1 fatality.

On 1 October 2025, in San Martin Texmelucan de Labastida, Puebla, according to witnesses, three men on a motorcycle chased and shot and killed two men (one of them minor) in colonia Los Volcanes. The authorities suspected that the attack was a setting of scores with a regional oil thief leader ('huachicolero'), due to suspected family ties between him and one of the victims. One of the perpetrators was also a minor. 2 fatalities.

On 2 October 2025, in San Salvador el Seco, Puebla, a man in a vehicle shot at a person, who shot back and killed him in the neighborhood of Tecamachalco. This clash suspectedly was a setting of scores between criminal groups. 1 fatality.

Around 3 October 2025 (as reported), in San Luis Potosi, San Luis Potosi, four boys who carried a fake firearm abducted two people in fraccionamiento El Aguaje. During the abduction, one of the victims was beaten, tried to flee by jumping off the vehicle, and died. The authorities arrested the perpetrators and released the other victim. 1 fatality.

notes: On 2 October 2025, in Aguaruto, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals shot at people who were playing volleyball, killing a man and injuring three. The man who died was an off-duty state police officer, and one of the injured was his father, a retired state police officer. 1 fatality, 3 injured.

On 1 October 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals shot at state police officers who ordered them to stop at a checkpoint in sector Infonavit Humaya. The individuals abandoned the car, which was later seized by Police officers from the Secretariat of Security and Citizen Protection (SSPC), and fled. There were no casualties.

source: E-Consulta; El Norte; El Proceso; El Sol de Sinaloa; El Universal (Mexico); La Jornada; La Prensa de Monclova; La Silla Rota; Noroeste; Quadratin Oaxaca; Riodoce; SDP Noticias
notes: On 3 October 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, military officers chased and clashed with four or five men along Alvaro Obregon avenue, in fraccionamiento Villa Bonita. One of the individuals died and three were injured and arrested. The individuals had just abducted an off-duty state police officer from his house in the intersection of Participacion Ciudadana and Mina Real de Catorce streets, in colonia Renato Vega Alvarado, who later died from injuries caused during the operation. Initial information claimed that he worked as bodyguard for the state governor's son, but it was later confirmed that he worked as a bodyguard at the government palace. 2 fatalities, 3 injured.
On 30 September 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unknown armed individuals on several motorcycles shot at a home in Colonia Lomas de San Isidro and killed three men. 3 fatalities.

Madero boulevard and Antonio Nakayama avenue, in colonia Miguel Hidalgo (drive-by). 1 fatality.

source: El Proceso; El Sol de Sinaloa; El Universal (Mexico); Noroeste; Quadratin Oaxaca; Riodoce
notes: Around 2 October 2025 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds in the head, the head covered by a piece of clothing, the hands tied with wire and wrapped in a blanket in fraccionamiento Villas del Rio. 1 fatality.

source: El Proceso; El Sol de Sinaloa; El Universal (Mexico); Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 2 October 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, men in a vehicle shot and killed a man on Monte Ararat street, in colonia Infonavit Solidaridad (drive-by). Lastly, according to witnesses, individuals in a vehicle shot at two underage siblings in Fiu Fiu park, in fraccionamiento Alturas del Sur (drive-by). One of them died and the other was injured. 3 fatalities, 1 injured.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Quadratin Oaxaca; Riodoce
notes: Around 3 October 2025 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds and partially burned in a vehicle that was set on fire in fraccionamiento Portalegre. 1 fatality.

Around 3 October 2025 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals shot and killed a man in a repair shop in fraccionamiento Las Cerezas. This attack is likely linked to the ongoing wave of violence due to the conflict within the Sinaloa Cartel. 1 fatality.
On 3 October 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, two men chased and shot and killed a man in fraccionamiento Hacienda Alameda. The victim's father witnessed the attack. 1 fatality.

Around 27 September 2025 (between 23 - 30 September), in Culiacancito, Sinaloa, a man was killed, and his body was found with his hands tied and on a dirt road in Bellavista with a message next to his body on 30 September. The man was reported missing on 23 September. 1 fatality.
On 2 October 2025, in El Tepuche, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals suspectedly used drones to launch explosives at houses. Casualties unknown.
On 30 September 2025, in El Tepuche, Sinaloa, armed individuals intercepted a family traveling in their vehicle and shot them (drive-by). Three people were injured including a girl.

On 29 September 2025, in La Guamuchilera, Sinaloa, at least six armed individuals shot at the Navy who shot back. One man crashed and died. Officers seized vehicles, tactical equipment, weapons, magazines, and other illegal items. 1 fatality.

On 30 September 2025, near Lo de Bartolo, Sinaloa, unknown armed individuals shot at federal police officers on patrol near Lo de Bartolo and La Guamuchilera. Police shot back and killed one armed individual, arrested three and seized weapons, cartridges, magazines, drugs and a vehicle. 1 fatality.

notes: On 2 October 2025, in Escuinapa de Hidalgo, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals suspectedly used drones to launch at least three explosives at the municipal police premises in the intersection of Francisco I. Madero and De la Juventud streets. There were no casualties.

On 1 October 2025, in Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, unknown armed individuals chased and shot at a car in Colonia Aves del Castilllo(drive-by). The car crashed and a man was killed. A boy who was also in the car was injured. A loaded gun and several wraps of Crystal meth were found inside the victims' car. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

Around 1 October 2025 (as reported), near Hermosillo, Sonora, a man was killed and his body was found near the ranch La Poza on the Hermosillo-Guaymas highway with signs of violence and a narco message. 1 fatality.
On 1 October 2025, in Hermosillo, Sonora, two armed men arrived at a home and shot and killed man as he was arriving in Colonia Villas del Sur. 1 fatality.
On 2 October 2025, in Hermosillo, Sonora, according to witnesses, a group of men got off a vehicle and shot and killed a man on Calzada Artesanos street, in colonia Adolfo de la Huerta. 1 fatality.
Around 2 October 2025 (as reported), in Hermosillo, Sonora, a man was killed and his body was found in a vehicle that was set on fire in fraccionamiento Haciendas del Sur. 1 fatality.

Around 1 October 2025 (as reported), in Cardenas, Tabasco, armed individuals intercepted a man and killed him in Colonia Progreso. A message was found next to his body directed at a criminal group. 1 fatality.

notes: On 1 October 2025, in Jalpa de Mendez, Tabasco, unidentified individuals in a vehicle shot and killed two women on Periferico road (drive-by). The perpetrators left a message signed by the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG). 2 fatalities.

source: El Proceso; El Universal (Mexico); La Jornada
notes: On 1 October 2025, in Guadalupe Victoria, Tabasco, unknown armed individuals ambushed and shot at officers of the National Guard. One officer was injured. 1 injured.

On 1 October 2025, in Macuspana, Tabasco, unidentified individuals ambushed and shot at National Guard officers in the area known as Tortuguero, in the community of Guadalupe Victoria. The officers shot back and injured and arrested an individual. An officer was also injured. 2 injured.

On 3 October 2025, near Alfredo V. Bonfil, Tamaulipas, armed individuals clashed with state police in Ejido Periquitos. The armed individuals had previously been seen in Colonia Lazaro Cardenas and were being sought by the police. After the clash, a chase ensued during which the armed individuals threw puncture tires ('ponchallantas'). The chase ended in La Llorona, where there was another clash. Casualties unknown.

source: E-Consulta; El Norte; La Jornada; La Prensa de Monclova; Milenio; Mural; Yucatan a la Mano
notes: Around 1 October 2025 (between 1 - 2 October), in San Miguel Contla, Tlaxcala, two men were killed and their bodies were found covered in lime along with a message that accused them of not paying money extortion fees. According to witnesses, armed individuals had abducted them from a house in the community of Belen Atzitzimititlan the day before. In the house, the perpetrators also stole their belongings. They were later arrested. 2 fatalities.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 1 October 2025 (as reported), in Agua Dulce, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, a person was killed and the body was found dismembered on the Coatzacoalcos-Villahermosa highway at KM 40. A message was found at the scene. 1 fatality.

notes: On 2 October 2025, between El Arenal and Sabanas de Xalostoc, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, unidentified individuals used drones to launch explosives in the area. Casualties unknown.

On 3 October 2025, in Sombrerete, Zacatecas, unidentified groups clashed. It is likely that gangs participated in the clash, as gang members later set (narco) roadblocks across the state in response to this incident (coded separately). Casualties unknown.
On 2 October 2025, in Tabasco, Zacatecas, unidentified individuals and state police officers clashed. An individual died and four were injured. 1 fatality, 4 injured.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 26 September 2025 (as reported), in Zomajapa, Veracruz, an unknown number of people were killed and the human remains were found inside a cooler with a message on the Zongolica-Comalapa highway. Unspecified number of fatalities coded as 3.

source: La Silla Rota; Milenio; Zona Franca
notes: On 27 September 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two armed men who arrived on a motorcycle shot at two men at a house in Colonia Villas de San Nicolas II. One source states that the event happened in Colonia Villas de San Juan. 1 fatality.

source: El Universal (Mexico); La Silla Rota; Riodoce
notes: On 27 September 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, there was an armed clash between the state police and armed individuals during a police patrol in fraccionamiento La Conquista. One police officer was injured and later died. An armed man was injured and arrested. 1 fatality.

On 27 September 2025, in Jesus Maria, Sinaloa, there was an armed clash between the state police and military against armed individuals during a police patrol on the road to Caminaguato. Three armed men were shot and killed. 3 fatalities.
Around 28 September 2025 (as reported), in Licenciado Benito Juarez, Sinaloa, a man was killed and the handcuffed body was found dismembered inside a plastic bag. 1 fatality.

On 28 September 2025, in Santa Maria Miramar, Michoacan, at least 100 armed members of the CJNG entered the community and shot at residents. Municipal community police officers went to help the residents and engage in an armed clash with the members of the cartel, repelling the attack. Residents claimed to have called the federal police for help, but received no response. The armed individuals set a (narco) roadblock on the Lazaro Cardenas-Colima highway after they took a public bus. This event was linked to other clashes in the state(coded separately).There were no fatalities.

On 28 September 2025, in El Ahijadero, Michoacan, at least 100 armed members of the CJNG entered the community and shot at residents. Municipal community police officers went to help the residents and engage in an armed clash with the members of the cartel, repelling the attack. Residents claimed to have called the federal police for help, but received no response. Three residents were killed. This event was linked to other clashes in the state(coded separately). 3 fatalities.

Around 26 September 2025 (as reported), in Ciudad de Mexico - Alvaro Obregon, a man was killed and the body was found blindfolded and with his hands tied up in colonia Jose Maria Pino Suarez. 1 fatality.

source: El Sol de Acapulco; El Universal (Mexico)
notes: On 28 September 2025, in Chilpancingo de los Bravo, Guerrero, armed men stopped a van on the Amojileca-Chilpancingo, the passengers were forces to disembark in Colonia Omiltemi. The men poured gasoline on it, and set it on fire. A woman and her eight-year-old granddaughter were caught in the flames and the woman suffered burns on her back.

On 28 September 2025, in Los Hoyos, Michoacan, armed groups from the Michoacan New Generation Cartel fired shots and launched explosives from drones at a military base. One Army member was killed and two others were wounded. The military fired back and used an armed helicopter. 1 fatality.

notes: Around 27 September 2025 (as reported), in Papantla de Olarte, Veracruz, a person was killed and only the head was found with a message in front of a the church San Isidro Labrador. 1 fatality.

notes: Around 27 September 2025 (as reported), in Cerro Azul, Veracruz, according to witnesses, several armed individuals shot and killed a taxi driver on Miguel Hidalgo Street. The victim was likely working as the attack occurred next to the taxi stand where the victim used to work. The victim was also a taxi leader of the Authentic Federation of Workers of the State of Veracruz. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 27 September 2025 (as reported), in Omealca, Veracruz, a person was killed and the body was found dismembered and wrapped in a blanket on the Omealca-Mata Tenatito highway around La Pochota and Dos Caminos area. 1 fatality.

Around 28 September 2025 (as reported), in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, a man was killed and the body was found inside a plastic barrel and with a rope around the neck in Colonia Ampliacion Unidad Proletaria. 1 fatality.

On 27 September 2025, in Penjamo, Guanajuato, armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by after they intercepted him in the city center. Two people were also shot and injured with stray bullets. One of the injured people is a ministerial police officer who was dressed in civil clothes. 1 fatality.

On 27 September 2025, in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, unidentified armed individuals shot and injured a man in Colonia La Alianza. Later, in another event, another man was also shot and injured by unidentified armed individuals, also in Colonia La Alianza. According to the investigations, these events are suspected to be related to drug dealing.

On 28 September 2025, in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, several armed men in a vehicle shot and killed a man in a drive-by when he was being search by the state police in Colonia Fomerrey. The police chased the armed men, who repelled the attack. Two police officers were injured and another two armed men were also injured. 20 people were arrested. 1 fatality, 4 Injured.

On 28 September 2025, in Guadalupe, Nuevo Leon, several members of the Cartel del Noreste in at least two vehicles shot at a group of people in colonia Tierra Propia (drive-by). A little girl was killed, and her mother was injured. Also, a municipal police officer was shot and injured. It is suspected that the attack was directed at police officers who were in the area, although other versions suggest that it was a direct attack on the women. Three men were arrested. 1 fatality, 2 injured.

Around 25 September 2025 (between 23 - 28 September), in Acatzingo de Hidalgo, Puebla, a man was killed and only the head was found with a narco message signed by Los Tepeacas Gang and Los Caltencos Gang. The message stated that this was due to the lack of a payment fee, while the authorities suspected that the attack was linked to the sale of a vehicle. The victim was a businessman who disappeared on 23 September, and his head was found on 28 September. 1 fatality.

On 28 September 2025, in Zapotan, Michoacan, there was an armed clash between suspected members of the CJNG and the community police of Coahuayana. This event is linked to other armed clashes in the municipality where at least 100 armed men members of the CJNG attacked the communities o El Ahijadero and Santa Maria Miramar (coded separately). Casualties unknown.
On 28 September 2025, in Irapuato, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, armed individuals entered a house and shot and killed two men in colonia 12 de Diciembre. 2 fatalities.
On 29 September 2025, in Tlajomulco de Zuniga, Jalisco, two armed men entered a house and shot and killed a man and injured another two in Fraccionamiento Casablanca. 1 fatality.
On 29 September 2025, in Celaya, Guanajuato, several armed men in a vehicle shot and killed an underage person in a drive-by after they intercepted him on Avenida Herminio Martinez. 1 fatality.

Around 29 September 2025 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a man was killed and the body was found with his hands and feet tied up, with signs of torture and a tourniquet in Colonia Vista Alegre. 1 fatality.

Around 27 September 2025 (as reported), in Carrizal de la Via, Guerrero, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in bags and tied around with rope on the Mexico-Acapulco highway. 1 fatality.

On 27 September 2025, in Guadalupe, Nuevo Leon, two armed men entered a house and shot ad killed a man and injured another one in Colonia Guerra. The house is a known drug dealing point. 1 fatality.

On 29 September 2025, in Villa Benito Juarez, Sinaloa, unidentified armed individuals shot at a beer expenditure. It is suspected that one person was shot and killed. This incident occurred amid a wave of violent attacks in Sinaloa state, likely related to the war between factions of the Sinaloa Cartel. 1 fatality.

On 29 September 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in the city center. This incident occurred amid a wave of violent attacks in Sinaloa state, likely related to the war between factions of the Sinaloa Cartel. 1 fatality.
Around 29 September 2025 (month of), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and the body was found in an advanced state of decomposition handcuffed in fraccionamiento Valle Alto. 1 fatality.

On 28 September 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unidentified armed individuals shot and injured two men in colonia Guadalupe. These incidents occurred amid a wave of violent attacks in Sinaloa state, likely related to the war between factions of the Sinaloa Cartel. 1 fatality.

On 28 September 2025, in Campo El Diez, Sinaloa, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man. This incident occurred amid a wave of violent attacks in Sinaloa state, likely related to the war between factions of the Sinaloa Cartel. 1 fatality.

On 28 September 2025, in Caminaguato, Sinaloa, there was an armed clash between armed individuals and the military officers during a patrol. Three armed men were killed. Weapons were seized, including an explosive device. 3 fatalities.
Around 28 September 2025 (as reported), in Villa Benito Juarez, Sinaloa, a person was attacked and only the hands and arms were found inside a vehicle. At least 1 injured.

On 28 September 2025, around Navolato, Sinaloa, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man on the Navolato-El Castillo. This incident occurred amid a wave of violent attacks in Sinaloa state, likely related to the war between factions of the Sinaloa Cartel. 1 fatality.
On 27 September 2025, in Las Bebelamas de Sataya, Sinaloa, two armed men shot and killed a man in his house. 1 fatality.

On 27 September 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals shot and killed a man in Colonia 5 de Mayo. The victim was an off-duty lawyer assigned to the Attorney General's Office of Angostura. 1 fatality.

Around 27 September 2025 (as reported), in Cosala, Sinaloa, a person was killed and the body was found dismembered and the parts were found inside a plastic bag in on the road to Casas Grandes. 1 fatality.
Around 26 September 2025 (as reported), in Villa Benito Juarez, Sinaloa, a man was killed and the body was found with signs of torture, and his feet tied up. 1 fatality.

notes: Around 28 September 2025 (as reported), around Coatepec, Veracruz, two men were killed and their bodies were found with the 'tiro de gracia' and signs of violence on the Coatepec-Jalcomulco highway. 2 fatalities.

notes: Around 26 September 2025 (as reported), in Cordoba, Veracruz, armed individuals shot and killed two men in colonia Nuevo Toxpan. The victims were drug dealers. 2 fatalities.

The victim is suspected to be the leader of a gang dedicated to cargo theft and other crimes. Some versions say that it was a settling of scores between criminal groups, although suicide has not been ruled out. 1 fatality.

Around 28 September 2025 (as reported), in Santa Maria Zacatepec, Puebla, two men were killed and their bodies were found inside a vehicle. One of the victims was a former state police officer. 2 fatalities.

On 28 September 2025, in Veracruz 1, Baja California, according to witnesses, armed men shot and killed a woman and injured two. 1 fatality.

Around 27 September 2025 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a member of Los Chapitos Gang was abducted by members of Los Mayitos gang. A video was shared on social media where the handcuffed victim was interrogated and beaten with an agricultural machete. The whereabouts of the victims are unknown. At least 1 injured.

On 28 September 2025, in Tenencia Morelos, Michoacan, armed individuals shot at three people in colonia El Arquito. One person was killed and another two were injured. One injured person also died later. The perpetrators left a threatening message, and synthetic drugs were found. 2 fatalities.

location: Ciudad de Mexico - Gustavo A. Madero
notes: On 27 September 2025, in Ciudad de Mexico - Gustavo A. Madero, armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man (drive-by) in Colonia Gertrudis Sanchez. 1 fatality.

On 22 September 2025, in Manzanillo, Colima, three armed men abducted an unspecified number of people in their own house in colonia Peninsula de Santiago and demanded them to pay a ransom. One of the victims got to send a message to a relative and the authorities arrived at the scene, where they arrested the perpetrators. The victims were likely released as the perpetrators were arrested in flagrante delicto.
On 4 October 2025, in Gomez Palacio, Durango, unidentified individuals shot at state police officers at a checkpoint in the Industrial Park. Two individuals were arrested. Casualties unknown.

On 5 October 2025, in Villa Union, Sinaloa, armed individuals abducted a man from his house. This abduction is likely linked to the ongoing wave of violence due to the conflict within the Sinaloa Cartel. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); AFP; AP; Colima Noticias; E-Consulta; El Norte; El Proceso; El Universal (Mexico); Hoy Tamaulipas; Imagen del Golfo; La Jornada; La Prensa de Monclova; La Silla Rota; La Verdad; Milenio; Reforma; Sintesis
notes: On 6 October 2025, in Estacion Manuel, Tamaulipas, according to witnesses, military officers shot and killed six farmers and injured two who were mistaken for gang members on km. 71 of Tampico-Mante road.
