source: Diario de Morelos; El Norte; El Proceso; El Universal (Mexico); La Jornada; La Verdad; Mural; Quadratin Oaxaca; Reforma
notes: On 6 October 2025, in Cuernavaca, Morelos, according to witnesses, a municipal police officer shot and killed a man who was recording him and two other officers while they searched a stolen vehicle in colonia Patios de la Estacion. According to residents, the officers fled the area and abandoned the body at the scene. According to the Secretariat of Public Security and Citizen Protection, the man attacked the officers with a firearm once they ordered him to stop the vehicle in which he travelled. 1 fatality.

On 6 October 2025, in Guanajuato, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, men who travelled aboard several vehicles entered La Cabana de Vicky bar and shot at people. Two men died and a woman was injured. 2 fatalities, 1 injured.

On 6 October 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two men on a motorcycle shot and injured a woman in the intersection of Rio Verde and 18 de Marzo streets, in colonia Las Margaritas (drive-by). 1 injured.
On 6 October 2025, in Hermosillo, Sonora, several individuals shot and injured a man in a house on Tres avenue. 1 injured.

On 6 October 2025, in Santiago Acatlan, Puebla, five armed individuals abducted a moto taxi driver in the intersection of 17 Norte street and the federal road to Tehuacan and killed him. His body was found hours later with gunshot wounds next the railways. An initial version not confirmed by the authorities indicated that the attack suspectedly responded to a setting of scores. 1 fatality.

On 6 October 2025, in Nuevo Necaxa, Puebla, two individuals on a motorcycle shot at two women who were driving in the intersection of Zaragoza Sur avenue and Necaxa-Canaditas boulevard (drive-by). One of the victims died and the other was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injured.
Around 6 October 2025 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in bags on Limon Padilla boulevard, in colonia Las Torres. 1 fatality.

On 6 October 2025, in Zapopan, Jalisco, according to witnesses, several individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a man in the intersection of Palmira and Clavel streets, in colonia Los Cajetes (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 6 October 2025, in Puyacatengo Norte, Tabasco, armed individuals entered a house and beat an unspecified number of members of a family and abducted one of them, a woman. During the abduction, the perpetrators stole 300,000 pesos, valuables and a van. They also demanded a ramson of 3 million pesos. The woman's whereabouts are unknown. Unspecified number of injured.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); Borderland Beat; El Norte; Quadratin Oaxaca; Reforma; Tiempo
notes: On 6 October 2025, in Moris, Chihuahua, unidentified individuals shot and killed three state police officers and injured six. Around 9 October, 9 people were arrested. 3 fatalities, 6 injured.

notes: On 7 October 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, individuals in a van shot at state police officers in sector Stanza Cantabria (drive-by). One of the officers died. Moments later, state police and military officers clashed with the perpetrators and killed five of them in a house in fraccionamiento Urbi Alameda del Cedro Residencial. The officer who died was the son of a state police commander who works as the Secretary of Public Security in Cosala. The authorities seized 14 firearms, 12 explosives and tactical equipment. 6 fatalities.

Around 7 October 2025 (as reported), in San Pedro, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds, the hands and feet tied, the head covered by his own shirt and signs of torture on Culiacan-Navolato road. 1 fatality.

On 7 October 2025, in Irapuato, Guanajuato, individuals on a motorcycle shot at a man in the intersection of Jiquilpan and Lopez Mateos streets, in colonia Lazaro Cardenas (drive-by). The man used his partner as human shield, and she was injured. 1 injured.

On 15 October 2025, in San Francisco del Rincon, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, two armed individuals shot and killed a man in the city center when the victim was playing video games in a store. 1 fatality.

On 15 October 2025, in Aguaruto, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, armed individuals shot and killed a man in a gas station on the Culiacan-Navolato highway. 1 fatality.
On 15 October 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, two armed men shot and killed a man and injured another one in Barrancos area. 1 fatality.
On 15 October 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals shot at the municipal police in colonia Guadalupe Victoria. The police repelled the attack. There were no casualties.
Around 15 October 2025 (as reported), near La Higuerita, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with his hands tied and with gunshot wounds near the police station. 1 fatality.

On 15 October 2025, in Elota, Sinaloa, armed individuals in a vehicle shot at the vehicle of the mayor (from the MC party) when he was travelling on the Culiacan-Mazatlan highway from Culiacan (drive-by). After the attack the suspects threw puncture objects to damage vehicles (ponchallantas). There were no casualties.
On 15 October 2025, in Hermosillo, Sonora, suspectedly two armed men engaged in a shooting in a public street in Colonia Adolfo Mateos. Both fled the scene. There were no casualties.

Around 15 October 2025 (as reported), in Reynosa, Tamaulipas, unidentified individuals kidnapped two people. The perpetrates asked for a ransom to their relatives. Both victims were held tied up in a motel, where the state police rescued them in colonia Jose Lopez Portillo. One man was arrested.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 15 October 2025, in Pueblo Viejo Uno, Veracruz, armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man (drive-by). His daughter was also shot and injured. 1 fatality.

On 16 October 2025, in Tijuana, Baja California, unknown armed individuals shot at people in Colonia Vista Encantanda killing one minor and injuring two other people. The location is suspected of being a drug dealing center. 1 fatality, 2 injured.
Around 16 October 2025 (as reported), in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, a man was killed and his body was found in a field with the 'tiro de gracia'. 1 fatality.

location: Ciudad de Mexico - Gustavo A. Madero
notes: On 16 October 2025, in Ciudad de Mexico - Gustavo A. Madero, at least two armed individuals set fire to a home in Colonia Defensores de la Republica injuring one woman inside. The perpetrators were also injured and fled the scene. 3 injured.

On 16 October 2025, in Hidalgo, Coahuila de Zaragoza, armed individuals shot at military officers in El Callejon while they were carrying out an inspection and then fled the scene. Both officers were injured. 2 injured.

On 16 October 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, armed individuals arrived on a motorcycle, shot a car and then fled the scene in Colonia Paraiso Real. A man and a woman were killed as a result, and a girl was injured. 2 fatalities, 1 injured.
On 16 October 2025, in the outskirts of San Jose Iturbide, Guanajuato, armed individuals shot at the military and the National Guard who shot back in Ex Hacienda de Guadalupe. Casualties unknown.

On 16 October 2025, near Villa Madero, Michoacan de Ocampo, unknown armed men traveling in trucks shot at a group of officer from the Specialized Unit to Combat Kidnapping (UECS), the military force, the National Guard, the Ministry of Public Security (SSP), and the municipal police during an operation to carry out an arrest near Madero. Officers shot back and killed two armed individuals and seized rifles, vests, magazines and cartridges. 2 fatalities.

On 16 October 2025, in Uruapan, Michoacan de Ocampo, several armed individuals arrived in a vehicle and shot at two men who were inside a barber shop in Colonia Tierra y Libertad killing both. 2 fatalities.

On 16 October 2025, near Colombia, Nuevo Leon, armed individuals shot at military and state police officers near Puente Colombia who started to chase the armed individuals. One armed individual was killed and the other was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

Around 16 October 2025 (as reported), in the mountain areas of the municipality Badiraguato, Sinaloa, two people were killed and their bodies were found with gunshot wounds and wrapped in blankets. 2 fatalities.

On 16 October 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unknown armed individuals shot at two municipal traffic officers while they were traveling in a patrol car in Colonia Rincon San Rafael, killing both officers. The clash led to a second clash between police officers and the suspected perpetrators in the center of the city, where there were no casualties. 2 fatalities.
On 16 October 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed men shot a man on a motorcycle outside a home in Colonia Adolfo Lopez Mateos. The man attempted to flee, but was shot and killed. 1 fatality.

source: El Norte; El Sol de Sinaloa
notes: On 16 October 2025, in El Tepuche, Sinaloa, unknown armed individuals shot at the military officers who shot back. One officer was killed as a result and armed individuals were injured. 1 fatality, 2 injured.
Around 16 October 2025 (as reported), near Campo Balbuena, Sinaloa, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in plastic bags on highway 50. 1 fatality.

On 16 October 2025, in Navolato, Sinaloa, armed individuals attacked an individual near the municipal palace, injuring the man and two other bystanders, one of whom was a minor. All three were injured. The perpetrators fled in a vehicle waiting for them after the attack. 3 injured.
On 16 October 2025, in Hermosillo, Sonora, according to witnesses, armed individuals shot and killed a man and injured another in a small shopping mall. 1 fatality, 1 injured.
Around 16 October 2025 (as reported), in Reynosa, Tamaulipas, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture in Colonia Modulo 2000 Rancho Grande. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 16 October 2025, in the municipality of Calcahualco, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, unknown armed individuals shot and killed a father and his two sons on the outskirts of the Pico de Orizaba national park. The attack is suspectedly related to the control of illegal logging in the municipality. 3 fatalities.

Around 17 October 2025 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a blanket inside a canal near Colonia Empleados Federales near the Chaparral border crossing. 1 fatality.

On 17 October 2025, in Flores Magon, Chihuahua, suspected members of La Linea Gang were setting up a checkpoint and shot at state police officers. The officers answered the attack and killed four individuals. Three of the perpetrators were wearing camouflage uniforms. 4 fatalities.

On 17 October 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guananjuato, according to witnesses, armed men shot and killed a man in Colonia El Pedregal and then fled the scene on two motorcycles. The victim earned his living collecting objects and recyclables. 1 fatality.

On 17 October 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guananjuato, according to witnesses, armed individuals in a vehicle opened fire and shot a man in the head while he was driving his car in Colonia El Paraiso (drive-by). The man was injured as a result. 1 injured.
On 17 October 2025, in Pachuca de Soto, Hidalgo, according to witnesses, two armed men on motorcycles intercepted a man driving his car and shot and killed him (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 17 October 2025, in Guadalajara, Jalisco, according to witnesses, armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a man when he was washing his car in Colonia Lomas del Paraiso II (drive-by). 1 fatality.

source: El Norte; La Jornada; La Verdad
notes: On 17 October 2025, near Ajuno, Michoacan de Ocampo, members of the CMNG shot at the National Guard who shot back during an operation. The members of the CMNG fled the scene and set up (narco) roadblocks to avoid being caught. There were no casualties.
On 17 October 2025, in China, Nuevo Leon, one armed man shot at state police officers who shot back on the China-Mendez highway. The man was arrested as a result. There were no casualties.

Around 17 October 2025 (as reported), in Agua Caliente de Garate, Sinaloa, an unknown number of people were killed and their mutilated bodies were found inside a pot on a baseball field. Unspecified fatalities coded to 3.
On 17 October 2025, in Mazatlan, Sinaloa, two armed men intercepted a man arriving in a vehicle at a mechanic's shop and shot him. The victim crashed and died as a result. 1 fatality.
On 17 October 2025, in Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, according to witnesses, armed individuals arrived at a home in Colonia Casa Real and shot and killed a teenager boy. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 17 October 2025, in Nuevo Jacal, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, according to witnesses, two rival groups engaged in an armed clash resulting in several people injured.

On 18 September 2025, in Morelia, Michoacan de Ocampo, two men and a woman shot and killed a man who resisted being abducted on Villas del Pedregal avenue, in colonia Villas del Pedregal. The perpetrators were arrested. 1 fatality.

On 24 September 2025, in Temoaya, Mexico, according to security cameras footage, a group of individuals killed four people with unknown methods in Cinco Palos. One of the perpetrators was arrested in October 2025, and the authorities seized drugs. 4 fatalities.

On 28 September 2025, in Tenencia Morelos, Michoacan de Ocampo, a man and a woman shot at three men who were making partition walls in a house in colonia Pablo Galeana. Two of the victims died and the other was injured. The perpetrators were arrested. 2 fatalities, 1 injured.

On 2 October 2025, in Irapuato, Guanajuato, armed individuals beat and abducted a man from his house in colonia Campestre Hurtado. His relatives were at the scene and witnessed the attack. One of the perpetrators was arrested. The victim's whereabouts are unknown. 1 injured.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); 8 Columnas; E-Consulta; El Norte; La Verdad; Milenio; Sintesis
notes: On 2 October 2025, in Naucalpan de Juarez, Mexico, two men abducted a girl on Filomeno Mata street, in colonia San Rafael Chamapa. The men were arrested, but the victim's whereabouts are unknown.

On 3 October 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, a man and a woman abducted a man and killed him the day after (coded separately). The perpetrators were arrested and a third suspect was investigated.
On 9 October 2025, in Colonia Osiris, Zacatecas, suspected gang members abducted a man and stole his van at the toll on 45 federal road. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.
On 9 October 2025, in El Pueblito, Queretaro, according to witnesses, a man and a woman stabbed and injured the son of the former mayor in Puerta Real. 1 injured.

source: El Norte; El Sol de Acapulco
notes: On 10 October 2025, in Tlapa de Comonfort, Guerrero, three members of Grupo Cochoapa Gang shot and killed two men and a child, and injured two other children at Charly garage, in colonia El Aguaje. All the victims were relatives. In a video posted on social media, the perpetrators admitted to having been hired due to a dispute over the occupation of a piece of land. The perpetrators were found dead near Atlamajalcingo del Monte on 11 October 2025 (coded separately). 3 fatalities, 2 injured.

location: Los Organos de Juan R. Escudero
notes: On 11 October 2025, in Los Organos de Juan R. Escudero, Guerrero, according to witnesses, unidentified men shot and killed a man on Gregorio Ramirez street. 1 fatality.

Around 11 October 2025 (as reported), in Reynosa, Tamaulipas, four individuals abducted and beat a man in fraccionamiento Piramides. The authorities arrested the perpetrators and released the victim later the same day. 1 injured.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: Around 11 October 2025 (as reported), in Navolato, Sinaloa, two men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man who was driving a motorcycle in front of the office of the State Attorney General on Jesus Almada avenue (drive-by). 1 fatality.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: Around 11 October 2025 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a boy was killed and his body was found wrapped in blankets and plastics on Las Torres boulevard, in colonia Antonio Nakayama. 1 fatality.

source: El Proceso; El Sol de Sinaloa; Milenio; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 11 October 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, individuals in a vehicle shot and injured a municipal police officer at a guardhouse in colonia Valle Alto (drive-by). 1 injured.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: Around 11 October 2025 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with the hands tied in colonia Antonio Rosales. Also in Culiacan, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds and the hands tied in the intersection of Ejercito Nacional avenue and Plan de San Luis street, in colonia Emiliano Zapata. 2 fatalities.

source: El Norte; El Sol de Acapulco
notes: Around 11 October 2025 (as reported), near Atlamajalcingo del Monte, Guerrero, three members of Grupo Cochoapa Gang were killed and their bodies were found partially inside bags, with signs of torture and gunshot and stab wounds on Tlapa-Marquelia road. The victims appeared being interrogated, beaten and injured in a video posted on social media, in which they took responsibility for the attack against a family in Tlapa de Comonfort on 10 October 2025 due to a dispute over the occupation of a piece of land (coded separately). 3 fatalities.
Around 11 October 2025 (as reported), in Ojos Negros, Baja California, at least one person was killed and the dismembered body was found. At least 1 fatality.

source: El Universal (Mexico); La Silla Rota; La Verdad; Milenio; Zona Franca
notes: On 11 October 2025, in Celaya, Guanajuato, two men in a vehicle shot at four National Guard officers who travelled in a vehicle on Constituyentes avenue (drive-by). One of the officers died and another was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

source: La Jornada; La Voz de Michoacan
notes: Around 11 October 2025 (as reported), in El Habillal, Michoacan de Ocampo, suspected members of the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG) used drones to launch two explosives at a municipal police lookout post known as La Barricada. Only one of the devices exploded and the other was seized and defused. There were no casualties.

On 11 October 2025, near San Martin Texmelucan de Labastida, Puebla, individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in front of his wife on Progreso street, next to Texmelucan-Tlaxcala road (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 11 October 2025, in San Pedro, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals chased and shot and killed a man outside his house in the intersection of Gomez Farias and Ignacio Comonfort streets. This attack was likely linked to the ongoing wave of violence due to the conflict within the Sinaloa Cartel. 1 fatality.

On 11 October 2025, in Naucalpan de Juarez, Mexico, two individuals who fled on a motorcycle shot at a woman and a man (mother and son) on Morelos y Buganvilias street, in colonia El Tejocote. The man died and the woman was injured. The man was on parole for an unspecified crime and was wearing an electronic tracking bracelet. An alternative version indicated that the attack took place on Prolongacion de Turquia avenue, in colonia Pinos II. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 11 October 2025 (between 11 - 12 October), between Calcahualco and Tlapala, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, a man was killed and his body was found beaten and naked in a ravine. The victim disappeared on 11 October and his body was found on 12 October. 1 fatality.

On 11 October 2025, in Chinantla, Puebla, according to witnesses, residents beat municipal police officers who were arresting a man in the area known as Palomas y Tlapa, in colonia Buena Vista. The man had committed an administrative offense during a rodeo earlier the same day. One of the residents then shot at the officers, who shot back. One of the officers died. Some of the officers were unarmed because they had not passed confidence tests, including the officer who died. 1 fatality.

Around 11 October 2025 (between 10 - 12 October), in Tarimbaro, Michoacan de Ocampo, a man was killed and his body was found along with an unspecified (narco) message near the neighborhood of La Cruz and Morelia-Salamanca road. The victim disappeared from Huandacareo on 10 October and his body was found on 12 October. 1 fatality.

On 11 October 2025, in Morelia, Michoacan de Ocampo, an individual on a motorcycle shot and killed a man and injured another on Flor de Liz street, in colonia Eduardo Ruiz (drive-by). 1 fatality, 1 injured.

Around 11 October 2025 (as reported), in Tetecolala, Morelos, a man and a woman were killed and their bodies were found with a single gunshot wound in the back of the head ('tiro de gracia'). 2 fatalities.

On 11 October 2025, in Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals shot and killed a man who was driving a van in the intersection of Mezquita and Misiones streets, in colonia Primavera. 1 fatality.

Around 11 October 2025 (as reported), in General Zuazua, Nuevo Leon, two men were killed and their bodies were found with gunshot wounds and the hands tied on Camino a Real San Pedro street, between colonias Hacienda San Pedro and Real de Palmas. 2 fatalities.

On 11 October 2025, in Irapuato, Guanajuato, two men on a motorcycle shot at a group of people in the intersection of Durazno and Naranja streets, in the neighborhood of Calzada de Guadalupe (drive-by). A boy and a girl died, and a boy and a pregnant woman were injured. 2 fatalities, 2 injured.

On 11 October 2025, in Ciudad Santa Catarina, Nuevo Leon, according to the victim, two men and a woman abducted an employee of a 7-Eleven store who faced them for stealing beer on Villa Dorada street, in colonia Villas del Mirador. The perpetrators got him on a vehicle and abandoned him a few kilometers from the store.

On 11 October 2025, in Arandas, Guanajuato, unidentified individuals shot and burned a vehicle on Irapuato-Romita state road, in an area known as El Barco. The body of a victim was found calcinated inside the vehicle. 1 fatality.

source: El Sol de Acapulco; Quadratin Oaxaca
notes: Around 12 October 2025 (as reported), in El Papayo, Guerrero, two men who were siblings were killed and their bodies were found with a single gunshot in the back of the head ('tiro de gracia') and the hands tied. 2 fatalities.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: Around 12 October 2025 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals shot and killed a man on Francisco I. Madero boulevard. At the moment of the attack, the victim was talking with another man, who fled and whose whereabouts are unknown. This attack is likely linked to the ongoing wave of violence caused by the conflict within the Sinaloa Cartel. 1 fatality.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 12 October 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals got a man off a vehicle and shot and killed him in a stream on Ignacio Lopez Rayon avenue, between colonias Tierra Blanca and Paseo Alameda. The victim was handcuffed. 1 fatality.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 12 October 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, two individuals shot and killed a man in a party hall on Macario Gaxiola street, in colonia Ferrocarrilera, where he had taken refuge after being chased. Also in Culiacan, unidentified individuals shot at three people in the intersection of Enrique Gonzalez and Geovanny Zamudio streets, in colonia Infonavit Barrancos. One of them died and the others were injured. Lastly, unidentified individuals shot and killed a man who was in a vehicle on De la Voluntad avenue, in fraccionamiento Horizontes. The last two attacks were likely linked to the ongoing wave of violence caused by the conflict within the Sinaloa Cartel. 3 fatalities, 2 injured.

source: El Siglo de Durango; El Universal (Mexico); Noroeste
notes: On 12 October 2025, in El Zapote, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals shot at military officers on km. 22 of Mexico 15 road, in the area between the towns of Habal and El Quelite. The officers shot back, killed an individual and injured and arrested another. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

On 12 October 2025, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, unidentified individuals shot and killed a taxi driver who was being transported as a client in another taxi on Acapulco-Mexico federal road, by an area known as La Llave de Agua, in colonia 20 de Noviembre. This attack is part of the ongoing wave of violence against taxi drivers in Guerrero. 1 fatality.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); El Universal (Mexico); La Silla Rota; La Verdad; Milenio; Zona Franca
notes: On 12 October 2025, in Rancho Grande, Guanajuato, men aboard several vehicles chased and shot and killed an off-duty commander of the municipal police officer from Salamanca who was driving in front of the National Guard premises on Irapuato-Salamanca road. 1 fatality.
On 12 October 2025, in Colima, Colima, individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man and a woman on Canal de Panama street, in colonia Parajes del Sur (drive-by). 2 fatalities.

source: E-Consulta; El Proceso; La Silla Rota; SDP Noticias; Sintesis

Around 12 October 2025 (as reported), in Mazatlan, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, two men on a motorcycle shot and launched an explosive at the facade of a beer store in the intersection of De Los Reyes avenue and Santa Rita street, in fraccionamiento Santa Teresa (drive-by). A man was collaterally injured by splinters caused by the explosion. 1 injured.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); E-Consulta; El Universal (Mexico); La Silla Rota; La Verdad; Milenio; Mural; Reforma; Sintesis; Tabasco Hoy
notes: Around 12 October 2025 (week of), in the municipality of Centro (coded to Villahermosa), Tabasco, two gang members (one of them, a boy) abducted a woman and released her days later. The perpetrators were arrested, and the authorities found a video of the victim in their cellphone.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); E-Consulta; El Universal (Mexico); La Silla Rota; La Verdad; Milenio; Mural; Reforma; Sintesis; Tabasco Hoy
notes: Around 12 October 2025 (as reported), in the municipality of Paraiso, Tabasco, according to a video found in the cellphone of one of the perpetrators, two gang members (one of them, a boy) killed a person and buried it in the patio of a house. The perpetrators were arrested. 1 fatality.

On 12 October 2025, in Temixco, Morelos, two individuals shot and killed a public bus driver who was inside the route 11 bus at the bus base in colonia 10 de Abril. The attack was suspectedly linked to extortion fees. 1 fatality.
Around 12 October 2025 (as reported), in La Tinaja, Guanajuato, two individuals abducted a man and demanded ransom. The authorities arrested the perpetrators and released the victim.
Around 12 October 2025 (as reported), in Chapa de Mota, Mexico, two members of La Familia Michoacana Cartel shot and injured a man. One of the attackers was arrested. 1 injured.

Around 12 October 2025 (as reported), in Ciudad de Mexico - Venustiano Carranza, according to witnesses, two women shot and killed a woman after arguing (over unknown motives) in the intersection of Manuel de la Pena and Pena y Vidal Alcocer streets, in colonia Centro. The perpetrators were arrested. 1 fatality.

Around 12 October 2025 (as reported), in the municipality of San Marcos, Guerrero, a man was killed and his body was found beheaded next to a van that was set on fire in an area known as El Guinate, on the path to Huajintepec. 1 fatality.
On 12 October 2025, in Tijuana, Baja California, two men shot and killed a boy in a football field in colonia Mexico Lindo. 1 fatality.

source: La Jornada; La Silla Rota; La Verdad

The victim belonged to the General Coordination of Attention to Cases of Kidnapping and Extortion. 1 fatality.

source: El Proceso; La Jornada; La Verdad
notes: On 12 October 2025, in Benito Juarez, Tabasco, individuals on a motorcycle shot at people at a tacos stand (drive-by). Three people died and three were injured. 3 fatalities, 3 injured.

On 12 October 2025, in Ciudad de Mexico - Iztapalapa, according to witnesses, two men on a motorcycle shot and killed a woman and injured a man on Quetzal street, in colonia La Purisima (drive-by). One of the perpetrators was arrested. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

On 12 October 2025, in Ciudad de Mexico - Cuauhtemoc, two women shot and killed a woman and abandoned the body in the intersection of Manuel Pena y Pena and Circunvalacion streets, in colonia Centro. The perpetrators were arrested and the authorities seized cocaine. 1 fatality.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); El Proceso; El Universal (Mexico); Imagen del Golfo; La Jornada; La Silla Rota; Milenio; Quadratin Oaxaca; SDP Noticias; Tabasco Hoy
notes: On 13 October 2025, in Ciudad de Mexico - Cuauhtemoc, according to witnesses, a man shot and killed a lawyer on Ninos Heroes avenue, in colonia Doctores. A ministerial police officer who was in the area shot at the attacker and injured him. Two men were arrested, and the authorities searched for the individual who hired them to carry out the attack. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
source: El Proceso; El Universal (Mexico); Imagen del Golfo; La Jornada; La Silla Rota; La Verdad; Milenio; Riodoce
notes: Around 13 October 2025 (as reported), in La Fabrica, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, unidentified individuals shot and killed the father of the mayor-elect of Coxquihui at the entry to their ranch. The mayor-elect had previously been victims of attacks. 1 fatality.

source: El Heraldo de Chiapas; El Norte; Milenio; Riodoce
notes: On 13 October 2025, in the municipality of Arriaga, Chiapas, members of the Chiapas and Guatemala Cartel (CCYG) shot at a military helicopter on Jiquipilas-Arriaga, which shot back. During the clash, the gang members burned three vehicles and overturned a tanker truck, and used them to set a narco roadblock on km. 53 of Ocozocoautla-Arriaga highway. These actions were a retaliation for an operation that was carried earlier the same day to arrest the local leader of the CMNG Cartel, which led to the arrest of two men and a woman and the search of several houses in the municipalities of Jiquipilas, Cintalapa and Ocozocoautla. Additional roadblocks and armed clashes took place in other parts of the state (coded separately). There were no casualties.
Around 13 October 2025 (as reported), in Magistral, Sinaloa, two people were killed and their bodies were found wrapped in blankets between kms. 200 and 207 of Durango-Mazatlan highway. 2 fatalities.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 13 October 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed men shot and killed a man in his house on Bugambilia Street, in colonia 10 de Mayo. This attack is likely linked to the ongoing wave of violence caused by the conflict within the Sinaloa Cartel. 1 fatality.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: Around 13 October 2025 (as reported), between Campo Podesta and Campo Cuba, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with the hands tied and wrapped in blankets in front of a chapel to Santa Muerte ('Holy Death'). 1 fatality.

source: AFN - Tijuana; Borderland Beat; El Proceso; La Jornada; Milenio; Riodoce; Zeta Tijuana
notes: On 13 October 2025, in Punta Colonet, Baja California, members of Los Mayitos Gang and Los Chapitos Gang clashed on km. 140 of the Transpeninsular road, by Ejido Jaramillo y Diaz Ordaz. Seven people died, two of whom were found burned in a calcinated vehicle. 7 fatalities.

On 13 October 2025, in Aguaruto, Sinaloa, armed individuals abducted a woman. This abduction is likely linked to the ongoing wave of violence caused by the conflict within the Sinaloa Cartel. The victim's partner, a man, was killed in the same location on 18 August 2025 (uncoded). The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

source: El Proceso; El Sol de Acapulco
notes: On 13 October 2025, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, according to witnesses, individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed an off-duty municipal police officer who was driving on Cuauhtemoc avenue, in colonia La Garita (drive-by). He was the nephew of former Morena federal deputy. 1 fatality.
On 13 October 2025, in Tijuana, Baja California, according to witnesses, two men shot and killed a man on Privada Fenix street, in fraccionamiento Natura. 1 fatality.
Around 13 October 2025 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a person was killed and the body was found burned near pantheon 9, in colonia Fausto Gonzalez. 1 fatality.

On 13 October 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, two individuals on a motorcycle chased a man across colonia Rancho Los Naranjos, and then shot and killed him in a grocery store where he had sought refuge, on Principal street. 1 fatality.

On 13 October 2025, in Ciudad de Villa de Alvarez, Colima, individuals on a motorcycle shot and injured a man in the intersection of Ninos Heroes avenue and Rodolfo Chavez Carrillo boulevard (drive-by). 1 injured.

On 13 October 2025, in San Rafael Tlanalapan, Puebla, according to witnesses, two men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man who was eating at a tacos stand (drive-by). The victim had criminal records for violence against security forces. 1 fatality.

Around 13 October 2025 (as reported), in Temoaya, Mexico, three men and three women abducted a woman and her son and took them to a house in colonia Villa Cuauhtemoc. The authorities arrested the perpetrators, seized drugs and released the victims.

Around 13 October 2025 (as reported), in Pesqueria, Nuevo Leon, a man was killed and his decapitated head was found in a container at the Agua y Drenaje wastewater treatment plant, in colonia Jesus Maria. Also, three men were killed and their bodies were found with the hands and feet tied in colonia Valle de Santa Maria, in sector Lombardia. The victims had been abducted on an unknown date. 4 fatalities.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 27 September 2025 (as reported), in Zomajapa, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, a man was killed and his body was found dismembered, with signs of torture and gunshot wounds inside an ice bucket on Zongolica-Comalapa road. 1 fatality.
Around 15 October 2025 (week of), in Pachuca de Soto, Hidalgo, five individuals shot and killed a man on Ramon G. Bonfil boulevard. The attackers were arrested. 1 fatality.
On 17 October 2025, in Zapopan, Jalisco, several armed individuals kidnapped a woman. On 21 October, the woman was located alive, naked and with beatings to her body in Colonia La Higuera. 1 injured.

On 18 October 2025, in the municipality of General Bravo, Nuevo Leon, ministerial police officers stopped two men and a woman at La Vaquita checkpoint and demanded them to pay 100,000 pesos to be allowed to continue their journey. During the incident, one of the officers beat and injured the woman. The officers then handled the victims to an armed group, who tortured them until they released them when they found out that the authorities had initiated a search operation. 3 injured.
On 20 October 2025, in Ciudad de Mexico - Tlalpan, two men approached a woman and shot her to death in Colonia San Pedro Martir. 1 fatality.
On 20 October 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, members of Los Chapitos Gang clashed with federal authorities (coded as National Guard). A gang member was killed and six were arrested. 1 fatality.
Around 21 October 2025 (as reported), in San Felipe, Baja California, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of violence, tied and in a state of decomposition at KM 100. 1 fatality.
On 21 October 2025, in Tijuana, Mexico, three men entered a building in Colonia Sanchez Taboada and shot a man. 1 fatality.

On 21 October 2025, in Tijuana, Mexico, three individuals entered a home and kidnapped three people while a fourth perpetrator was waiting outside in a vehicle. Police officers received an alert and located the suspects and the victims nearby in Costa Hermosa. All three people were rescued and officers arrested four people.

On 21 October 2025, in Rincon Chamula, Chiapas, three men got out of a vehicle and shot a boy. The boy died as a result and the men fled the scene. Family members and witnesses accused the bodyguards of the minor of their involvement in the attack. 1 fatality.

Around 21 October 2025 (as reported), in the municipality of Guadalupe y Calvo, Chihuahua, armed rival groups engaged in an armed clash. Authorities located two bodies following the confrontations near Cerro Solo and Yerbitas. 2 fatalities.
On 21 October 2025, in Colima, Colima, armed men shot and killed a woman in Colonia Nuevo Milenio. 1 fatality.

Around 21 October 2025 (as reported), near Manzanillo, Colima, a man was killed and his body was found with a message next to his body on the Manzanillo-Colima highway near the Panteones bridge. 1 fatality.
On 21 October 2025, in Valencianita, Guanajuato, several armed men arrived at a workshop and shot two sheet metal workers while they were working. 2 fatalities.

On 21 October 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, unknown armed individuals shot a couple in Colonia Valle de Jerez. The attack is suspected of links to drug sales, although this was not confirmed. Also in Leon, a man entered a home in Colonia 10 de mayo and shot a couple inside a home. The perpetrator then fled the scene in a vehicle driven by an accomplice. One woman died and one man was injured. 1 fatality, 3 injured.

On 21 October 2025, in Las Vigas, Guerrero, unknown armed individuals shot at the National Guard while they were carrying out a search warrant. The officers shot back. One officer was injured and three people were arrested. Officers seized live ammunition and drugs.

Around 21 October 2025 (as reported), in Cuautitlan Izcalli, Mexico, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in a plastic bag on the Mexico-Queretaro highway near the Punta Norte highway. 1 fatality.

Around 21 October 2025 (as reported), in Morelia, Michoacan de Ocampo, a man and a woman were killed and their bodies were found gagged and tied inside a home in Colonia Quinceo. 2 fatalities.
On 21 October 2025, in Jiutepec, Morelos, several individuals shot and killed a man and a woman in their house on Ignacio Alanis street. 2 fatalities.
On 21 October 2025, in Alpuyeca, Morelos, according to witnesses, several armed men entered a restaurant and shot at people. One man died and another was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

On 21 October 2025, in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, two armed men shot and killed the security guard of La Fayuca shopping center in San Felipe Hueyotlipan. Both individuals were later arrested. 1 fatality.

Around 21 October 2025 (as reported), in Los Mochis, Sinaloa, a woman and her grandson were killed and their bodies were found inside their home in Colonia Vilals De Cortez. notes: Around 21 October 2025 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, military officers together with the General Attorney's Office and the National Guard attempted to arrest individuals after receiving reports about their presence. The individuals shot at the officers and a clash ensued in Tres Rios sector. The leader of the gang was killed and officers arrested six other gang members. The men were identified as members of Los Chapitos. Officers seized weapons, chargers, cartridges and vehicles. 1 fatality.

On 21 October 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, at least four armed individuals shot and killed two men in Espacio Barcelona. Police officers arrested four men, including two minors. Also in Culiacan, according to witnesses, armed men got out of a vehicle and shot two men while traveling in the Barrancos sector. Both died as a result. In a third attack in Culiacan, several armed individuals shot at a building in Colonia Infonavit Canadas. There were several people at the scene of the shooting but there were no casualties. 4 fatalities.

Around 21 October 2025 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of violence and his hands tied to his back near Colonia Bicentenario. 1 fatality.

On 21 October 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed rival groups engaged in an armed clash at the north exit of Culiacan resulting in the death of two people and the injury of three. 2 fatalities, 3 injured.
Around 21 October 2025 (as reported), in Licenciado Benito Juarez, Sinaloa, a man was killed and the body was found with signs of violence and with his hands tied. 1 fatality.

On 21 October 2025, in Navolato, Sinaloa, several armed men arrived at a fruit store in Colonia Alcanfores and shot the facade. One employee was kidnapped after the incident, his whereabouts remain unknown. There were no casualties.

Around 22 October 2025 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in blankets and inside a box on Las Americas Norte boulevard, in colonia Otay Jardin II. 1 fatality.

On 22 October 2025, in Colima, Colima, armed individuals on a motorcycle approached a man driving his motorcycle and one of them shot him in the downtown area. The man was killed as a result. In a third attack in Colima, armed individuals shot a man in several parts of his body in Colonia El Zalaton de Juarez, injuring the man. 1 fatality, 2 injured.
On 22 October 2025, in Colima, Colima, a couple of individuals set a man on fire on Colonia Placetas Estadio. The man was injured as a result. 1 injured.

location: San Miguel del Ojo de Agua
notes: Around 22 October 2025 (as reported), in San Miguel del Ojo de Agua, Colima, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture and knife wounds near Cabeza de Toro ranch. 1 fatality.

On 22 October 2025, in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, according to witnesses, armed individuals on a motorcycle intercepted three brothers in Colonia Bosques de Santa Anita, shot both and then fled the scene (drive-by). One died and two were injured. 1 fatality, 2 injured.

Around 22 October 2025 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with his hands tied to his back and with a message next to him in Colonia Villa Bonita. 1 fatality.

On 22 October 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, two men riding on a motorcycle shot at two men in Colonia Centro killing one man and injuring another, who managed to escape (drive-by). 1 fatality, 1 injured.

The victim had publicly denounced the insecurity and violence and spoke against the extortion by the armed group Los Viagras, allied with the Jalisco New Generation Cartel. On 20 October, a local leader of the Los Blancos de Troya gang was arrested as the perpetrator. 1 fatality.

location: Ciudad de Mexico - Gustavo A. Madero
notes: On 30 October 2025, in Ciudad de Mexico - Gustavo A. Madero, three armed men shot and killed a young man in Colonia Nueva Tenochtitlan. Three men were arrested. 1 fatality.

The victims were part of a musical group hired to perform for the gang. The attack began when the singer forgot the lyrics and used his cell phone to read them, but the gang leader believed he was using it to record them, so he ordered his murder. Five gang members were arrested, three of whom were minors. 1 fatality, 6 injured.

On 30 October 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, two armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man inside a house in colonia San Felipe de Jesus. 1 fatality.

source: AP; La Jornada; Milenio; Yahoo News
notes: On 27 October 2025, in the Eastern Central Pacific Ocean, the United States military carried out three airstrikes on what it claimed were four drug-trafficking-linked vessels in unspecified locations in international waters of the Eastern Pacific, killing 14 people. U.S. authorities stated that the vessels were transporting drugs along known trafficking routes off the coast of Colombia and were crewed by members of an unspecified Designated Terrorist Organization (DTO). However, at the request of the U.S. Coast Guard, the operation to rescue a survivor of the strikes was later taken over by the Mexican Navy 400 nautical miles (830 km) southwest of Acapulco, Mexico, suggesting that at least one of the strikes may have occurred in waters close to the Mexican coast. The survivor was not located and was suspected to be dead. U.S. authorities have not provided further details about the exact locations of the strikes or evidence to support their claims that drug traffickers operated the vessels. 15 fatalities.

source: El Norte; El Proceso; El Sol de Acapulco; El Universal (Mexico); Quadratin Oaxaca
notes: On 28 October 2025, in San Miguel Totolapan, Guerrero, military and National Guards beat and injured a boy under unknown circumstances. The residents considered this an act of abuse of authority and held a protest later the same day (coded separately).

On 31 October 2025, in Los Espinos, Guerrero, there was an armed clash between armed individuals and the National Guard. Two men were killed and another one was injured. Weapons and a vehicle were seized. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario de Morelos; El Proceso; Milenio
notes: On 28 October 2025, in Cuernavaca, Morelos, according to witnesses, two men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man who was driving on Janitzio street, in colonia Lazaro Cardenas (drive-by). The victim was a renowned local tattoo artist who had been targeted in a previous attack in 2024 and had denounced being victim of threats and extortions. 1 fatality.

source: E-Consulta; Gaceta de la Sierra Norte; Milenio; Sintesis
notes: Around 28 October 2025 (as reported), in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, a woman was killed and her body was found along with a message signed by a member of La Familia Michoacana Cartel in San Pablo Xochimehuacan. The message accused the victim of charging excessive fees to pickpockets and switching sides ('chapulina'). The victim was a well-known pickpocket and leader of a group called 'Las Rubin' that operated in Puebla. According to sources, she was also involved in drug dealing and protection rackets. The message accused the victim of charging excessive fees to pickpockets and switching sides ('chapulina'). 1 fatality.

On 29 October 2025, in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, three individuals attacked municipal police officers (methods unknown), who shot them and injured a man in colonia Historiadores. An alternative version indicated that the men were under the effects of alcohol and thew stones at the officers, and one of the latter shot his weapon and injured a man. 1 injured.

Around 28 October 2025 (as reported), in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, four individuals on two motorcycles shot and killed a security guard in La Fayuca (drive-by). It is unknown whether the victim was armed. The perpetrators were arrested. 1 fatality.

An officer was injured, and the authorities arrested the shooters and seized drugs. 1 injured.

notes: On 28 October 2025, in La Tuna, Sinaloa, gang members used drones to launch explosives at the town. One of the houses that was targeted belonged to the mother of the former leader of the Sinaloa Cartel, El Chapo Guzman. An unconfirmed version indicated that the perpetrators are suspectedly linked to rival factions of the Sinaloa Cartel, and more specifically to the groups known as Los Musicos-FEDI-FE28 and Gente de Guano-Los Calabazas. This attack caused an internal displacement of residents from the municipality (coded separately). Casualties unknown.

source: El Proceso; El Sol de Sinaloa; El Universal (Mexico); La Jornada; La Prensa de Monclova; La Verdad; Noroeste; Riodoce; Tabasco Hoy
notes: On 28 October 2025, between Agua Blanca and Tepuche, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals shot at military, National Guard and state police officers, who shot back and killed seven individuals with the support of a Black Hawk helicopter. source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Milenio; Riodoce
notes: Around 30 October 2025 (as reported), off the Coast of Sinaloa, Sinaloa, military officers rescued 28 people traveling aboard a vessel at sea during an operation. The victims were kidnapped by unknown individuals, and among them, 27 were minors and one adult. The victims are likely from Mexico as according to authorities, the victims were originally from the border area of Chiapas.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Quadratin Oaxaca; Riodoce
notes: Around 29 October 2025 (as reported), in Costa Rica, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals shot at National Guard officers on Culiacan-Eldorado road. The officers shot back. There were no casualties.

notes: On 28 October 2025, in Los Ciruelos, Sinaloa, armed individuals (likely members of Los Chapitos Gang) stabbed and killed a man. source: Borderland Beat; El Sol de Sinaloa; El Universal (Mexico); Riodoce
notes: Around 29 October 2025 (between 28 - 30 October), in Los Ciruelos, Sinaloa, armed individuals kidnapped a man on 28 October. During the incident, another man was stabbed and killed (coded separately). The kidnapped man was killed and his body was found in an advanced state of decomposition and beheaded on 30 October. Armed individuals from Los Chapitos gang held the kidnapped victim and interrogated him. According to the perpetrators, he was a member of La Mayiza Gang. The event was recorded on video and shared on social media. 1 fatality.

notes: On 30 October 2025, in El Pueblito, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, at least six individuals abducted a man. The victim is a transport leader. source: El Financiero (Mexico); El Siglo de Durango; Tabasco Hoy
notes: Around 25 October 2025 (as reported), near El Rio Chico, Durango, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a blanket. Next to the body, there was a message stating 'for spreading false rumors about the people of Durango'. The victim was a journalist who was last seen on 23 October. The victim contributed to the media outlets Contexto de Durango and La Voz de Durango. Before his death, he posted a complaint against organized crime on his Facebook account called La Gazzeta Dgo. He was also a former spokesperson for the National Union of Education Workers (SNTE) in Durango. 1 fatality.

notes: On 25 October 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, unknown armed individuals shot at several people outside a funeral home in Colonia Guadalupe and then fled the scene. Officers seized weapons, vehicles, grenade launchers, and ammunition. 1 injured.
On 25 October 2025, in Aguaruto, Sinaloa, two armed men entered a hardware store and shot a woman employee. The woman was injured. 1 injured.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 25 October 2025, in Poza Rica de Hidalgo, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, armed individuals shot at state police officers after they refused to stop during preventive patrols. State police officers chased the individuals and shot back in Colonia Tepeyac. There were no casualties.

On 26 October 2025, in Guachochi, Chihuahua, there was an armed clash between unknown armed individuals. Five people suspected of not being involved in the clash were killed in Colonia Turuseachi, and seven were injured. All five people belonged to the same family. Also, two people were killed due to the clash on the street on the highway leading to Yoquivo at a place known as El Lobito. According to reports, armed individuals mistook the two victims for members of a rival criminal group. 7 fatalities, 7 injured.

On 26 October 2025, in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, according to witnesses, armed individuals shot a man from a vehicle after having a discussion (nature unknown) with the victim in Colonia Continental before the attack (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 26 October 2025, in Colima, Colima, armed men on a motorcycle approached a man in front of a convenience store in the downtown area. One of them pulled out a gun and shot the man before fleeing (drive-by). The man died as a result. 1 fatality.

On 26 October 2025, in Ciudad de Villa de Alvarez, Colima, armed men on a motorcycle approached a man, one of them pulled out a gun and shot the man in Colonia Puerta de Hierro (drive-by) and then they fled the scene. 1 fatality.

On 26 October 2025, in Irapuato, Guanajuato, two men on a motorcycle opened fire and shot at merchants and families at a market in Colonia Che Guevara (drive-by). Three people were injured and several properties were damaged. 3 injured.

On 26 October 2025, in La Ruana, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed rival groups engaged in an armed clash over the control of the municipality and placed improvised explosives (coded separately). One of the involved groups was identified as the CMNG. There were no casualties.

On 26 October 2025, in La Resurreccion, Puebla, armed individuals in a vehicle intercepted and shot at three men drinking outside and then fled the scene (drive-by). Three people were injured. 3 injured.
Around 26 October 2025 (as reported), in Seccion Alhuate, Sinaloa, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in a sheet and buried. 1 fatality.

On 26 October 2025, in Las Tres Gotas de Agua, Sinaloa, armed individuals shot at the Navy conducting surveillance who shot back. Two men were killed and officers seized a vehicle with weapons inside and arrested two individuals. 2 fatalities.

On 26 October 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unknown armed individuals intercepted a man and shot him repeatedly near Colonia Felipe Angeles. The man died as a result. This is likely linked to the recent increase in violence in Sinaloa state amid fights between factions of the Sinaloa Cartel. Also, a group of armed individuals in a car arrived at the Government palace in Colonia Capistrano, threw a man out of the car and shot him to death and then fled the scene. 2 fatalities.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); El Heraldo de Chiapas; La Verdad
notes: On 27 October 2025, in Potrerillo, Chiapas, members of the Sinaloa Cartel opened fire and shot at the military, the National Guard, the State Prosecutor's office and the state police during an attempt to arrest a man. Two of the suspects were injured after they fell during their escape. Five people were arrested, four of whom were Guatemalan nationality. Officers seized weapons and vehicles. 2 injured.
Around 27 October 2025 (as reported), in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a blanket near the residential area Leones. 1 fatality.

On 27 October 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, armed individuals opened fire and shot at a man and a woman in Colonia Refugio de San Jose. Both were injured. 2 injured.

On 27 October 2025, in Guadalajara, Jalisco, according to witnesses, two individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man who was driving a van on Ricardo Palmerin street, in colonia San Rafael (drive-by). 1 fatality.

Around 27 October 2025 (as reported), in Morelia, Michoacan de Ocampo, a man was killed and his body was found covered in a blanket and with a bag over his head in Colonia 23 de marzo. 1 fatality.

On 27 October 2025, in Salina Cruz, Oaxaca, one armed man approached another man in a parking lot of a shopping mall and shot him. The victim was identified as the leader of the CATEM of the city. 1 fatality.

On 27 October 2025, in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, a man got off a motorcycle driven by an accomplice and shot and killed a mechanic who was working in the intersection of 16 de Septiembre and 19 de Enero streets, in colonia San Antonio Abad. The victim was a suspected huachicolero who pretended to belong to the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG), which allowed him to extort local vendors. His belonging to the CJNG was not confirmed by the authorities. 1 fatality.

On 27 October 2025, in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, unknown armed men shot at a home with people inside in Colonia Bosques de Manzanilla more than 15 times and fled the scene. There were no casualties.

On 27 October 2025, in San Martin Texmelucan de Labastida, Puebla, armed individuals in a vehicle intercepted a man on his motorcycle, shot him and then fled the scene (drive-by) in Colonia Los Dicios. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
source: E-Consulta; Imagen del Golfo; La Jornada; La Silla Rota; Milenio
notes: On 27 October 2025, in General Miguel Aleman, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, armed individuals shot at ministerial police who responded to a report of armed individuals at La Victoria bar. The officers shot back, killed five individuals, and arrested 32. Out of the latter, 11 were municipal police officers who had participated in the clash and were linked to a criminal group. Three ministerial police officers were injured. Following the clash, the municipal police commander of Atoyac and at least five other municipal police officers fled the municipality. 5 fatalities, 3 injured.

Around 25 October 2025 (as reported), near Jesus Maria, Sinaloa, a person was kidnapped by unknown armed individuals. The victim was rescued on 25 October after an armed clash between armed individuals, state police, and military forces, where three people were arrested (coded separately).

On 6 November 2025, in Tijuana, Baja California, an armed man shot at a state police officer in Colonia Florido Seccion II in the Florido Mariano district. The officer shot back and died as a result. 1 fatality.
On 4 November 2025, in Tijuana, Baja California, according to witnesses, armed individuals shot and killed a man in Colonia La Escondida. The victim was from the United States. 1 fatality.

On 4 November 2025, in Tijuana, Baja California, according to witnesses, armed individuals in a vehicle shot at two people. One man was killed and another one was injured in Colonia Jardines de la Mesa. 1 fatality.
Around 4 November 2025 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a man was killed and the body was found burned in Colonia Natura. 1 fatality.

Around 6 November 2025 (as reported), in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, a man was killed and his body was found with multiple gunshot wounds and wrapped in a blanket in fraccionamiento Portal del Real. 1 fatality.

On 6 November 2025, in Penjamo, Guanajuato, two armed men on a motorcycle shot a couple in Campos Juarez and then fled the scene. The man died and the woman was injured as a result. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

On 4 November 2025, in Cuautla, Morelos, two armed individuals shot and killed a man in Colonia Hermenegildo Galeana. 1 fatality.

On 7 November 2025, in Tres Marias, Morelos, according to witnesses, armed men in a vehicle shot at two men parked in a vehicle and fled the scene. One man died and the other was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

Around 5 November 2025 (as reported), in Acatlipa, Morelos, a man was killed and the body was found beheaded and signs of violence. 1 fatality.
On 5 November 2025, in Benito Juarez, Nuevo Leon, armed individuals shot and killed a man in Colonia Lomas de Santa Monica. The victim died later at the hospital. Two men were arrested. 1 fatality.

On 5 November 2025, in Linares, Nuevo Leon, there was an armed clash between armed individuals. A man was later found shot and injured in the area, however, it is unknown if he participated in the armed clash. Casualties unknown.
On 6 November 2025, in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, two armed individuals shot and killed an employee of the Mexican Social Security Institute (IMSS) in the subdelegation 4. 1 fatality.

On 6 November 2025, in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, armed individuals shot at a home in Colonia Constituyentes del 57 killing one man and injuring three other people, including an elder woman. 1 fatality, 3 injured.

This incident occurred amid a wave of violent attacks in Sinaloa state, likely related to the war between factions of the Sinaloa Cartel. In another event, several armed men shot and killed three brothers in Colonia Bicentenario. 3 fatalities.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 4 November 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, two armed men shot and killed two men who were inside their business in colonia Plutarco Elias Calles. 2 fatalities.

These incidents occurred amid a wave of violent attacks in Sinaloa state, likely related to the war between factions of the Sinaloa Cartel. 2 fatalities.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: Around 4 November 2025 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds in Colonia Rafael Buelna. The victim was a former municipal worker who worked as a director of cemeteries for the city council. 1 fatality.

Almost simultaneously, another attack with explosive devices, suspected of being launched from drones, at a car repair shop happened. Two brothers were killed, and another person was injured. The attacks took place within a radius of 5.5 km from each other. 2 fatalities, 1 injured.

On 7 November 2025, in Ojo de Agua de Osuna, Sinaloa, armed individuals shot at military officers who shot back, killing two armed men and arrested five. Officers rescued two people who were held captive and seized weapons, magazines, ammunition and a vehicle. 2 fatalities.
