notes: On 1 November 2025, in Ayahualtempa, Guerrero, around 70 members of Los Ardillos Gang shot at leaders of the communities of Amatitlan, Ayahualtempa and Pueblos Fundadores who met to discuss security affairs. Among the victims, there were members of the Regional Coordination of Communal Authorities (CRAC) and the Indigenous and Popular Council of Guerrero-Emiliano Zapata (CIPOG-EZ). Members of the local Policia Comunitaria shot back, engaged in a clash that lasted for over 10 hours and arrested 14 gang members. Police and military officers arrived at the scene and arrested three other individuals. Three people died and seven were injured. 3 fatalities, 7 injured.

On 1 November 2025, in Santiago Tautla, Hidalgo, according to witnesses, several men got off a van and shot and killed the leader of Los Rabanos Gang and injured a woman near the pantheon. 1 fatality, 1 injured.
Around 3 November 2025 (as reported), in San Gabriel, Hidalgo, a man was killed and his body was found dismembered in the water channel that runs through the town. 1 fatality.

Around 2 November 2025 (as reported), in Union de San Antonio, Jalisco, gang members shot at municipal police officers on the path to La Primavera ranch, by Vicente Guerrero school. An officer died and another was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injured.
On 23 September 2025, in San Lucas, Mexico, two men shot and killed five people who were in a vehicle. The perpetrators were arrested and additional accomplices were being searched. 5 fatalities.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); El Norte; El Proceso; El Siglo de Durango; La Jornada; La Verdad; La Voz de Michoacan; Milenio; MiMorelia; Mural; Noroeste; Reforma; SDP Noticias; Tabasco Hoy; Zeta Tijuana
notes: On 31 October 2025, in La Ruana, Michoacan de Ocampo, suspected members of Los Viagras Gang shot and killed a man and a woman in their house in the intersection of Martires de Uruapan and Melchor Ocampo streets. The man was armed and clashed with the attackers. According to an unconfirmed version, both victims were also tortured before being killed. The man was a lemon producer, linked to organized crime and the nephew of the founder of a self-defense group that was created in 2013 to confront Los Caballeros Templarios and Los Viagra gangs. The founder was also killed by Los Viagra in June 2023. Following this attack, members of Los Viagra clashed with military and police forces (coded separately). 2 fatalities.

On 31 October 2025, in La Ruana, Michoacan de Ocampo, suspected members of Los Viagras Gang clashed with military and state police officers, who shot back and killed two individuals. Two officers were injured. The clash took place while the authorities investigated an attack that the gang members perpetrated against a couple earlier the same day (coded separately). 2 fatalities, 2 injured.

Around 1 November 2025 (as reported), near Huajumbaro, Michoacan de Ocampo, a woman was killed and her body was found with gunshot wounds and partially covered by a blanket next to Morelia-Mil Cumbres road. 1 fatality.
On 2 November 2025, in Uruapilla, Michoacan de Ocampo, individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man and injured another on Morelia-Patzcuaro road (drive-by). 1 fatality, 1 injured.

Around 3 November 2025 (as reported), in Puruandiro, Michoacan de Ocampo, a person was killed and the body was found burned in a vehicle that was set on fire in a ranch in colonia El Saucito. The authorities investigated whether the victim was a herder who disappeared earlier the same day. 1 fatality.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); 8 Columnas; AFN - Tijuana; AFP; Antena San Luis; AP; Colima Noticias; Diario de Morelos; E-Consulta; El Blog del Narco; El Heraldo de Chiapas; El Norte; El Proceso; El Siglo de Durango; El Universal (Mexico); Entorno Informativo; Imagen del Golfo; La Jornada; La Prensa de Monclova; La Silla Rota; La Verdad; La Voz de Michoacan; Milenio; MiMorelia; Mural; Noroeste; Quadratin Oaxaca; Reforma; Riodoce; SDP Noticias; Sintesis; Tabasco Hoy; Xinhua; Yucatan a la Mano; Zeta Tijuana; Zona Franca
notes: On 1 November 2025, in Uruapan, Michoacan de Ocampo, members of the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG) shot and killed the mayor (Independent politician) during the celebrations of the Day of the Dead in the historic center of the city. Municipal police and National Guard officers who escorted the mayor shot back, killed one of the attackers and arrested two. A police officer, a city councilor and a female municipal employee were injured. The man who planned the attack following orders of the CJNG's regional leader was arrested on 19 November 2025, while two accomplices were found dead in Capacuaro on 13 November 2025 (coded separately). The mayor had recently requested support from the Federal Government to confront CJNG and gangs such as Los Viagras, Los Caballeros Templarios, Pueblos Unidos and Los Blancos de Troya. An unconfirmed version indicated a suspected link between the murder and the mayor's intention to run for governor in 2027. Around 20 November, 7 of his former bodyguards were arrested. 2 fatalities, 3 injured.
On 3 November 2025, in Ciudad Ayala, Morelos, individuals on a motorcycle shot and injured a man on Jaguey avenue, in colonia Arboledas (drive-by). 1 injured.
Around 1 November 2025 (as reported), in Cuautla, Morelos, a man was killed and his body was found dismembered and along with a criminal message in colonia Emiliano Zapata. 1 fatality.

source: Diario de Morelos; Milenio; Quadratin Oaxaca
notes: Around 3 November 2025 (month of), in Cuernavaca, Morelos, a man was killed and his body was found decapitated and in an advanced state of decomposition in a mass grave located in a sandpit in colonia Santa Maria Ahuacatitlan or Adolfo Ruiz Cortines. 1 fatality.
On 1 November 2025, in Juan Morales, Morelos, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals shot and killed a bus driver of route 5 on Ruiz Cortines street. 1 fatality.

Around 3 November 2025 (as reported), in Zacatepec de Hidalgo, Morelos, two municipal police officers and a state police officer raped a woman under unknown circumstances. The officers (two men and a woman) were arrested. 1 injured.

On 31 October 2025, in Ciudad de Allende, Nuevo Leon, an individual shot and killed a man and then fled in a vehicle with his accomplices on Benito Juarez street, in at San Francisco Mall. 1 fatality.

Around 1 November 2025 (as reported), in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, a man and a woman convinced a man to go with them to Zinc street, in colonia La Alianza, where two individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed him (drive-by). The man and the woman were arrested. 1 fatality.

On 1 November 2025, in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a man who was driving in the intersection of Quijera and Clavicordio streets, in colonia San Bernabe (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 1 November 2025, in San Antonio Lalana, Oaxaca, unidentified individuals shot at the vehicle of an independent candidate for mayor in the elections scheduled for 16 November 2025. The candidate was not in the vehicle, and the driver was shot and killed. The killed victim was also the cousin of the mayor. 1 fatality.

On 24 October 2025, in Puerto Escondido, Oaxaca, at least four individuals burned an indigenous woman's house and restaurant (Comedor Rosy) on Puerto Escondido-Pochutl road. Residents tried to extinguish the fire but the perpetrators threatened and prevented them from doing so. The woman suffered burns and died on 30 October 2025. 1 fatality.
On 2 November 2025, in San Marcos Zacatepec, Oaxaca, unidentified individuals shot and killed an off-duty municipal police officer. 1 fatality.

On 2 November 2025, between Santa Maria Yolotepec and Santiago Yosondua, Oaxaca, residents from both communities clashed over an agrarian dispute. Two people died and the authorities arrested two agrarian leaders. 2 fatalities.
Around 3 November 2025 (as reported), in Eloxochitlan, Puebla, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals shot and killed two men and a boy in the community of Tlazonapan. 3 fatalities.

Around 30 October 2025 (as reported), in Puga, Puebla, a man was killed and his body was found hanging from a tree branch. Some reports suggest that it is a suspected suicide, but others indicate that the victim's body showed signs of violence, suggesting that it was an attack. 1 fatality.
On 2 November 2025, in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, according to witnesses, individuals in a van shot and killed a man who was driving a motorcycle in La Resurreccion (drive-by). 1 fatality.

source: E-Consulta; El Proceso; Imagen del Golfo; La Jornada; La Verdad; Milenio; Sintesis; Tabasco Hoy
notes: On 2 November 2025, in San Salvador Huixcolotla, Puebla, at least seven men got off two vans and shot and killed three municipal police officers on Tehuacan-Puebla federal road. The attackers left a narco message with threats against a rival criminal group and fled. Following the attack, the mayors of Huixcolotla and Eloxochitlan received threatening calls, and the remaining 13 municipal police officers of the town resigned. The authorities deployed 15 state police officers to take over security in the area. Later a video recording of the event was shared on social media and signed by La Barredora Gang. 3 fatalities.

Around 2 November 2025 (as reported), in El Salado, Puebla, two men were killed and their bodies were found with signs of torture and gunshot wounds. One of them had a piece of clothing around the neck, and the other had the legs tied. The victims, who were farmers and siblings, were suspected to have been kidnapped hours before in Palmar de Bravo. 2 fatalities.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: Around 3 November 2025 (as reported), in Costa Rica, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with the hands tied, gunshot wounds and the head covered by a t-shirt in an irrigation canal in campo El Porvenir. 1 fatality.

On 30 October 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, several individuals shot at navy officers in the intersection of Manantial de la Cienega and Tenochtitlan streets, in fraccionamiento San Luis. The officers shot back, killed an individual and injured another. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 2 November 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, military officers clashed with three men who drove a stolen vehicle in colonia Rafael Buelna. During the clash, a military vehicle crashed into a civilian vehicle and injured a woman. At least two of the men were arrested. 1 injured.

source: El Siglo de Durango; El Sol de Sinaloa; Riodoce
notes: On 31 October 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, men in a vehicle shot and killed a boy who was driving a motorcycle on De los Andes avenue, in fraccionamiento Villa Bonita (drive-by). Also in Culiacan, individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a man on Cosmos street, in colonia Rosario Uzarraga (drive-by). 2 fatalities.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Quadratin Oaxaca; Riodoce
notes: Around 1 November 2025 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, three men were killed and their bodies were found with gunshot wounds in the head ('tiro de gracia'), sings of torture, handcuffed and the faces covered next to the road to Tepuche, in the area known as 'Y'. 3 fatalities.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 1 November 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, several men in a vehicle shot at a house and injured two men and a boy on Luis Gonzalez Urbina/Camino Real street, in colonia Bachigualato (drive-by). 3 injured.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: Around 1 November 2025 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals shot and killed a man who was driving on Profesor Trinidad Dorame street, in colonia Las Cucas. Also in Culiacan, unidentified individuals beat and shot at three men in a house on Aquiles Serdan avenue, in colonia Miguel Aleman. Two men died and another was injured. These attacks are likely linked to the wave of violence caused by the conflict within the Sinaloa Cartel. 3 fatalities, 1 injured.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 2 November 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, an armed group entered a house that was also used as a grocery store and shot and killed a man on Colinas de la Quebrada street, in colonia Progreso. Also in Culiacan, unidentified individuals shot and killed a man in colonia Vista Hermosa. These attacks were likely linked to the wave of violence caused by the conflict within the Sinaloa Cartel. 2 fatalities.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 3 November 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals shot and injured a man who was driving on Providencia boulevard, in fraccionamiento Providencia. This attack was likely linked to the wave of violence caused by the conflict within the Sinaloa Cartel. 1 injured.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); AFN - Tijuana; E-Consulta; El Norte; El Proceso; El Siglo de Durango; El Sol de Sinaloa; El Universal (Mexico); La Jornada; La Prensa de Monclova; La Verdad; Milenio; Noroeste; Quadratin Oaxaca; Riodoce; SDP Noticias; Sintesis; Tabasco Hoy; Zeta Tijuana
notes: On 3 November 2025, in La Brecha, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals shot at military, National Guard and state police officers, who shot back and killed 13 individuals, arrested four and released nine people who were kidnapped. 13 fatalities.
On 1 November 2025, in Mazatlan, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, unidentified men shot and injured the employee of a beer store. 1 injured.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 2 November 2025, in Navolato, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals shot and killed a man in his house in the intersection of Decima and Benito Juarez streets, in colonia 5 de Febrero. 1 fatality.

On 2 November 2025, in Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, according to witnesses, several individuals abducted a person on Las Torres y Guillermo Prieto boulevard, in colonia Libertad, and forced them to walk to Michoacan street. There, the witnesses lost eye contact with them but heard that the perpetrators shot a gun. However, the authorities did not find any sign of the incident, and the victim was reported as suspectedly abducted. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

On 2 November 2025, in Hermosillo, Sonora, individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man who was driving in the intersection of Dos and Opodepe avenues, in colonia Insurgentes (drive-by). According to the victim's relatives, he was involved in drug trafficking. 1 fatality.
On 31 October 2025, in Hermosillo, Sonora, according to the victim, two men shot and injured a man in his house on Leo Sandoval street, in fraccionamiento Manantiales. 1 injured.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
source: Imagen del Golfo; La Silla Rota
notes: On 1 November 2025, in Carrizal, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, according to witnesses, several individuals chased, shot and killed a (likely off-duty) municipal police officer who was driving on Guadalupe Victoria street, in colonia La Cruz. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 3 November 2025, in Xalapa-Enriquez, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, according to witnesses, two men on a motorcycle shot and killed a taxi driver on Francisco Orduna street, in colonia Brisas del Sumidero (drive-by). 1 fatality.

Around 2 October 2025 (as reported), in San Miguel Contla, Tlaxcala, two people were killed and their bodies were found. One of the victims was the former rector of the Technological University of Tlaxcala, who along with the second victim had been kidnapped by armed individuals the day before their bodies were found. A man and a woman were arrested. 2 fatalities.

Around 7 October 2025 (between 6 - 8 October), in Xochitepec, Morelos, five individuals (one of them, an active police officer) abducted a man in Cuernavaca on 6 October and killed him. The victim's body was found in a hotel in Xochitepec on 8 October. He worked as the Head of the Gardens of Peace in Cuernavaca. The perpetrators were arrested. 1 fatality.

On 1 November 2025, in Ciudad Nezahualcoyotl, Mexico, according to the victims and security cameras footage, municipal police officers beat a woman, a man and a third person and stole their cash and belongings at a checkpoint on Jose del Pilar avenue, in colonia Juarez Pantitlan, in a suspected case of abuse of authority. 3 injured.

Around 2 November 2025 (as reported), in Mexicali, Baja California, two men (father and son) were killed and their bodies were found on the road to San Felipe. An armed group that pretended to be police officers had abducted the father days before (unknown date), and the son had gone to the criminals' location to pay a ransom. 2 fatalities.
Around 8 November 2025 (as reported), in Mexicali, Baja California, a woman was killed and her body was found dismembered inside a trash can in fraccionamiento Valle de Pueblo. 1 fatality.
Around 9 November 2025 (as reported), in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in plastic on a road leading to Colonia San Juan de Otates. 1 fatality.
On 9 November 2025, near La Estrella, Guerrero, suspected members of Los Ardillos clashes with members of the UPOEG. Two armed men were killed, unclear affiliation. 2 fatalities.

On 10 November 2025, in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, two men shot and killed a man and a woman and injured another man outside a bar in the intersection of Tomas Valles and Politecnico Nacional streets. Moments later, ministerial police officers shot and injured one of them and arrested both on Juan Escutia y Hochimin avenue. 2 fatalities, 2 injured.

On 10 November 2025, in Anahuac, Chihuahua, according to the victim, armed individuals in a car blocked the man's passage at a gas station together with another truck and people shot at him. The man fled to Colonia Benito Juarez. The victim was injured with minor wounds. 1 injured.

admin2: Heroica Ciudad de Juchitan de Zaragoza
source: 24 Horas (Mexico); El Proceso; La Silla Rota; Milenio; Quadratin Oaxaca
notes: On 10 November 2025, in Juchitan de Zaragoza, Oaxaca, suspected members of Los Cromo Gang and a member of the Auxiliary Banking, Industrial and Commercial Police (PABIC) killed two women, a man, and the daughter of one of the women on Vicente Guerrero avenue. The body of the girl was separately abandoned in a house in colonia La Planta. Three women and a police officer were arrested. 4 fatalities.
adm2_name: Heroica Ciudad de Juchitán de Zaragoza

notes: On 10 November 2025, in San Luis Potosi, San Luis Potosi, four men on two motorcycles shot and killed a suspected off-duty state police officers in Colonia Simon Diaz (drive-by). 1 fatality.

Around 10 November 2025 (as reported), near Heroica Guaymas, Sonora, a man was killed and his body was found by search collectives on the side of the highway between Heroica Guaymas and Hermosillo with signs of violence and a missing arm. It is unclear whether the arm was amputated or whether it was eaten by animals. 1 fatality.

On 11 November 2025, in Cuauhtemoc, Chihuahua, ministerial police officers attempted to intervene an armed man who upon seeing the police officers shot at them. Police officers shot at the man, injuring him. The man fled the scene and then crashed. 1 injured.

On 11 November 2025, in Ciudad de Mexico - Iztapalapa, one armed individual approached a man inside a car and shoots the man to death. The victim was identified as a man dedicated to extortion and money lending (gota a gota) and had been arrested four times before. 1 fatality.
On 11 November 2025, in Santiago, Colima, members of the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG) killed two people. One of the perpetrators was arrested later the same day. 2 fatalities.

On 11 November 2025, in Celaya, Guanajuato, two men on a motorcycle arrived at a mechanic's shop, one man entered the store, shot a man working at the shop and then fled the scene with the accomplice. The victim died. 1 fatality.

source: El Norte; El Sol de Acapulco
notes: On 11 November 2025, in La Estrella, Guerrero, an armed confrontation took place between two rival groups, resulting in the death of five people who were burned and two vehicles set on fire. One of the victims was identified as a member of Los Ardillos gang. This clash is suspectedly related to disputes between Los Ardillos and the policia comunitaria UPOEG, which also triggered a clash earlier on Sunday 9 November (coded separately). 5 fatalities.

Around 11 November 2025 (month of), in San Sebastian de Juarez, Hidalgo, a man was killed and his body was found with his hands and feet tied on the highway. The body was in a state of decomposition. 1 fatality.

On 11 November 2025, in El Salto, Jalisco, unknown armed individuals shot at two women traffic police officers while they were carrying out an operation after they stopped the vehicle in Colonia Lomas de San Juan. The individuals took both women to another location, forced them out of the vehicle and shot them to death. 2 fatalities.

On 11 November 2025, in Ecatepec de Morelos, Mexico, two armed individuals shot at a bus driver on his route. The driver managed to escape and reached Indios Verdes bus terminal where he sought help. The attack is suspected to be linked to the driver's refusal to pay extortion fees. 1 injured.
On 11 November 2025, in Cuautla, Morelos, two armed men approached a woman, shot her and then fled the scene in the downtown area. The woman was injured as a result. 1 injured.
On 11 November 2025, in Mazatepec, Morelos, two men shot at a restaurant from on a moving motorcycle (drive-by) in Colonia Santa Cruz Vista Alegre. One woman was injured as a result. 1 injured.
On 11 November 2025, in Ciudad Santa Catarina, Nuevo Leon, several armed men shot at two men in Colonia Senderos. One man was killed and another man was injured as a result. 1 fatality, 1 injured.
On 11 November 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, several armed men opened fire and shot a man outside a home in Colonia Vista and then fled the scene. The man died as a result. 1 fatality.

Around 11 November 2025 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds and signs of torture near the landfill in Colonia Bicentenario. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 11 November 2025, in Coatzacoalcos, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, armed individuals shot at officers of the Specialized Kidnapping Unit (coded as ministerial police) who were attempting to rescue a businessman and his wife in their home in Colonia Petrolera. Officers shot back injuring one individual. Officers arrested three men. 1 injured.
On 12 November 2025, in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, two armed men knocked on the door of a house and then shot and killed the man who opened the door in Colonia Praderas del Sur. 1 fatality.

On 12 November 2025, in Colima, Colima, unknown armed individuals on a motorcycle arrived in Colonia La Albarrada, shot at two individuals and then fled. One person died and another was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

On 12 November 2025, in Ciudad de Villa de Alvarez, Colima, unknown armed individuals on a motorcycle approached a man, shot him repeatedly in Colonia Real Bugambilias and then fled the scene. 1 fatality.
On 12 November 2025, in Irapuato, Guanajuato, armed individuals in a vehicle shot and injured at a man while riding his motorcycle (drive-by). The man lost control, crashed and died. 1 fatality.

On 12 November 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, two armed men shot at a building, injuring a man in colonia Ciudad Satelite. Also in Leon, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals shot and killed a man in the intersection of Medano and Aguas Buenas streets, in colonia Futurama. An unconfirmed version indicated that a relative of the victim was killed in the same area in August 2019. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

On 12 November 2025, in Chilpancingo de los Bravo, Guerrero, armed men shot a man inside his car in Colonia El Tomatal and then fled the scene. The victim was identified as an employee of the municipal government. 1 fatality.

On 12 November 2025, in Santiago Tulantepec de Lugo Guerrero, Hidalgo, a man shot and injured a municipal police officer who was chasing him after he tried to escape a police search on Mexico Avenue. 1 injured.

On 12 November 2025, in Ecatepec de Morelos, Mexico, two armed men on a motorcycle drove by and opened fire from their motorcycle at a man in Colonia Rio de Luz (drive-by). Two men were shot and both died as a result. One of the men was identified as the leader of local merchants. 2 fatalities.

Around 12 November 2025 (month of), in Santa Ana Nextlalpan, Mexico, a man was killed and his body was found inside a drain in a state of decomposition and wrapped in several bags. The victim is believed to be a Catholic priest who was reported missing on 27 October in Tultepec. 1 fatality.

On 12 November 2025, in Tlalnepantla, Mexico, two individuals on a motorcycle shot at an off-duty agent of Ciudad de Mexico Attorney General's Office on Lazaro Cardenas street, in colonia San Miguel Chalma (drive-by). The victim tried to escape but the perpetrators chased and killed him. He was suspectedly involved in vehicle theft along with his cousin, who was killed in the same neighborhood on 18 June 2025 (unspecified circumstances). 1 fatality.

On 12 November 2025, near Los Cajones, Michoacan de Ocampo, the military, the National Guard and the state police were conducting operations when they were attacked by armed individuals. Officers shot back and three men and one woman were arrested. Officers seized weapons and vehicles. There were no casualties.

Around 12 November 2025 (as reported), near Capacuaro, Michoacan de Ocampo, two people were killed and their bodies were found on the side of the road Uruapan-Paracho. One of the victims was identified as a teenage boy and the other was wrapped in plastic bags and remains unidentified. 2 fatalities.

On 12 November 2025, in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals shot and killed a man in the intersection of Benjamin Franklin and Mariano Paredes streets, in colonia Benito Juarez. The victim was a relative of a boy who was murdered in colonia Estrella the day before (unspecified circumstances). 1 fatality.
On 12 November 2025, in San Miguel las Minas, Puebla, individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a man on Principal street (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 12 November 2025, in San Luis Potosi, San Luis Potosi, armed individuals shot at police officers in Colonia Prados Glorieta and then escaped in a vehicle. Police officers chased them and managed to arrest all four individuals. One weapon was seized and the driver was found intoxicated. There were no casualties.

On 12 November 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, a man and a woman on a motorcycle opened fire and shot a man standing outside a house in Colonia Los Pinos (drive-by). Shortly after, the same couple shot another man in the same neighborhood. One man died and the other was injured as a result. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

Around 12 November 2025 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in plastic in Colonia Nueva Vizcaya. The man was kidnapped by two men the day before. 1 fatality.

Around 12 November 2025 (between 12 - 13 November), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man who was abducted in fraccionamiento Jardines del Pedregal on 12 November was killed and his body was found in plastic bags and along with a criminal message in sector Humaya on 13 November. 1 fatality.
On 12 November 2025, near San Pedro, Sinaloa, armed men arrived on a motorcycle and shot a man next to a funeral home next to the Culiacan-Navolato highway. The man died as a result. 1 fatality.

On 12 November 2025, in Cocorit, Sonora, two individuals shot and killed a man inside a house that was suspectedly used as a drug selling point in colonia Centro. The victim, who suspectedly belonged to a criminal group and had criminal records for murder and robbery, had arrived to the house to demand the payment of a debt. 1 fatality.

Around 12 November 2025 (as reported), in Hermosillo, Sonora, a man was killed and his body was found with the hands tied and signs of torture in El Carcamo sports field, in the intersection of Francisco Serna boulevard and Fidel Velazquez street, in colonia Hacienda de la Flor. 1 fatality.

notes: On 12 November 2025, in Alamo, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, according to witnesses, individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man and injured another while they were working as citrus cutters on 5 de Mayo street, in colonia Miguel Aleman (drive-by). 1 fatality, 1 injured.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 12 November 2025 (as reported), in La Estancia, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture and with a gunshot to his head on the side of the Orizaba-Puebla highway at KM 42. 1 fatality.

On 13 November 2025, in Ensenada, Baja California, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals shot and killed a man in the intersection of Marmol street and Abelardo L. Rodriguez avenue, in colonia Costa Azul. 1 fatality.

Around 13 November 2025 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a man was killed and his body was found in the trunk of a vehicle that was set on fire in the intersection of Jazmin and Orquideas streets, in fraccionamiento Residencial Alameda. 1 fatality.

On 13 November 2025, in Tijuana, Baja California, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals shot and killed a man in the intersection of Cruz del Sur and Tecate streets, in colonia Camino Verde. 1 fatality.

Around 13 November 2025 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in blankets and with a plastic bag over the head on De los Insurgentes street, in colonia Buena Vista. 1 fatality.

Around 13 November 2025 (as reported), between Ciudad Juarez and Aldama, Chihuahua, a man was killed and his body was found semi-naked and with the hands tied on km. 25+500 of Ciudad Juarez-Aldama road. 1 fatality.

Around 13 November 2025 (as reported), in Ciudad de Mexico - Cuauhtemoc, unidentified individuals shot and killed a vendor who was suspectedly part of a criminal group dedicated to drug trafficking in the intersection of Jesus Carranza and Bartolome de las Casas streets, in colonia Morelos. 1 fatality.

On 13 November 2025, in Colima, Colima, according to witnesses, individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in the intersection of Gabino Barreda and Aldama streets (drive-by). Also in Colima, individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man on Ninos Heroes avenue (drive-by). 2 fatalities.
Around 13 November 2025 (as reported), in Manzanillo, Colima, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in bags by the Eden bridge on Manzanillo-Armeria road. 1 fatality.
Around 13 November 2025 (as reported), in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, a woman was killed and her body was found wrapped in blankets in colonia Parques La Noria. 1 fatality.

On 13 November 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, individuals on a motorcycle shot and injured a man at a restaurant on Brisa de Bilbao street, in colonia Brisas del Campestre (drive-by). 1 injured.

notes: Around 13 November 2025 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, two women were killed and their bodies were found with the hands and feet tied, a cut in the throat and wrapped in bags on Jose San Martin street, in colonia La Libertad. Around 13 November 2025 (as reported), between Chilpancingo de los Bravo and Iguala, an off-duty military officer was killed and his body was found with signs of torture and inside bags next to Chilpancingo-Iguala road, by the area known as Los Chones. 1 fatality.

Around 13 November 2025 (as reported), between Almoloya and Vista Hermosa, Hidalgo, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in plastic and inside a suitcase on the path between both communities. 1 fatality.

Around 13 November 2025 (as reported), in the municipality of Gabriel Zamora (coded to Lombardia), Michoacan de Ocampo, a group of individuals shot at military, National Guard and state police officers, who shot back and arrested a woman and three men, including a boy. There were no casualties.

On 13 November 2025, in La Mira, Michoacan de Ocampo, an individual on a motorcycle shot and killed a man and injured a woman who were in a vehicle on Geologos street, in colonia Vista Hermosa (drive-by). 1 fatality, 1 injured.

On 13 November 2025, in Oaxtepec, Morelos, two individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man and injured another(drive-by). The victims suspectedly belonged to a rival extortion criminal group. A taxi driver who was in the area was collaterally shot and died. 2 fatalities, 1 injured.

Around 13 November 2025 (as reported), in Pesqueria, Nuevo Leon, a man was killed and his body was found semi-naked, with stab wounds and the hands and feet tied in an area known as Perimetral Oriente, between colonia Colinas del Aeropuerto and the pantheon of the community of Zacatequitas. 1 fatality.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 13 November 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a man and injured another in the intersection of Anenecuilco avenue and Revolucion de Ayutla street, in colonia Emiliano Zapata (drive-by). Also in Culiacan, individuals in a van and a motorcycle shot and killed two men on Alvaro Obregon avenue, in colonia Las Cucas, by fraccionamiento Residencial Marsella (drive-by). 3 fatalities, 1 injured.

Around 13 November 2025 (month of), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and the body was found in an advanced state of decomposition and wrapped in a blanket in the intersection of Paseo del Humaya and Jesus Aldama avenues, in colonia Lomas de Guadalupe. 1 fatality.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: Around 13 November 2025 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture, the hands tied, the face covered with a scarf and along with an unspecified criminal message under the bridge on Libramiento Benito Juarez avenue, known as La Costerita. 1 fatality.
Around 13 November 2025 (as reported), in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, four men abducted a woman on Constituyentes street, in colonia Diaz Ordaz, whose whereabouts are unknown.
On 13 November 2025, in Mazatlan, Sinaloa, two men on a motorcycle shot and injured a man on Corona street, in colonia Montuosa (drive-by). 1 injured.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 13 November 2025, in Licenciado Benito Juarez, Sinaloa, rival armed groups clashed in colonia Jose Lopez Portillo. One man was found dead and another was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injured.
On 13 November 2025, in Hermosillo, Sonora, four men shot and killed a man in his house on Cerrada Pilares street, in colonia Las Minitas. 1 fatality.

source: E-Consulta; El Norte; El Proceso; El Universal (Mexico); Imagen del Golfo; La Silla Rota; Milenio; Riodoce
notes: On 13 November 2025, in Jaltipan de Morelos, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, unidentified individuals shot at El Parcero Ranch, owned by the mayor-elect of the MC party, on 185 Transistmica Acayucan-Jaltipan federal road. At the moment of the attack, the mayor was in Xalapa-Enriquez but there were workers in the building, who remained uninjured. The mayor had requested security since 1 September 2025 but the authorities had not yet provided it. There were no casualties.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 13 November 2025, in Tierra Blanca, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, unidentified individuals shot and killed a man outside his house in colonia Hoja de Maiz. The perpetrators took the body with them and abandoned it inside bags on the highway to La Tinaja, where it was found hours later, on 14 November. The victim was linked to groups dedicated to 'huachicoleo' (fuel theft) and was the sibling of a former federal deputy of the Morena party. He had just returned to Tierra Blanca after fleeing the municipality in 2016, following the abduction of another of his siblings and the murder of his nephew. 1 fatality.

On 14 November 2025, in Cuauhtemoc, Chihuahua, individuals in a vehicle shot and injured two men who were driving on Tascates y Flores Magon street (drive-by). The victims were on-duty employees of the company Plataforma Centinela, which provides maintenance services to the municipal video surveillance system. 2 injured.

On 14 November 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, a man shot and killed a man who was selling flowers in colonia San Nicolas and then fled on a motorcycle driven by an accomplice. 1 fatality.

On 14 November 2025, in El Tejocote, Guerrero, suspected gang members shot and used drones to attack the town. Two people disappeared and two vehicles were damaged and burned. The area where the attack occurred is known for being disputed by Los Ardillos and Los Tlacos gangs. Casualties unknown.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); El Norte; El Siglo de Durango; El Sol de Acapulco; El Universal (Mexico); La Jornada; La Verdad; Milenio; Quadratin Oaxaca; SDP Noticias
notes: On 14 November 2025, in Marquelia, Guerrero, according to witnesses, unidentified men shot and killed a businessman and leader of Section 110 of the Confederation of Mexican Workers (CTM). The victim was also the son of the former mayor of Ometepec. 1 fatality.

Around 14 November 2025 (as reported), in Guadalajara, Jalisco, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in blankets in the intersection of Naranjo and Sabino streets, in colonia Del Fresno. 1 fatality.

On 6 November 2025, El Zangarro, Michoacan de Ocampo, suspected members of the CJNG shot at the house of an environmental activist and member of the Promoting Council for the Defense of the Forests of Villa Madero. An man and a woman who were near the place were hit by stray bullets, the woman died. This attack is related to a second attack on 7 November targeting another activists (coded separately). Following these attacks, the activists fled the region. 2 injured.

On 14 November 2025, in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, two men on a motorcycle shot and injured a man on Cadereyta street, in colonia Topo Chico (drive-by). The attack happened outside an elementary school while the victim was about to pick up his partner's grandson. 1 injured.

Around 14 November 2025 (as reported), in La Resurreccion, Puebla, at least two men shot and killed two men in the intersection of Margarita Moran and Luis Cordova streets, in colonia 2 de Marzo. 2 fatalities.
On 14 November 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, individuals in a vehicle shot and injured an off-duty municipal traffic police officer in fraccionamiento Hacienda del Valle (drive-by). 1 injured.

On 14 November 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, a man shot and killed a man in his house on Cuatro Estaciones street, in colonia El Ranchito, and then fled on a motorcycle driven by an accomplice. 1 fatality.

On 14 November 2025, in Mazatlan, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals shot and injured a woman who was driving in the intersection of 3 de Julio street and Insurgentes avenue, in colonia Ruben Jaramillo. This attack was likely linked to the wave of violence caused by the conflict within the Sinaloa Cartel. 1 injured.

On 14 November 2025, in Toboloto, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals shot and injured a man at a seafood restaurant. This attack was likely linked to the wave of violence caused by the conflict within the Sinaloa Cartel. 1 injured.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 14 November 2025, in Acayucan, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals shot and killed a man on Benito Barriovero street. A stray bullet injured another man. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

On 6 November 2025, in San Luis Rio Colorado, Sonora, armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a young man in Colonia Solidaridad (drive-by). The victim was the son of a police officer who was killed before. 1 fatality.
Around 7 November 2025 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a woman was killed and the body was found wrapped in a blanket in Ejido Francisco Villa. 1 fatality.

On 7 November 2025, in Ciudad de Villa de Alvarez, Colima, armed individuals shot and killed a municipal police officer who was on leave when he was travelling in a taxi in Colonia La Gloria. The officer had received threats before. He was going to re-incorporate to work again. 1 fatality.

On 7 November 2025, in Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, unidentified individuals shot and killed a man and injured another one inside a house. At least one of the victims had criminal records and drugs were found in the room where ethe victims were attacked. 1 fatality.
Around 8 November 2025 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of violence and inside a plastic barrel in Colonia Morelos. 1 fatality.

Around 8 November 2025 (as reported), in Ecatepec de Morelos, Mexico, two young men were killed and their bodies were found with signs of violence and shotgun wounds inside the trunk if a vehicle in Colonia Mathzi 2. According to the father of one of the victims, they were suspectedly involved in ilegal activities. 2 fatalities.

On 8 November 2025, in Zamora de Hidalgo, Michoacan, there was an armed clash between the ministerial police and armed individuals during a police patrol in Colonia Nueva Espana. One armed man was killed. Drugs were seized. 1 fatality.
On 8 November 2025, in Cuernavaca, Morelos, according to witnesses, two armed individuals who arrived on a motorcycle shot and injured a man in colonia Revolucion.
On 8 November 2025, in Tres Marias, Morelos, several armed men shot and killed two employees of the Huitzilac Communal Property Office. 2 fatalities.
On 8 November 2025, in Montemorelos, Nuevo Leon, armed individuals shot and killed two men when they were driving a vehicle around Cuesta de Garrapatas (drive-by). 2 fatalities.

Around 8 November 2025 (as reported), in Campo El Diez, Sinaloa, two men were killed and their bodies were found around the Piggy Back area. At least one of the bodies, was handcuffed and with tape around his head. 2 fatalities.

Around 8 November 2025 (as reported), around Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, four men were killed and their bodies were found with signs of torture on the Culiacan-Mazatlan highway around Ixpalino. 4 fatalities.

On 8 November 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, armed individuals entered a house and shot and injured two men in fraccionamiento Rincon del Parque. In another event, armed individuals shot and killed a man who had been kidnapped and left him with signs of torture near a military office. 1 fatality.

On 8 November 2025, in Licenciado Benito Juarez (Villa Juarez), Sinaloa, armed individuals shot and killed two men who were brothers in a mechanic workshop. Another person was also injured. The perpetrators also threw explosive devices which caused material damages to the workshop. Another version suggest that the explosive devices were launched from drones. 2 fatalities.

On 8 November 2025, in Macuspana, Tabasco, armed individuals shot and killed three women in Colonia El Castano. According to the authorities, the event could be related to a settling of accounts as at least one of the victims was close to a criminal local leader. Later a local leader from the CJNG was arrested for suspectedly being involved in the attack, among with other 20 people, including municipal police officers. 3 fatalities.

On 8 November 2025, around Reynosa, Tamaulipas, there was an armed clash between the state police and armed individuals during a police patrol on the TAM-Santo Domingo road. Weapons were seized. There are two versions, one is that five armed men were arrested and another one indicates that they were killed. 5 fatalities.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 8 November 2025, in Coatepec, Veracruz, armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and injured a man and a woman (drive-by).
On 9 November 2025, in Tijuana, Baja California, according to witnesses, two armed men shot and injured a woman and a man in Colonia Altamira.

On 9 November 2025, in Irapuato, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, a group of armed individuals shot and killed two men and injured another one when the perpetrators shot at people in the market on Avenida Las Aguilas. 2 fatalities.

Around 9 November 2025 (as reported), in Chilpancingo de los Bravo, Guerrero, an active military officer was killed and his body was found wrapped in a blanket in colonia Omiltemi. 1 fatality.

On 9 November 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals entered a house during a party and shot and killed four people and injured another four in Colonia Lazaro Cardenas. The killed victims were a woman, her partner and two sons. 4 fatalities.

On 10 November 2025, in Ensenada, Baja California, three armed men shot and killed a man in fraccionamiento Playa Ensenada. 1 fatality.

On 10 November 2025, in Comondu, Baja California Sur, an armed man shot at ministerial police officers from a house where he was hiding in Colonia Los Pinos. The officers answered the attack and killed the man. 1 fatality.
On 10 November 2025, in Ciudad de Mexico - Iztapalapa, two armed individuals shot and injured two people in colonia Desarrollo Urbano Quetzalcoatl.
On 10 November 2025, in Cuautitlan, Mexico, armed individuals shot against a beer store and injured four people who were drinking at the store in Colonia San Mateo Ixtacalco.
On 10 November 2025, in Cuautla, Morelos, two armed men entered a bar and shot and killed a man who as working there in Colonia Centro. 1 fatality.

Around 10 November 2025 (as reported), in Cuautla, Morelos, a person was killed and the body was found dismembered inside plastic bags in colonia Emiliano Zapata. Also in Cuautla, a person was killed and only the head was found in Colonia Hermenegildo Galeana. 2 fatalities.
On 10 November 2025, in Cuernavaca, Morelos, two armed men shot and killed two men in Colonia Ruben Jaramillo. 2 fatalities.
On 10 November 2025, in Garcia, Nuevo Leon, there was an armed clash between armed individuals against the state police and National Guard in Colonia Valle de Lincoln. Casualties unknown.

On 10 November 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals shot and killed a man in Colonia Bicentenario. This incident occurred amid a wave of violent attacks in Sinaloa state, likely related to the war between factions of the Sinaloa Cartel. 1 fatality.
On 10 November 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, armed individuals shot and injured a man in Colonia Miguel Hidalgo (drive-by).

On 10 November 2025, in El Chilillo, Sinaloa, armed individuals shot and killed a woman in her house. This incident occurred amid a wave of violent attacks in Sinaloa state, likely related to the war between factions of the Sinaloa Cartel. 1 fatality.

On 16 October 2025, in Guajes de Ayala, Guerrero, according to residents, armed groups clashed and shot at civilians as part of a criminal group's attempts to seize territories in the area. An individual who suspectedly participated in the clash was found dead on 19 November 2025. 1 fatality.

On 6 November 2025, in Ecatepec de Morelos, Mexico, two municipal police officers abducted two men and one woman on Carlos Hank Gonzalez avenue, in colonia Valle de Anahuac, and forced them to call their relatives to demand a ramson. The authorities arrested the perpetrators. The victims' whereabouts are unknown.
On 8 November 2025, in Jacona de Plancarte, Michoacan de Ocampo, Investigation police officers clashed with a man and killed him during a search operation in colonia Nueva Espana. 1 fatality.

Around 15 November 2025 (between 15 - 16 November), in Mexicali, Baja California, a woman who disappeared on 15 November was killed and her body was found burned in La Herradura on 16 November. 1 fatality.

Around 15 November 2025 (as reported), in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, a man was killed and his body was found in a sack next to De las Liebres stream, in colonia Santo Domingo. The body was found on 19 November 2025, but residents had reported foul odors suspectedly caused by the body since 15 November 2025. 1 fatality.

On 16 November 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals shot and killed two men who were in a van on Enrique Sanchez Alonso boulevard, in sector Tres Rios. One of the victims was a TikTok influencer who posted content wearing gear with the name of Los Mayitos gang. Some reports suggest that the victim was a suspected collaborators of the cartel. Hours before the attack, he had posted pictures carrying firearms. 2 fatalities.
On 16 November 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals clashed in fraccionamiento Barcelona. An individual died and five were arrested. 1 fatality.

On 17 November 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, two individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man and injured another in the intersection of Feldespato and Gabro streets, in colonia Pedregales de Echeveste (drive-by). 1 fatality, 1 injured.

On 17 November 2025, in Salamanca, Guanajuato, two individuals shot at municipal police officers. The officers shot back and injured and arrested them. Moments before, the individuals had shot at a house in Irapuato (coded separately). 2 injured.

On 17 November 2025, in Santa Rosa 30, Morelos, unidentified individuals shot at police officers and injured one of them on Via Central avenue. The officers chased them to San Miguel 30, where the perpetrators fled. 1 injured.

On 17 November 2025, in Ciudad Santa Catarina, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals had an argument with a man in the intersection of Lopez Rayon and Jose Maria Morelos streets and then shot and killed him. The victim had criminal records for drug trafficking. 1 fatality.

On 17 November 2025, in Ocotlan de Morelos, Oaxaca, unidentified individuals shot and injured a man on Morelos avenue. Minutes later, the victim was being transported in an ambulance by San Jacinto Chilateca when the perpetrators intercepted it and shot and killed the victim in front of the health workers. 1 fatality.
On 17 November 2025, in Mazatlan, Sinaloa, two individuals on motorcycles shot and killed a man who was about to enter a seafood restaurant in colonia Montuosa (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 17 November 2025, in Hermosillo, Sonora, according to witnesses, two individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a traffic municipal police officer in the intersection of Dalia avenue and Tabachines street, in colonia Adolfo Lopez Mateos (drive-by). An individual was arrested and the authorities seized drugs. 1 fatality.

Around 17 November 2025 (as reported), in Hermosillo, Sonora, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a blanket, with the hands tied and some fingers mutilated on Sierra Las Huertas street, in colonia Solidaridad. 1 fatality.

On 17 November 2025, in Hermosillo, Sonora, two men and a boy abducted a man, forced him to get on a vehicle and beat him in the intersection of Carlos B. Maldonado and Cuevas streets, in fraccionamiento Privadas del Rey. The authorities arrested the perpetrators and released the victim. Also in Hermosillo, according to witnesses, two individuals got off a vehicle and shot and injured a man in the intersection of San Pedro and 12 de Octubre streets, in colonia Lomas de Madrid. 2 injured.

source: AFN - Tijuana; El Norte; La Silla Rota
notes: On 18 November 2025, in Tijuana, Baja California, three men shot and killed a woman lawyer who was driving in the intersection of Mulege and Canon streets, in colonia Altamira Sur. The victim was president of the 10th District at the Baja California State Electoral Institute (IEEBC). In 2024, she was the alternate candidate for the Institutional Revolutionary Party (PRI) for the 9th district seat in the state legislature. The perpetrators were linked to drug trafficking. 1 fatality.

Around 18 November 2025 (as reported), in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, several men abducted a man and took him to a house on Manuel Tellez Huelga street, in colonia Leon I. There, the authorities arrested the perpetrators and released the victim.

Around 18 November 2025 (as reported), in San Juan de Abajo, Guanajuato, a man was killed and, according to witnesses, several men abandoned the body on Timoteo Lozano boulevard and fled in a van. 1 fatality.

Around 18 November 2025 (month of), in Tulancingo, Hidalgo, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in plastic, in an advanced state of decomposition and with the hands tied and signs of torture inside a cistern in colonia Jaltepec. 1 fatality.

Around 18 November 2025 (month of), in Santa Ana Jilotzingo, Mexico, a man was killed and his body was found decapitated, with the hands and feet tied with wire, signs of torture and in an advanced state of decomposition. 1 fatality.

Around 18 November 2025 (as reported), near Cuernavaca, Morelos, two men were killed and their bodies were found with the hands and feet tied, gunshot wounds and in the trunk of a vehicle on a path to El Copalar. 2 fatalities.

Around 18 November 2025 (as reported), in Montemorelos, Nuevo Leon, individuals in a van shot and killed a man in the intersection of Bustamante and Cuauhtemoc streets (drive-by). The victim was a former member of the now-defunct State Judicial Police. He was dismissed in 1997 for transporting a cargo of 500 kg of marijuana in Camargo, Tamaulipas. 1 fatality.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); 8 Columnas; E-Consulta; El Norte; La Jornada; La Prensa de Monclova; La Silla Rota; Milenio; Mural; Reforma; Sintesis; Zeta Tijuana
notes: On 18 November 2025, in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, according to witnesses and security cameras footage, six men got off three motorcycles and shot at workers and customers of the La Coss bar and set it on fire in colonia Popular Coatepec. Six employees (one of them a Cuban national) died from carbon monoxide poisoning, and at least 10 were injured by poisoning and burns. According to the authorities, the attack responded to disputes over drug trafficking. The bar was also linked to cases of human trafficking. 6 fatalities, at least 10 injured.

On 18 November 2025, in Santa Maria Moyotzingo, Puebla, individuals on motorcycles shot and killed a man and injured another who were aboard a motorcycle in the intersection of Guillermo Prieto and Francisco Javier Mina streets (drive-by). 1 fatality, 1 injured.

Around 18 November 2025 (as reported), in Campo El Diez, Sinaloa, according to the victims, armed men abducted 20 trailer drivers (17 men and three women) during around 24 hours, when the authorities rescued them. This abduction was suspectedly linked to the abduction and murder of a man, whose body was found on Culiacan-Eldorado road on 8 November 2025 under unknown circumstances.

On 18 November 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, individuals in a vehicle chased, shot and killed a man who was driving in Bacurimi. This attack was likely linked to the wave of violence caused by the conflict within the Sinaloa Cartel. 1 fatality.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce

At the moment of the attack there were several workers and clients, and two women and one man were injured. 3 injured.

On 18 November 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, an unidentified individual shot and killed a man who was working as a stylist on Jardin de las Orquideas boulevard, in fraccionamiento Colinas de la Rivera, and then fled with an accomplice. 1 fatality.

source: El Siglo de Durango; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 18 November 2025, in Mazatlan, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, three individuals threw an IED at a beer store on Manuel J. Clouthier avenue, in fraccionamiento La Foresta. The explosion injured a woman, while unconfirmed versions indicated that more people were injured but abandoned the area on their own. Two other attacks against beer stores took place in Mazatlan the same day (coded separately). At least 1 injured.

On 18 November 2025, in Mazatlan, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals shot at a beer store on Delfines avenue, in fraccionamiento Torremolinos. A client, who was an off-duty state police officer, was injured. Also in Mazatlan, unidentified individuals shot at a beer store in colonia Ampliacion Valle de Urias. Two men were injured. Two other attacks against beer stores took place in Mazatlan the same day (coded separately). Another attacks against beer stores took place in Mazatlan the same day (coded separately). 3 injured.

On 18 November 2025, in Hermosillo, Sonora, according to the victim's five children who witnessed the attack, a group of men shot and killed a woman in a drug selling point on Cabo San Pedro street, in colonia Manuel Gomez Morin. The body was found next to a dose of methamphetamine. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
source: E-Consulta; El Universal (Mexico); Imagen del Golfo; La Silla Rota; Milenio
notes: On 18 November 2025, around Texmola, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, gang members and members of Pueblos Unidos self-defense group clashed in Paso Carretas, Atzitzintla, Puebla. The combatants travelled aboard armored and artillery vehicles and the clash extended along Xometla-Loma Grande until they reached Texmola, Veracruz. There, military and state police officers arrested four individuals, one of whom was injured. During the clash, the presence of armed individuals was reported in the nearby towns of Loma Grande, El Xuchil, Toluca, Capulin, Huilapan, Atzitzintla, Texmalaquilla, Chichipica and San Juanero. Following the confrontation, members of La Barredora Gang posted a message on social media accusing the mayor of Atzitzintla of supporting Pueblos Unidos and allowing them to carry out vehicle thefts and drive armored vehicles. 5 fatalities, 1 injured.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
source: 24 Horas (Mexico); E-Consulta; Imagen del Golfo; La Jornada; Milenio; SDP Noticias; Sintesis
notes: On 18 November 2025, in Comoapan, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, according to witnesses, unidentified men shot and killed a man in his house on Mariano Escobedo street. An unconfirmed version indicated that they also injured and abducted his grandchild, whose whereabouts are unknown. The man was a former municipal police officer who ran for mayor with the All for Veracruz Party (TxVer) in 2021. An alternative version indicated that he ran with the Solidarity Encounter Party (PES). 1 fatality.
Around 19 November 2025 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a man was killed and the body was found with his hands and feet tied up in colonia Tres de Octubre. 1 fatality.

Around 19 November 2025 (as reported), in Loreto, Baja California Sur, a man and a woman were killed in a house in colonia Acueducto and their bodies were found with gunshot wounds. According to the authorities, this attack was linked to the conflict within the Sinaloa Cartel. 2 fatalities.

Around 19 November 2025 (as reported), in Nuevo Casas Grandes, Chihuahua, unidentified individuals shot and killed the former mayor of Ignacio Zaragoza when he was in his vehicle on Josefa Ortiz de Dominguez street. The victim had also ran for deputy as a member of the MC party. 1 fatality.

Around 19 November 2025 (as reported), in Ciudad de Mexico - Cuauhtemoc, according to security cameras footage, an unidentified individual shot and killed a boy who worked for La Union Tepito when he was eating at a restaurant with his girlfriend and stepson in colonia Morelos. 1 fatality.

On 19 November 2025, in Lagunillas, Guanajuato, at least two men aboard a van stopped their vehicle in front of a house on Ninos Heroes street and shot at it. A man, a woman and a child were killed. 3 fatalities.
Around 19 November 2025 (as reported), in Valle de Santiago, Guanajuato, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a blanket on Miguel Marquez boulevard. 1 fatality.
On 19 November 2025, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, three men shot and killed a vendor at the Soriana market, in colonia Emiliano Zapata. 1 fatality.

On 19 November 2025, in Cuernavaca, Morelos, a group of individuals got a man off a vehicle, shot and killed him, and abandoned his body wrapped in a shower curtain on Zapote street, in colonia Paraiso Montesori. 1 fatality.

Around 19 November 2025 (between 19 - 20 November), in Totolapan, Morelos, two armed man kidnapped a man on 19 November. He was killed and his body was found a day later in Tlalnepantla. 1 fatality.

On 19 November 2025, in Ciudad Apodaca, Nuevo Leon, according to residents, an armed man entered a house and shot and killed a man in Colonia Fuentes de San Miguel. The perpetrator ran away with an accomplice that was already waiting for him. 1 fatality.

On 19 November 2025, in China, Nuevo Leon, there was an armed clash between the ministerial police and armed individuals after they shot at the police and crashed their vehicle during a police patrol in Rancho Ebanos. There were no casualties.

On 19 November 2025, in Guadalupe, Nuevo Leon, an armed individual shot and killed a woman and injured her little son in Colonia Canada Blanca. The target was the partner of the woman. The perpetrator ran away with his accomplice. 1 fatality.

On 19 November 2025, in San Lucas Atoyatenco, Puebla, two individuals on a motorcycle shot at a store in the intersection of Reforma avenue and Central street (drive-by). A man was injured. 1 injured.
On 19 November 2025, in Tehuitzingo, Puebla, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals shot at three people aboard a vehicle. A man died and two were injured. 1 fatality, 2 injured.
On 19 November 2025, in Aguaruto, Sinaloa, an armed group that travelled in at least two vehicles beat and abducted a taxi driver on Sinaloa street. The victim's whereabouts are unknown. 1 injured.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; El Universal (Mexico); Riodoce
notes: On 19 November 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unidentified individuals shot at a woman and a man who had just left the international airport and were driving towards La Costerita avenue. On 19 November 2025, in Cofradia, Sinaloa, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man and injured a woman while they were driving. The victims crashed their vehicle. This incident occurred amid a wave of violent attacks in Sinaloa state, likely related to the war between factions of the Sinaloa Cartel. 1 fatality.

Around 19 November 2025 (as reported), in Buenos Aires, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds. This incident occurred amid a wave of violent attacks in Sinaloa state, likely related to the war between factions of the Sinaloa Cartel. 1 fatality.

On 19 November 2025, in Licenciado Benito Juarez, Sinaloa, individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a man in the intersection of Sexta, Plan de Ayala and Otilio Montano streets, in colonia Las Canitas (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 19 November 2025, in Hermosillo, Sonora, according to residents, three men shot and killed a woman in her house, which was also used as a scrap metal buying and selling point, in colonia Solidaridad. 1 fatality.

Around 19 November 2025 (as reported), in Macuspana, Tabasco, state police and National Guard officers clashed with members of a criminal group. The officers arrested six men and a woman and seized drugs on Carlos A. Madrazo avenue. Casualties unknown.

notes: On 21 November 2025, in El Tejar, Veracruz, there was an armed clash between armed individuals in several vehicles and the state police after the armed individuals ambushed the officers during a police patrol. One state police officer was killed. 1 fatality.

source: El Siglo de Durango; Quadratin Oaxaca
notes: On 16 November 2025, in El Guasimal, Sinaloa, armed rival groups engaged in an armed clash, resulting in the death of five people. Later, police officers with the National Guard and the military conducted an operation where they arrested nine people and seized vehicles. 5 fatalities.
Around 15 November 2025 (as reported), in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a blanket in fraccionamiento de Pensiones. 1 fatality.

source: El Proceso; El Siglo de Durango; Tiempo
notes: On 15 November 2025, in Hidalgo del Parral, Chihuahua, members of La Linea Gang attacked members of the Los Salguieros gang on the Parral-Jimenez highway at KM 2 at the Santa Teresa horse track. One man was kidnapped during the attack. Authorities seized 12 vehicles and also engaged in an armed clash (coded separately). Eight people were killed and between six and 11 were injured. At least three of the victims killed were identified as members of the Los Salgueiros Gang, one of whom was the leader of the gang. Members of La Linea gang staged a (narco) roadblock with vehicles on the Parral-Jimenez highway in an attempt to prevent police from chasing them after a clash (coded separately). 8 fatalities, at least 6 injured.

On 16 November 2025, in San Ignacio de Arareco, Chihuahua, unknown armed individuals shot and killed the former Indigenous mayor of the PAN party inside her business. The victim was part of the Raramuri Indigenous group. 1 fatality.
Around 15 November 2025 (as reported), in Yecapixtla, Morelos, a person was killed and the body was found dismembered inside plastic bags in Colonia Juan Morales. 1 fatality.

On 16 November 2025, in Cancun, Quintana Roo, two unknown armed individuals shot and killed an off-duty Quintana Roo State Attorney General's Office (FGE) in the hotel area hours after the arrest of a member of the CJNG. The FGE officer was part of the investigative unit focused on drug trafficking-related crimes. Six men and a boy who belonged to a gang dedicated to drug trafficking were arrested. 1 fatality.

source: El Norte; El Siglo de Durango
notes: On 17 November 2025, in Gomez Palacio, Durango, according to witnesses and security cameras footage, one unknown armed man shot and killed the former secretary of City Council outside his home on Palomas street, in Colonia Parque Hundido. 1 fatality.

On 17 November 2025, in Guadalajara, Jalisco, two armed men on a motorcycle approached a man outside a bar in Colonia Providencia and shot and killed him. Two security guards were also injured as a result. 1 fatality, 2 injured.

source: El Norte; La Prensa de Monclova
notes: On 14 November 2025, in San Nicolas de los Garza, Nuevo Leon, two men on a bicycle shot at a home where people were socializing in Colonia Prados del Nogalar. One girl and one male teenager were killed as a result. 2 fatalities.

The home in which both men lived was identified as a drug sales point (victims likely involved in drug sale). 2 fatalities.

On 16 November 2025, in Leon de los Aldama, Guanajuato, four men on two motorcycles arrived at a bar and shot at several people in Colonia Parque Industrial Colinas de Leon. Two people died and two were injured as a result. 2 fatalities, 2 injured.

notes: On 17 November 2025, in El Cuyo, Campeche, two individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a municipal councilor of the Morena party in Palizada (drive-by). The victim intended to run for mayor for the third time. According to a version, the attack was suspectedly linked to confidential information the victim had about the former state governor. She also belonged to Section 4 of the National Union of Education Workers (SNTE). 1 fatality.
On 17 November 2025, in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, at least two armed individuals shot and killed a man while he was working at his business at the central market. 1 fatality.

source: El Norte; El Siglo de Durango; El Sol de Sinaloa; Riodoce
notes: On 16 November 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, two men arrived at a home, one man got off, entered a home and shot a man to death in Colonia La Huizachez. The man died as a result and the perpetrator fled the scene with the accomplice. 1 fatality.

On 17 November 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unknown armed individuals shot at a couple driving a vehicle in Colonia Bachigualuato and fled the scene. One woman died and two people were injured. This attack was likely linked to the wave of violence caused by the conflict within the Sinaloa Cartel. 1 fatality, 2 injured.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); El Proceso; El Sol de Sinaloa; Milenio; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 15 November 2025, in Licenciado Benito Juarez, Sinaloa, according to witnesses, gang members launched a grenade suspectedly from a drone during a celebration party in Colonia 4 de Marzo. The explosion injured eight people, five of them children. 8 injured.
On 17 November 2025, in Culiacan Rosales, Sinaloa, unknown armed individuals shot at a bus driver while he was working in Colonia Rosario Uzarraga. The driver died as a result. 1 fatality.

Around 14 November 2025 (month of), in La Sabana, Guerrero, a man was killed and his body was found in a state of decomposition inside the trunk of a car. The victim was identified as a military officer. 1 fatality.
Around 16 November 2025 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a person was killed and the body was found burned and with both feet and hands tied in Colonia Palma Real. 1 fatality.

notes: On 17 November 2025, near Camembaro, Michoacan de Ocampo, ministerial and state police and military officers engaged in an armed clash with members of the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG) in an operation that sought to arrest the cartel's regional leader in La Cantera, who managed to escape. Two gang members died. As a result, members of the CJNG set up roadblocks in Michoacan and Guanajuato (coded separately). 2 fatalities.
On 16 November 2025, in Manzanillo, Colima, armed individuals on a motorcycle opened fire and shot a man in Colonia Indeco and then fled the scene. The man died as a result. 1 fatality.
On 15 November 2025, in Colima, Colima, armed individuals on a motorcycle approached a man, one of them shot and injured the man and then they fled the scene in Colonia La Albarrada. 1 injured.

On 16 November 2025, in Tlaquepaque, Jalisco, according to witnesses, two armed men forced themselves into a home and shot a woman in Colonia Tepeyac. The attack is suspected of being drug related debt. 1 fatality.

On 17 November 2025, near Laguna Larga De Cortez, Guanajuato, members of the CJNG shot at municipal police officers who attempted to prevent the CJNG from setting fire to a vehicle on the Penjamo-La Piedad highway. The event was part of a series of roadblock in Michoacan and Guanajuato states, that followed an operation against the leader of the CJNG. Casualties unknown.

notes: On 17 November 2025, in Cerro Gordo, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, an armed group opened fire and shot a man walking on the street, who pulled a gun and shot back. One of the armed individuals died and the man was injured as a result. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

notes: On 17 November 2025, in Martinez de la Torre, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, several armed men arrived at a home and shot a man to death in Colonia Melchor Ocampo. 1 fatality.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); El Norte; La Jornada; La Voz de Michoacan; MiMorelia
notes: On 17 November 2025, in Santa Fe de la Laguna, Michoacan de Ocampo, members of the policia comunitaria Kuarichas engaged in an armed clash with suspected members of the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG) following the attempted arrest of a member of the criminal group. An alternative version indicated that the armed individuals shot at residents who were commemorating the 46th anniversary of the movement to reclaim their lands and members of Kuarichas of Tzitzio shot back. During the confrontation, a stray bullet killed a woman. 1 fatality.

On 15 November 2025, around Pueblito de Allende, Chihuahua, state police officers and the National Guard engaged in an armed clash with members of La Linea Gang after the same group attacked another gang in Hidalgo del Parral (coded separately). The clash started in Pueblito de Allende and extended to other areas of Allende municipality. There were no casualties.
Property destruction: On 17 November 2025, in Zamora de Hidalgo, Michoacan de Ocampo, unknown armed individuals shot at the facade of a gym in Colonia 20 de noviembre. There were no casualties.
